title: 880-02 Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā Rashf al-zulāl min al-siḥr al-ḥalāl fī aḥad wa-ʻishrīn ʻāliman lammā tazawwaja kull wāḥid minhum waṣafa laylatahu mūriyan bi-alfāẓ fannihi min maqāmāt al-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-ḥāfiẓ al-Shaykh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."
Secundo folio: fa-lammā faragha min ʻiẓatihi.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In red cardboard binding.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; catchwords.
On folios 17b and 18a seals of "Ibrāhīm."

Colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir al-maqāmāt. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-murūwāt al-dhābbīn ʻan dīnihi bi-ḥadd al-murhafāt wa-sallama taslīman kathīran ilá yawmin tuḍāʻafu fīhi al-ḥasanāt. Balaghat muqābalatan bi-ḥasb al-ṭāqah. Sanat 1270."

Translation of the colophon: "This is the end of the "maqamahs". May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions, the virtuous ones, who protect his religion by the edge of the sharp swords, and grant them abundant peace, until that day in which good deeds will be rewarded multiple folds. It was collated to the best of ability in the year 1270."

title: Biographies of Muslim leaders : manuscript.

notes.text: Title of "Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj" from folio 1a.
Title of "Durrat al-ʻiqd al-ʻaqīq wa-zahrat al-ghuṣn al-rashīq fī manāqib Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Sayyid al-sanad Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq" from folio 17a.
Title of "Qurrat aʻyun al-aḥbāb fī baʻḍ manāqib Abī Ḥafṣ Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb" from folio 31a.
Title of "al-Fatʹḥ wa-al-bushrá fī manāqib al-Zahrā" from folio 43a.
Title of "al-Maqāṣid al-fukhrá fī baʻḍ manāqib al-Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubrá" from folio 48a.
Title of "al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī manāqib al-Sayyidah ʻĀʼishah Umm al-Muʼminīn" from folio 53a.
Title of "Manāqib Sayyidī Abī Ṣāliḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Jīlānī" from folio 59a.
Title of "Nubdhah fī manāqib Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī" from folio 67a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of "Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man nawwara al-wujūd wa-maḥā ʻan muḥayyāh qatām al-aḥzān wa-qashaʻa ʻan samāʼ ṭalʻatihi ghawāsiq al-bawn bi-ishrāq shumūs al-isrá [al-Isrā] ..."

Incipit of "Durrat al-ʻiqd al-ʻaqīq wa-zahrat al-ghuṣn al-rashīq fī manāqib Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Sayyid al-Sanad Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aṭlaʻa fī samāʼ al-sharaf shams al-durrah al-Muḥammadīyah sāṭʻat al-ḍiyāʼ wa-al-anwār wa-asṭaʻa nūr al-kamāl zāhiran fī jabhat al-dhāt al-Aḥmadīyah musarbalatan bi-malābis al-jamāl wa-al-asrār ..."

Incipit of "Qurrat aʻyun al-aḥbāb fī baʻḍ manāqib Abī Ḥafṣ Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ayā man qarraba ilá ḥaḍrat mushāhadatihi man ikhtārahiu min ʻibādih wa-iṣṭafāh wa-ijtabā [wa-ijtabá] li-mukālamatihi man ṣaluḥa li-mujālasatihi wa-saqāhu min ṣafwat ʻuqār muwānasatihi mā ṣaffāh ..."

Incipit of "al-Fatʹḥ wa-al-bushrá fī manāqib al-Zahrā": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ḥamdan li-man jaʻala maḥabbat ahl bayt Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fāṭimatan ʻan irtiḍāʻ thady mā lā yarḍāh wa-nawwara layālī wujūdihim bi-miṣbāḥ al-Sayyid al-abarr ..."

Incipit of "al-Maqāṣid al-fukhrá fī baʻḍ manāqib al-Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubrá": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mannān bi-Muḥammad ibn ʻAdnān wa-al-shukr lillāh al-ḥannān bi-majmaʻ al-raʼfah wa-al-iḥsān wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām minhu ʻalá khayr al-kirām wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-anbiyāʼ al-fikhām wa-ʻalá al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb wa-al-atbāʻ ..."

Incipit of "al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī manāqib al-Sayyidah ʻĀʼishah Umm al-Muʼminīn": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Subḥāna man zayyana nuḥūr man shāʼ bi-mā shāʼ min jawāhir al-qabūl wa-al-iqbāl wa-adhāqahu min ḥumayyā ḥubbihi fa-intashá min ʻuqār dhālika al-zulāl ..."

Incipit of "Manāqib Sayyidī Abī Ṣāliḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Jīlānī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-qādir alladhī arsala ʻalá ʻabdihi saḥāʼiba al-fatʹḥ wa-al-ʻirfān wa-jaʻalahu bāzan ashhab ilá awj al-maʻālī ṭāyir wa-quṭban nayyiran bayna kawākib al-akhdān ..."

Incipit of "Nubdhah fī manāqib Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī": "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arsala Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-kāmil al-sharīʻah wa-khāliṣ al-dīn wa-ḥallá jīd risālatihi bi-bāhir al-khawāriq wa-ayyadahu bi-kumāt al-aṣḥāb al-muhtadīn ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá faḍl al-Karīm al-munjī Jaʻfar ibn Ḥasan ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm al-Barzanjī: Hādhihi nubdhah min aḥwāl al-quṭb al-Rabbānī wa-al-ghawth al-ṣamadānī ... Sayyidinā al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī ..."
Secundo folio of "Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj": dūnihi Jibrīl wa-jamīʻ.
Secundo folio of "Durrat al-ʻiqd al-ʻaqīq wa-zahrat al-ghuṣn al-rashīq fī manāqib Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Sayyid al-Sanad Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq": durr majdihi bi-ḍiyāʼ.
Secundo folio of "Qurrat aʻyun al-aḥbāb fī baʻḍ manāqib Abī Ḥafṣ Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb": al-muʼminīn Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb.
Secundo folio of "al-Fatʹḥ wa-al-bushrá fī manāqib al-Zahrā": qāʼilahā ʻan waṣmat al-nifāq.
Secundo folio of "al-Maqāṣid al-fukhrá fī baʻḍ manāqib al-Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubrá": qāla khayr nisāʼihā Maryam.
Secundo folio of "al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī manāqib al-Sayyidah ʻĀʼishah Umm al-Muʼminīn": bi-surūr jawāhir kuntu lak.
Secundo folio of "Manāqib Sayyidī Abī Ṣāliḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Jīlānī": lawāmiʻ al-anwār wa-aṣḥābihi.
Secundo folio of "Nubdhah fī manāqib Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī": hādhihi nubdhah min aḥwāl.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In yellowish brown leather binding with flap; central medallions on front and back covers and flap.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some texts fully vocalized; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj min taʼlīf al-ḥaqīr Ṣiddīq al-Madanī ibn ʻUmar Khān tilmīdh al-Shaykh Sayyidī Muḥammad al-Sammān nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."

On folio 17a: "Hādhihi Durrat al-ʻiqd al-ʻaqīq wa-zahrat al-ghuṣn al-rashīq fī manāqib Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Sayyid al-Sanad Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh wa-afāḍ ʻalaynā min hibāt fayḍihi wa-jadwāh, taʼlīf al-muftaqir ilá ʻafw Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ʻabduhu Muḥammad Taqī al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh ʻUmar ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir Amīn al-Zarʻah al-Faqīh al-Ḥanafī al-Makkī, kāna Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh. Āmīn."

On folio 31a: "Hādhihi Qurrat aʻyun al-aḥbāb fī baʻḍ manāqib Abī Ḥafṣ Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu wa-arḍāh wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
On folio 43a: "al-Fatʹḥ wa-al-bushrá fī manāqib al-Zahrā lil-marḥūm Mawlānā al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Jafrī, khādim al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Sammān, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."

On folio 48a: "al-Maqāṣid al-fukhrá fī baʻḍ manāqib al-Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubrá li-sibṭihā al-aḥrá wa-najlihā al-ajrá al-faqīr al-ghanī ʻAbd Allāh Mīrghanī, kāna Allāh la-hu wa-al-Muslimīn."
On folio 53a: "al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī manāqib al-Sayyidah ʻĀʼishah Umm al-Muʼminīn li-Mawlānā al-marḥūm Muḥammad al-Jafrī raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn."
On folio 59a: "Hādhihi Manāqib Sayyidī Abī Ṣāliḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-amaddanā bi-madadihi. Āmīn."

On folio 60a, the geneaology of the Sufi Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī is given as: "al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Mūsá ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yaḥyá al-Zāhid ibn Muḥammad ibn Dāwūd ibn Mūsá al-Jawn ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Maḥḍ ibn al-Ḥasan al-Muthanná ibn al-Ḥasan al-Sibṭ ibn Sayyidinā ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib wa-ibn al-Sayyidah Fāṭimah bint Rasūl Allāh."
Folios 65 and 66 are blank.
On folio 67a: "Hādhihi Nubdhah fī manāqib Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon of "Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj": "Tammat Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj min taʼlīf al-Shaykh Ṣiddīq ibn ʻUmar Khān tilmīdh Sayyidī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Sammān, 22 shahr Rajab al-fard, sanat 1209 [12 February, 1795]. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon of "Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj": "The copy of Mawāsim al-ibtihāj fī istimāʻ mukhtaṣar al-Miʻrāj of al-Shaykh Ṣiddīq ibn ʻUmar Khān, a student of Sayyidī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Sammān was completed on 22 Rajab, 1209 [12 February, 1795]. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe."

Colophon of "Durrat al-ʻiqd al-ʻaqīq wa-zahrat al-ghuṣn al-rashīq fī manāqib Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Sayyid al-Sanad Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq": "Subḥāna Rabbika Rabb al-ʻIzzah ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-Mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālii wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of "Durrat al-ʻiqd al-ʻaqīq wa-zahrat al-ghuṣn al-rashīq fī manāqib Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā al-Sayyid al-Sanad Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq": "Glory be to God, the Lord of Glory. He is more sublime than what they describe. May peace be upon the Messengers. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. Amen."

Colophon of "Qurrat aʻyun al-aḥbāb fī baʻḍ manāqib Abī Ḥafṣ Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb": "Subḥāna Rabbika Rabb al-ʻIzzah ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-salāmun ʻalá al-Mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of "Qurrat aʻyun al-aḥbāb fī baʻḍ manāqib Abī Ḥafṣ Sayyidinā ʻUmar ibn al-Khaṭṭāb": "Glory be to God, the Lord of Glory. He is more sublime than what they describe. May peace be upon the Messengers. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. It is concluded. It is concluded. It is concluded. It is concluded."
Colophon of "al-Fatʹḥ wa-al-bushrá fī manāqib al-Zahrā": "Tamma wa-kamula bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih."
Translation of the colophon of "al-Fatʹḥ wa-al-bushrá fī manāqib al-Zahrā": "It is concluded and completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence."

Colophon of "al-Maqāṣid al-fukhrá fī baʻḍ manāqib al-Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubrá": "Wa-hādhā khatm al-Maqāṣid wa-al-Fātiḥah ʻalá al-Maqāṣid wa-ʻalá nīyat kull qāṣid. Wa-kamula bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Allāhum ighfir li-kātibihi wa-li-qārīhi wa-li-nāẓirihi. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of "al-Maqāṣid al-fukhrá fī baʻḍ manāqib al-Sayyidah Khadījah al-Kubrá": "This is the end of 'al-Maqāṣid'. May [Sūrat] al-Fātiḥah be on 'al-Maqāṣid' and on the intentions of all seekers. It is completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. I beseech God to forgive its author, its reader and those who look into it. Amen."
Colophon of "al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī manāqib al-Sayyidah ʻĀʼishah Umm al-Muʼminīn": "Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih yawm al-Jumʻah waqt al-ẓuhr. Āmīn. Āmīn. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of "al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī manāqib al-Sayyidah ʻĀʼishah Umm al-Muʼminīn": "It is completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence on Friday noon. Amen. Amen. It is completed."
Colophon of "Manāqib Sayyidī Abī Ṣāliḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Jīlānī": "Tamma wa-kamula bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of "Manāqib Sayyidī Abī Ṣāliḥ al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qadir al-Jīlānī": "It is concluded and completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. It is concluded. It is concluded. It is concluded."

Colophon of "Nubdhah fī manāqib Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī": "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of "Nubdhah fī manāqib Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī": "Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. It is completed. It is concluded. It is concluded."

title: 880-02 al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn bi-sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn : manuscript / Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqa ṭāʼifatan min ʻulamāʼ kull ʻaṣr lil-qiyām bi-aʻbāʼ al-Aḥādīth wa-al-sunan wa-mayyazahum ʻalá siwāhum bi-sulūkihim awḍaḥ al-maḥajjah wa-aqwam al-sunan ..."
Secundo folio: taʼassiyan bi-al-Kitāb al-majīd.
16 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard and red leather with flap; codex in marbled cardboard and red leather case with a cloth ribbon to pull it out.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Table of contents (folio 1a-1b).
On case: "Sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn li-Ibn Ḥajar."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements: 1. "Fī nawbat al-faqīr al-Sayyid Muḥammad Ṣādiq al-Maydānī bi-thaman [price erased]." 2. "Fī maktabat al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Qūwatlī sanat 1267 fī 18 Shaʻbān al-mukarram al-muʻaẓẓam al-mufakhkham."

On folio 1a: Names of scholars and some death dates statements: al-Sayyid Taqī al-Dīn al-Ḥiṣnī (died 18 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 1129), al-Shaykh ʻUthmān al-Shamʻah al-Shāfiʻī (died Tuesday, 19 Ṣafar, 1126), al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Kuzbarī (died 1264), al-Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh al-Kuzbarī (died 1265), al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Muslim ibn al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Kuzbarī (started teaching in 1265), al-Shaykh Abū al-Mawāhib al-Ḥanbalī (died Wednesday, 30 Shawwāl, 1126), al-Shaykh ʻUthmān ibn Ḥammūdah al-Shāfiʻī (died Friday, end of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1120, in Damascus), al-Shaykh Ḥāmid al-ʻAṭṭār (died 1264), al-Shaykh Salīm Afandī al-ʻAṭṭār (started teaching instead of al-Shaykh Ḥāmid al-ʻAṭṭār, probably his father). Written by Muḥammad Ḥasan ibn al-Sayyid Muḥammad al-Qūwatlī, 18 Shaʻbān, 67 [1267].

On folio 2a: "Kitāb al-Fatʹḥ al-mubīn Sharḥ al-Arbaʻīn lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻallāmah al-humām barakat al-Muslimīn Shihāb al-millah wa-al-dīn niʻmat Allāh taʻālá ʻalayhi fī al-ʻālamīn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥajar al-Haythamī al-Makkī raḥmahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min tanjīz hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah ṣabīḥat yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak shābiʻ ʻashar min shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah min shuhūr sanat tisʻah ʻashar wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā azká al-salām wa-al-taḥīyah ʻalá yad afqar al-wará wa-aḥwajihim ilá Allāh taʻālá ʻAbd al-Salām ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Dihnah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on the morning of blessed Saturday, 17 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 1119 of the Hijrah of the Prophet, best peace and greetings be upon Him, by the poorest and the most needy to God the Most High, ʻAbd al-Salām ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Manṣūr al-Dihnah, may God forgive him, his parents, and all Muslims. Amen. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe."

title: 880-02 al-Īḍāḥ fī al-nikāḥ wa-al-bāh : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb al-waṣīyah al-mashhūr al-musammá fī ʻilm al-nayk wa-yusammá al-Īḍāḥ fī al-nikāḥ wa-al-bāh fī al-rujūʻ [rujūʻ] al-shaykh ilá al-ṣibāh [ṣibāh] lil-Shaykh al-ajall Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-dhālika mashhūr lammā fasiqū ahl miṣr allafa lahum hādhā al-kitāb ḥattá rajiʻū ʻan al-liwāṭ bi-barakat al-Shaykh, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá ..."
Secundo folio: al-makhāṣī ʻalá al-shfār.
16 x 22 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; with headings and markings in red; catchwords.
Table of contents (folios 1b-2a): "Hādhihi Fihrist hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-al-Īḍāḥ."

On folio 1a: Kitāb al-bāh fī rujūʻ al-shaykh ilá al-ṣibāh [ṣibāh] taʼlīf al-ajall Jalāl al-Dīn al-Suyūṭī nafaʻanī Allāh bi-ʻulūmih wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-yalīhi nukat wa-ḥikāyāt wa-qarʻah."
On front cover: "Fī al-Īḍāḥ lil-Suyūṭī."
Text: Folios 2b-46b.
On folios 47a-48a: various anecdotes, intrigues and jokes.
Colophon: "Intahá Kitāb al-Īḍāḥ lil-Suyūṭī."
Translation of the colophon: "The book of al-Īḍāḥ by al-Suyūṭī is concluded."

title: 880-02 ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-Allāh bi-kull shayʼ ʻalīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī anzala min al-samāʼ māʼan fa-aḥyā bi-hi al-arḍ, wa-akhraja thamarāt kull shayʼ bi-qudratih kamā yukhriju al-khalāʼiq yawm al-ʻarḍ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī bayyana la-nā al-mashrūʻ wa-ghayr al-mashrūʻ, wa-kammal bi-al-sunnah wa-alzama bi-al-farḍ ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd ... al-madʻū bi-ʻAbd al-Ghanī ... lammā wajadtu kitāb al-filāḥah al-musammá bi-Jāmiʻ fawāʼid al-malāḥah lil-Shaykh ... Raḍī al-Dīn Abī al-Faḍl Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ghazzī al-ʻĀmirī al-Shāfiʻī ... kitāb jalīl al-miqdār ʻaẓīm al-nafʻ li-man yuʻānī zirāʻat al-arāḍī wa-tarbiyat al-ashjār wa-lākinnahu mimmā yaḥsunu fīhi al-ikhtiṣār fa-jamaʻtu al-himmah wa-lakhkhaṣtu ghālib mā fīhi min al-masāʼil al-muhimmah ... wa-sammaytuhu 'ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah' ..."
Secundo folio: ḥadhfuhu wa-al-muʼākhadhah wa-al-takrār.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; codex in a case of marbled cardboard and red leather with a cloth ribbon to pull it out.
In beautiful medium naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah taʼlīf quṭb al-ʻārifīn Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī nafaʻanā Allāh wa-al-Muslimīn bi-madadihi. Āmīn. M."
On folio 1a: "Yā Kubaykij iḥfaẓ al-waraq."
On case: "al-Malāḥah bi-al-filāḥah li-Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Nābulusī."

Author's colophon: "Wa-qad kamula mā sammaynāhu 'ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah'. Wa-katabahu jāmiʻuhu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá mawlāhu al-khabīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn al-Nābulusī khatama Allāh la-hu bi-al-ḥusná wa-amaddahu bi-al-madad al-asná, wa-dhālika fī ṣabīḥat nahār al-Ithnayn al-thāmin min shahr Shawwāl sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ḥāmidan Allāh taʻālá wa-muṣalliyan wa-musalliman ʻalá Rasūl Allāh wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻihi wa-aḥzābihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Concluded is what I titled 'ʻAlam al-malāḥah fī ʻilm al-filāḥah' [Banner of beauty in the science of agriculture]. It was written by its compiler the poor to his knowledgeable Lord ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn al-Nābulusī, may God grant him an agreeable end and a glorious strength, on Monday morning, 8 Shawwal, 1127 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [7 October, 1715]. I praise God the Most High and pray upon the Messenger of God and upon his family, his companions, his followers and all his parties. Amen."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah ʻashīyat yawm al-Khamīs al-khāmis wa-al-ʻishrīn min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat wāḥid wa-thamānīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf min hijrat man tammat fī jamīʻ aṣḥābihi al-ʻadālah wa-khutimat bi-hi ṣaḥāʼif al-nubūwah wa-al-risālah, ʻlayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi al-kirām wa-aṣḥābihi al-ʻiẓām mā yadūmu ilá qiyām al-sāʻah wa-sāʻat al-qiyām min al-ṣalāh al-lāʼiqah bi-hi wa-bi-him wa-al-salām, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá mawlāhu al-ghanī Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Azkiyah, adāma Allāh saḥāʼib riḍwānihi ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tammat wa-bi-al-khayr ʻammat. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on Thursday evening, 25 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 1281 [21 April, 1865] of the Hijrah of Him in whose companions justice was established, and in Him the sheets of the Prophecy and the Message were sealed (May the most decent prayer and peace be upon him and upon his honorable family and great companions, continuously, until the day of judgment and the hour of resurrection), by the servant of his Rich Lord, Aḥmad ibn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Azkiyah, may God bestow upon him, and upon all Muslims the clouds of his satisfaction. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. It is completed and in widespread goodness concluded."

title: 880-02 Taqyīdāt ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Qawluhu 'al-mutawaḥḥid' min al-tawaḥḥud, wa-min al-maʻlūm anna al-tawaḥḥud ʻalá wazn al-tafaʻʻul wa-ṣīghat al-tafaʻʻul taʼtī li-maʻān ..."
Secundo folio: in ikhtalafa al-muḍāf wa-al-muḍāf ilayh.
17.5 x 24.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18.5 cm; 26 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (5 quires).

In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; the phrases of 'Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah' are preceded by the word 'Qawluhu' (His statement) in red; catchwords.
Text: Folios 1a-42a; folios 43-46 are blank.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Taqyīdāt ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Saʻd ʻalá matn al-ʻAqāʼid al-Nasafīyah jamaʻtuhā min taqrīr Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī al-Mālikī ḥāla al-dars. Tamm." "Jāmiʻuhā al-faqīr Muḥammad ʻArafah al-Dasūqī al-Mālikī al-Burhānī." "Yaqūlu kātibuhu: Hādhihi ṣūrat mā katabahu al-muʼallif wa-huwa al-ʻAllāmah al-Dasūqī ʻalá nuskhatihi allatī bi-khaṭṭihi wa-innamā athbattuhu ʻalá hādhihi al-nuskhah bi-hādhihi al-ʻibārah muḥāfaẓatan ʻalá ittibāʻ nuskhat al-muʼallif al-maktūb ʻalayhā dhālika, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi fī al-dārayn. Āmīn."

Colophon: Colophon missing; text ends abruptly with: "wa-mithl dhālika yuqālu fī al-mashmūm, fa-al-rāʼiḥah al-qāʼimah bi-al-misk laysat hiya al-mashmūmah bal al-mashmūm rāʼiḥah ukhrá khalaqahā Allāh taʻālá qāʼimah bi-al-hawá [bi-al-hawāʼ] bi-sabab mujāwarat al-hawá [al-hawāʼ] lil-jurm dhī al-rāʼiḥah. Qawluhu 'wa-huwa qūwah mūdaʻah fī al-ʻuṣbatayn' ..."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Min mumidd al-kawn astamiddu al-ʻawn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-ashhadu an lā ilāh illā Allāh al-malik al-ḥaqq al-mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluhu sayyid al-awwalīn wa-al-ākharīn. Allāhumma ṣalli wa-sallam ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá sāyir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ʻalá ālihim wa-ṣaḥbihim ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi qawāʻid ʻaẓīmah yaḥtāju ilayhā kull faqīh intakhabtuhā min kitāb al-Qawāʻid lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-Shaykh Badr al-Dīn al-Zarkashī raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, fa-man raʼá fī hādhihi al-qawāʻid khaṭaʼan aw taḥrīfan fa-li-yurājiʻ aṣlahu, fa-rubbamā yakūnu dhālika min sūʼ fahmī, wa-Allāh fī ʻawn al-ʻabd mā kāna al-ʻabd fī ʻawn akhīh, wa-rattabtuhā tibʻan li-aṣlihā ʻalá ḥurūf al-muʻjam tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālib ..."
Secundo folio: tanqīḥ al-adhhān al-rābiʻ al-mughālaṭāt.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 15.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Mukhtaṣar Kitāb Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī lil-Shaʻrāwī taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi. Āmīn." "Mukhtaṣar Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī."

On folio 1a ownership statements as follows: "Mālikuhu Abū al-Isʻād al-Shuʻaybī al-Anṣārī al-Ḥusaynī." "Fī silk mulk Abū al-Isʻād al-Shuʻaybī al-Anṣārī al-Ḥusaynī al-Qādirī al-Ḥawālikī ʻufiya ʻanh." "Mālikuhu kātibuhu Abū al-Isʻād ʻufiya ʻanh." "Thumma ṣāra fī nawbat al-faqīr Abū al-Isʻād al-Shuʻaybī al-Anṣārī al-Ḥusaynī al-Qādirī." "Ṣār fī mulk al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Jawwād ibn al-faqīr Shuʻayb al-Shāfiʻī al-Anṣārī fī awākhir Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-Ḥarām sanat 1019 [13 February, 1611]." "al-Faqīr Aḥmad Abū al-Mawāhib ibn al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Jawwād Shuʻayb al-Shāfiʻī al-Anṣārī [...?]." "Thumma min baʻdihi ṣār fī silk mulk Abū al-Isʻād al-Shuʻaybī al-Qādirī [... ...?]." "Faded seal".

On folio 1a: "Wa-fīhi 'Kitāb al-Ishārah ilá sīrat Rasūl Allāh' ... muʼallifuhu al-Shaykh ʻAlāy al-Dīn al-Maṣlaṭāy ..." (Probably: "al-Ishārah ilá sīrat al-Muṣṭafá wa-tārīkh man baʻdahu min al-khulafāʼ" / by ʻAlāʼ al-Dīn Mughalṭāy ibn Qalīj, 1290 or 1291-1360 or 1361).
On folio 37b eight verses of poetry praising al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī and giving the date of his death on Monday, 3 Jumād al-Awwal, 973 (6 December, 1665) by his son ʻAbd al-Raḥmān.

Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun dhālika ākhir al-qawāʻid al-muntakhabah min Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī, raḥimahu Allāh ... Wa-kāna farāghī min taʼlīfihi bi-tārīkh sābiʻ ʻashar Dhī al-Ḥijjah sanat 1011 [28 May, 1603] wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá man lā nabī baʻdah. Yaqūlu kātibuhu al-faqīr Shuʻayb ibn Aḥmad: Katabtu hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah min nuskhah saqīmah jiddan, fa-taḥtāju hādhihi ilá al-muqābalah, wa-al-aṣl al-manqūl minhu yaḥtāj ilá dhālika min bāb awlá wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻalī al-ʻaẓī ..."

Translation of the colophon: "Let this be the end of the rules selected from Qawāʻid al-Zarkashī [The Rules of al-Zarkashī], may God have mercy upon him ... I finished writing it on 17 Dhū al-Ḥijjah, 1011 [28 May, 1603]. Praise be to God alone, and prayer be upon Him, who no prophet comes after Him. The copyist of the manuscript, the poor Shuʻayb ibn Aḥmad, says: I copied this blessed treatise from a very bad copy which needs to be collated, let alone the original source from which it was copied. There is no power nor might except in God the Sublime, the All Mighty ..."

title: 880-03 al-Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrīyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥarīrī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-awḥad Abū Muḥammad al-Qāsim ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān al-Ḥarīrī al-Baṣrī, barrada Allāh maḍjaʻahu: Allāhumma innā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā ʻallamta min al-bayān wa-alhamta min al-tibyān kamā naḥmaduka ʻalá mā asbaghta min al-ʻaṭāʼ wa-asbalta min al-ghiṭāʼ wa-naʻūdhu bi-ka min shirrat al-lasn wa-fuḍūl al-hadhī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-lā nurhaqa bi-tabaʻatin wa-lā maʻtabah.
21 x 32 cm; written surface: 16.5 x 26.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding with flap; central and corner medallions on cover and flap (in 16 numbered quires).
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; extensive commentaries and notes on the margins and interlinear; some wormholes; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrīyah fī al-mawāʻiẓ wa-al-ādāb wa-al-aḍāḥīk wa-al-aḥājī. Ṣāḥibuhā wa-mālikuhā al-faqīr Baḥr Aḥmad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. A.M.Y.N. [Āmīn])

On folio 1a: Two verses of poetry attributed to Jār Allāh al-Zamakhsharī (Zamakhsharī, Maḥmūd ibn ʻUmar, 1075-1144) praising al-Ḥarīrī and his Maqāmāt: "Uqsimu billāh wa-āyātihi // wa-mashʻar al-ḥajji wa-mīqātihi. Anna al-Ḥarīrīya ḥarrīyun bi-an // taktuba bi-al-tibri Maqāmātihi."
Colophon: "Qad tammat Maqāmāt al-Ḥarīrī bi-ʻawn Allāh al-ghanī."
Translation of the colophon: "The Maqāmāt of al-Ḥarīrī are concluded by the help of the rich God."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyat al-Amīr al-Kabīr ʻalá Sharḥ al-Samarqandīyah lil-Mullawī : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Kabīr.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamd al-ḥaqīqī laka minka yā ḥamīd yā majīd, fa-innamā majāz ḥamdinā takhyīl istiʻārah fī iṭlāq al-tajrīd, wa-rashshiḥ Allāhumma asrāranā bi-an taḍmura fī nufūsinā shuhūd waḥdatik al-aṣlīyah maʻa istiʻmālinā fī mursal tabʻīyat mursalika fī bayān al-ʻalāqāt al-marḍīyah, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallama wa-sharrafa wa-majjada wa-karram. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Miṣrī al-Azʹharī: Hādhā mā narjū Allāh taʻālá fīhi ʻalá sharḥ Shaykhinā wa-shaykh mashāyikhinā wa-mashāyikhihim al-ʻAllāmah al-Mullawī ʻalá al-istiʻārāt ..."
Secundo folio: li-tashbīhihā bi-irtibāṭ al-ilṣāq.
16.5 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 18.5 cm; 24 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 3 quires).
In medium size Maghribi script, in black ink, on white paper; some markings in red; the statements of al-Mullawī are preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his statement) in red; catchwords.

The manuscript is wrapped in an issue of "al-Ādāb" Egyptian weekly periodical (ʻadad 94, yawm al-Ithnayn, 26 Ṣafar, sanat 1307 - 21 Uktūbir, sanat 1889, al-sanah al-thālithah). On the last page of the issue (page 472) is written in pencil the name of "Muḥammad Ramaḍān al-Madanī al-Kutubī" who seems to be the manuscripts dealer.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-baḥr al-fahhāmah farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-waḥīd dahrihi Sayyidinā wa-shaykh mashāyikhinā Sayyidī Muḥammad al-Amīr al-Miṣrī ʻalá al-Mullawī al-Ṣaghīr fī al-istiʻārāt."
Text: Folios 1b-21b; folios 22-24 are blank.

Colophon: "Intahat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnihi wa-tawfīqihi ʻalá yad kātibihi bi-nafsihi ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭarābulusī [... ... ...] tāba Allāh ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn fī ṣabīḥat yawm al-Jumʻah sanat [ithnatayn] wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf. ʻĀm 1252."

Colophon: "Qāla al-faqīr ilayhi taʻālá Nāṣīf ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Yāzijī al-Lubnānī: Hādhā mā aradtu taʻlīqahu fī hādhā al-kitāb min uṣūl hādhihi al-ṣināʻah muqtaṣiran ʻalá dāniyāt al-quṭūf min al-muhimmāt al-muṭaridah dūna al-daqāʼiq wa-al-shawārid taqrīban li-fahm mā yuqraʼu minhu wa-ḥifẓ mā yufhamu ʻalá annī muʻtarifun bi-al-quṣūr ʻan istīfāʼ mā ḥarrarahu al-qawm fa-innī qad taṭaffaltu ʻalá faḍalāt min kalāmihim wa-ayna al-Thurayyā min yad al-mutanāwil. Intahá wa-Allāh aʻlam. M."

Translation of the colophon: "The poor to the Almighty Nāṣīf ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Yāzijī al-Lubnānī says: This is what I wanted to introduce in this book, regarding the fundamentals of this art. I have limited myself to the easiest and the straightforward of the most important, excluding the minute and the irregular, so that what is being read is easier to understand and what is comprehendible can be memorized. I admit that I did not present in detail what the authorities on the subject have written. I am no more than a parasite on the leftovers of their words. How can one reach Pleiades! It is completed. God is more knowledgeable."

title: 880-02 Ikmāl al-dīn wa-itmām al-niʻmah : manuscript / Abū Jaʻfar Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn ibn Mūsá ibn Bābawayh al-Qummī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi aʻin wa-waffiq ʻalá itmāmih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-qādir al-ʻalīm al-ḥakīm, taqaddasa wa-taʻālá ʻan ṣifāt al-makhlūqīn, dhī al-jalāl wa-al-ikrām wa-[...] wa-al-inʻām alladhī la-hu al-asmāʼ al-ḥusná wa-al-amthāl al-ʻulyā wa-al-ḥikmah al-bālighah ..."
Secundo folio: wa-qāla innahumā lan yaftariqā.
17.2 x 28 cm; written surface: 9 x 18.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In modern brown leather binding.

In clear and somewhat small naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; sometimes the headings are in large black script; about 100 leaves have some repair with some loss of text; extensive marginal notes in different hands; catchwords.
Text folios 1b-271a.
On preliminary leaf: The stamp of "Maktabat al-Ṭayyār al-Khāṣṣah - Baghdād. Taʼassasat 1947 M - 1366 H. al-ʻAdad 011. Muʼassisuhā Hāshim ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Ṭayyār."
Author's name from folio 2a.

On folio 271a an ownership statement dated 1199 Hijrī (1784 or 1785): "Mimmā manna bi-hi al-Malik al-Jalīl ʻalá ʻabdihi al-ḍaʻīf al-dhalīl Mūsá ibn Sayyid ʻAlī ibn Sayyid Yūsuf ibn Kāẓim al-Mūsawī nasaban wa-al-Hīn Abzalī [?] nisbatan. Raḥima Allāh wālidayhi man laqāhu wa-rajjaʻahu ilá ṣāḥibihi, wa-laʻan Allāh man laqāhu wa-saraqahu wa-lam yurajjiʻhu ilá ṣāḥibihi wa-ḥarāmun ʻalayhi an yanẓura fīhi. Sanat tisʻah wa-tisʻīn wa-alf wa-miʼah [1199 (1784 or 1785)]."

Colophon: "Tammat. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-itmām wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid al-anām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muntakhabīn ilá yawm al-qiyām. Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh fī yawm al-Sabt muʼarrakhan 20 shahr Jumādá al-Thānī sanat 1034 fī Qaryat Hāndūkafarḥay [?] min maḍāfāt baldah muʻaẓẓamah [...?] ṣānahā Allāh taʻālá ʻan āfāt al-du[hū]r. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm. [Illegible seal]."

Translation of the colophon: "It is concluded. Praise be to God that it [the manuscript] is completed. May prayer and peace be upon the Master of the Nations [Prophet Muḥammad] and upon his family and chosen companions till Judgment Day. It was completed on Saturday, dated 20 Jumādá al-Thānī, the year 1034 [30 March, 1625] at the village of Hāndūkafarḥay [?], a dependency of the exalted town of [...?], may the Almighty God protect it from the calamities of time. Completed. Completed. Completed. [Illegible seal]."

title: 880-02 Irshād al-sārī fī sharḥ al-Bukhārī. Volume 2 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qasṭallānī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.
Incipit: Starts with "Bāb al-fitan. Bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-qūwatih bi-al-tanwīn yadhkuru fīhi qawlahu ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: 'Man aḥabba liqāʼ Allāh aḥabba Allāh liqāʼah' ..."
Secundo folio: innahu lam yuqbaḍ nabī.
22 x 30.8 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 22 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding; both covers embossed with central and corner medallions, edges heavily rubbed; some scuffing; flap missing; cover slightly soiled.

In clear and somewhat small naskh script, in black ink on white paper; with original text, headings, keywords and markings in red; numerous marginal notes; about a dozen leaves with marginal repairs with no loss of text; minor wormholes; catchwords.
Text folios 2a-441b.
On folio 1a in pencil: "Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn ʻAbd al-Malik al-Qasṭallānī. al-Juzʼ al-thānī min irshād al-sārī fī Sharḥ al-Bukhārī.
Author's colophon: "... wa-qad faraghtu min taʼlīfihi wa-kitābatihi fī yawm al-Sabt sābiʻ ʻishrīn Rabīʻ al-Thānī sant ʻashrah wa-tisʻmiʼah ḥāmidan muṣalliyan musalliman."

Translation of the author's colophon: "... I finished the composition and writing of [the book] on Saturday, 27 of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, the year 916 [13 August, 1510], with praise, prayer and request from God to grant peace [for the Prophet Muḥammad]."

Copyist's colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ al-mubārak fī shahr Shawwāl sanat thintayn wa-arbaʻīn wa-alf min al-Hijrah ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād wa-aḥwajihim ilá Allāh taʻālá Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Anshāṣī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The blessed book is completed by the praise of God, His help and abundant benevolence. The copying was concluded on blessed Wednesday in the month of Shawwal, the year 1042 of the Hijrah [April/May, 1730] by the hand of the poorest of the poor and the most needy to God, may He be praised, Aḥmad ibn al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Anshāṣī al-Shāfiʻī, may God forgive him and his parents and all Muslims. Amen."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Marāqī al-falāḥ : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Ṭahṭāwī.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ayyada al-sharīʻat bi-wurrāthihā wa-rafaʻa bi-him manārahā wa-basaṭa athāthahā wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad afḍal makhlūq wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-ʻālimīn bi-al-ḥuqūq. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi taqyīdāt laṭīfah li-Sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ al-musammá bi-Marāq [bi-Marāqī] al-falāḥ, asʼalu Allāh tamāmahā wa-ḥusn ikhtitāmihā, jamaʻtuhā li-man huwa qāṣir mithlī rājiyan qabūlahā min Allāh al-walī al-ʻalī maʼkhūdhah mimmā katabahu al-marḥūm ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Afandī Ḥalawāt wa-min Sharḥ al-muʼallif al-kabīr wa-sharḥ al-Sayyid Muḥammad Abī al-Suʻūd, raḥima Allāh taʻālá al-jamīʻ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-law kāna mutaghayyiran muntinan.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 11 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.

Binding: In modern Islamic style black leather binding with flap. The manuscript should have contained 54 numbered quires of 10 leaves each, however, only the first leaf of quire 1 is present, quire 2 is missing and quire 54 contains 8 leaves with nothing missing; all the quires are loose within the binding.

In clear naskh script, in black ink on glossy white paper; with keywords and markings in red; text within double red frame; many wormholes, mainly on the margins; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah al-mudaqqiq al-fahhāmah al-Sayyid Aḥmad al-Ṭaḥṭāwī ʻalá Sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ al-musammá bi-Marāq [bi-Marāqī] al-falāḥ lil-ʻallāmah faqīh al-ṭabʻ Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī al-Ḥanafī."

Author's colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhā yawm al-Jumʻah tāsiʻ shahr Shaʻbān al-mukarram qubayl al-zawāl alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1210, wa-qad ibtadaʼtuhā fī al-ʻām al-sābiq qabla naẓīr hādhā al-shahr bi-qalīl wa-ikhtaṭaftu kitābatahā fī ayyām al-biṭālāt al-mutakhallilah athnāʼ al-durūs. Wa-Allāh aʻlam."

Translation of the author's colophon: "The writing of the manuscript was concluded on Friday, the ninth of the honored month of Shaʻbān before sunset in the year 1210 Hijrī [18 February, 1796]. I started writing it last year shortly before the present month [i.e. the month of Rajab], having snatched the time for writing it intermittently during recesses between the teaching days. God is more knowledgeable."
Copyist's colophon: "Tammat kitābatuhā ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad al-Ṭahwīhī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-lil-Muslimīn wa-li-man daʻá la-hu bi-khayr. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The copy was concluded by the hand of the poor to God the Almighty, Muḥammad al-Ṭahwīhī, may God forgive him and the Muslims and those who invoke God on his behalf to be good to him."

title: 880-02 Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-imdād al-Fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ : manuscript / Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār al-Shurunbulālī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa khulāṣat ʻibādihi bi-wirāthat ṣafwatih khayra ʻibādih wa-amaddahum bi-al-ʻināyah fa-aḥsanū li-dhātihi al-ʻibādah wa-ḥafiẓū sharīʻatahu wa-ballaghūhā ʻibādah ... Wa-baʻd fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-dhalīl al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-jalīl Ḥasan ibn ʻAmmār ibn ʻAlī al-Shurunbulānī al-Ḥanafī ... Inna hādhā kitāb ṣaghīr ḥajmuhu ghazīr ʻilmuhu ... wa-sammaytuhu Marāqī al-falāḥ bi-imdād al-Fattāḥ sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ."
Secundo folio: wa-al-ṭahārah bi-fatḥ al-Ṭāʼ.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In modern black leather binding with flap.
The manuscript contains 22 numbered quires each of which contains 10 leaves, except quires 1, 8, 9, 21 and 22 which contain 8 leaves each, but the text is complete with nothing missing.
In clear naskh script, in black ink on glossy white paper; with keywords and markings in red; many wormholes, mainly on the margins, with some loss of text; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ Nūr al-īḍāḥ wa-najāt al-arwāḥ lil-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah wa-al-baḥr al-fahhāmah shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām Sayyidī Ḥasan al-Shurunbulānī al-Ḥanafī taghammadahu Allāh bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān. Āmīn."
On folio 1a, a note by one of the readers of the manuscript: "Ṭālaʻ ʻAbd al-Wahhāb Ṣūfī fī hādhā al-kitāb sanat 1263 [1846/1847], fataḥa Allāh ʻalayhi. Āmīn."
The last three leaves are blank.

Colophon: "Katabahu li-nafsihi al-ʻabd al-faqīr wa-al-mudhnib al-ḥaqīr al-muqirr bi-al-taqṣīr al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-qadīr Ḥasan Ḥubayshī al-Ḥanafī ʻāmalahu Allāh taʻālá bi-luṭfihi al-khafī wa-ajrāhu Allāh ʻalá ʻawāyid birrihi al-khafī ibn al-marḥūm al-Ḥājj Hilālī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Ḥijāzī bi-Dimyāṭ, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-wālid wālidayh wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-li-man samiʻahu wa-li-man ṣaḥḥaḥa fīhi laḥnahu wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-raḥmah wa-al-riḍwān. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-arbaʻat ʻashar. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-qad tamma bi-khayr."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the poor servant, for himself, he who admits his sin and deficiency and hopes for the forgiveness of his Almighty God, Ḥasan Ḥubayshī al-Ḥanafī the son of the departed al-Ḥājj Hilālī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Ḥijāzī, in Dimyāṭ [Damietta, Egypt], may God treat him according to His hidden kindness and lead him unto the paths of His hidden righteousness. May God forgive him, his parents and the father of his parents and those who read this book, those who listen to it, those who correct its mistakes, and those who invoke God to grant him [the copyist] mercy and acceptance. The copying of this book was completed on blessed Sunday [name of the month not mentioned] of the year 1114 [1703 or 1704]. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. It is finished with success."

title: 880-03 Tafsīr Abī al-Saʻūd : al-musammá Irshād al-ʻaql al-salīm ilá mazāyā al-Kitāb al-Karīm : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad Abū al-Saʻūd.

notes.text: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīn āmanū awfū bi-al-ʻuqūd'. al-Wafāʼ al-qiyām bi-mūjib al-ʻaqd wa-kadhā al-īfāʼ. Wa-al-ʻaqd huwa al-ʻahd al-muwaththaq al-mushabbah bi-ʻaqd al-ḥabl wa-naḥwih. Wa-al-murād bi-al-ʻuqūd mā yaʻumm jamīʻ mā alzamahu Allāh taʻālá ʻibādahu wa-ʻaqadahu ʻalayhim min al-takālīf wa-al-aḥkām al-dīnīyah wa-mā yaʻqudūnahu fīmā baynahum min ʻuqūd al-amānāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt wa-naḥwihā mimmā yajibu al-wafāʼ bi-hi aw yaḥsunu dīnan bi-an yuḥmala al-amr ʻalá maʻnan yaʻummu al-wujūb wa-al-nadb ..."
Secundo folio: al-iṣṭiyād fī al-barr
18 x 27.2 cm; written surface: 10 x 18.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding (in 45 quires; some numbered). Covers embossed with beautiful central medallions.

In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink on glossy white paper; with markings in red; at the head of the text on folio 3b a decoration in gold and blue; some corrections on the margins; text within black and gold frames; catchwords.
Text folios 3b-446a; folios 1-2 are blank.
On the upper left corner of folio 2a: "al-Rubʻ al-thānī".

Colophon: Colophon missing; ends with: "... idh mā min amr dīnī illā wa-huwa yastanidu ilá al-Qurʼān bi-al-dhāt aw bi-wasaṭ, 'wa-hudan' min al-ḍalālah 'wa-raḥmah' yasʼalu bi-hā khayr al-dārayn 'li-qawmin yuʼminūn' ay yuṣaddiqūnahu li-annahum al-muntafiʻūn bi-hi, wa-ammā mā ʻadāhum fa-lā yahtadūna bi-hudāhu wa-lā yantafiʻūn bi-jadwāh. ʻAn Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: ʻAllimū ariqqāʼakum Sūrat Yūsuf fa-innahu ayyumā Muslim talāhā wa-ʻallamahā ahlahu wa-mā malakat yamīnuhu hawwana Allāh ʻalayhi sakarāt al-mawt wa-aʻṭāhu al-qūwata allā yaḥsuda Musliman."

title: 880-02 Multaqá al-abḥur : manuscript / Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Multaqá al-abḥur. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanā lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn alladhī huwa ḥabluhu al-matīn wa-faḍluhu al-mubīn wa-mīrāth al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn wa-ḥujjatuhu al-dāmighah ʻalá al-khalq ajmaʻīn wa-maḥajjatuhu al-sālikah ilá aʻlá ʻillīyīn ..."
Secundo folio: sahlah ghayr mughlaqah.
13.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 6 x 13.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding; flap missing.
In good medium naskh script, in black ink on white paper; headings and markings in red; extensive commentaries on the margins; catchwords.

On folio 1b-2a: "... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá raḥmat rabbih al-ghanī Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥamad [Muḥammad] ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ ṭālibī al-istifādah an ajmaʻa la-hu kitāban yashtamilu ʻalá masāʼil al-Qudūrī wa-al-Mukhtār wa-al-Kanz wa-al-Wiqāyah bi-ʻibārah sahlah ghayr mughlaqah fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik wa-aḍaftu ilayhi baʻḍ mā yuḥtāju ilayhi min masāʼil al-Majmaʻ wa-nubdhah min al-Hidāyah wa-ṣarraḥtu bi-dhikr al-khilāf bayna aʼimmatinā al-ashrāf ... sammaytuhu Multaqá al-abḥur li-yuwāfiq al-ism al-musammá ..."

On folio 179a an endowment statement as follows: "Waqaftu waqfan ṣaḥīḥan sharʻīyan bi-marḍāt Allāh taʻālá bi-sharṭ an lā yubāʻa wa-lā yurhana wa-lā yubaddala, fa-man baddalahu baʻdmā samiʻahu fa-innamā ithmuhu ʻalá allahīna yubaddilūnahu. Inna Allāha samīʻ ʻalīm. Wa-anā al-faqīr Ḥāfiẓ Ibrāhīm, sākin ʻalá Aghā ʻAlī al-faqīr Mullā ʻAbd al-Majīd sākin Qājardhādah bi-madrasatihi. [Seal]. Ibrāhīm Shihāb al-Dīn."

Author's colophon: "Qāla al-faqīr: Hādhā ākhir Multaqá al-abḥur ... wa-Allāh ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-qad tamma tabyīḍuhu bayna al-ṣalātayn min yawm al-Thulāthāʼ thālith ʻashar min Rajab al-muʻaẓẓam, sanat thalāth wa-ʻishrīn wa-tisʻi miʼah ʻalá yad al-faqīr Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn wa-ʻalá al-tābiʻīn la-hum bi-iḥsān ilá yawm al-dīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "The poor one said: This is the end of Multaqá al-abḥur ... God suffices me. He is the best advocate. It was completed between the two prayers, on Tuesday, the thirteenth of the sublime month of Rajab, the year nine hundred and twenty three by the hand of the poor Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥalabī. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions and those who follow them faithfully until Judgement Day."

Copyist's colophon: "Qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-sharīfah li-Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf Bilāl ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-ikhwatihi wa-li-akhawātihi wa-aḥsana ilayhā [ilayhim] wa-ilayhi. Tamm."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "The honorable copy of Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī was completed by the hand of the feeble servant Bilāl ibn Muḥammad, may God forgive him, his parents, his brothers and his sisters, and treat them and him with kindness. It is completed."

title: 880-03 al-Tabṣirah : manuscript / Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Jawzī.

notes.text: Title from the printed versions.

Ikhtāra Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻalá sāʼir al-khalāʼiq wa-jaʻalahu musharrafan wa-asrá bi-hi min al-Masjid al-Ḥarām ilá al-Masjid al-Aqṣá fa-kāna dhālika la-hu fakhran wa-sharafan, fa-urkiba al-Burāq wa-ʻurrija bi-hi ilá al-sabʻ al-ṭibāq ..."
Secundo folio: Qum yā ghafūlan ʻan wiṣāl ḥabībihi.

Copied by the poor to the mercy of his rich Lord ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Ḥaydar, uttering the invocations of 'Ḥamdalah, Ḥasbalah, Ḥawqalah and Prayer and Peace [upon the Prophet Muḥammad]". Followed by seven lines of invocations.

Laqad faraghnā min al-kitāb al-arbaʻah ʻan dhikr al-ʻilam al-naẓarī wa-al-ʻamalī al-ḥāfiẓ lil-ṣiḥḥah wa-ḥāna la-nā an nakhtuma kitāb al-Qānūn, al-kitāb al-khāmis, al-muṣannaf fī al-adwiyah al-murakkabah, li-yakūna kamā al-qarābādīn lil-kitāb ..."

Ḥarrarahu wa-fī sanat thamāniyat ʻashar."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.

Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼalu an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm ..."
Secundo folio: bi-jannāt al-naʻīm.

Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh, fa-hādhihi Ḥawāshin ʻalá mawāḍiʻ min Sharḥ Taṣrīf al-ʻIzzī lil-ʻAllāmah al-Taftāzānī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahumā arjū an yaʻumma nafʻuhā wa-yaʻẓuma waqʻuhā, innahu huwa al-maʼmūl wa-muḥaqqiq kull masʼūl ..."

At the head of the colophon: "Fī shahr Shawwāl."

On the margin of folio 150a: "Hādhā ākhir al-ḥawāshī allatī katabahā Aḥmad ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī, aʻlá Allāh darajatahu wa-razaqanā Allāh taʻālá khayr al-dārayn bi-barakatihi ʻalá ḥāshiyat Shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah al-Imām Nāṣir al-Dīn al-Laqānī al-Mālikī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-ʻāmalahu muʻāmalat awliyāʼihi. Āmīn thumma āmīn, yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn. M.M.M. Qad waqaʻa taswīd hādhihi al-ḥawāshī ʻalá yad al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr al-mutawaghghil bi-al-dhanb al-kathīr al-mutamassik bi-ʻafw Allāh al-malik al-qadīr, al-mutafāʼil wa-al-rājī min al-Mutaʻālī al-Kabīr fī al-dunyā al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal bi-hi wa-al-taysīr wa-fī al-ʻuqbá ʻadam al-muʼākhadhah bi-al-fiʻla al-qalīl wa-al-kathīr bi-jāh khātim al-rusl al-bashīr al-nadhīr Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-Shaykh al-kabīr."

Colophon: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī waffaqanī ʻalá al-tamām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi sayyid al-anām wa-ʻalá ālihi alladhīna kānū lil-dīn ka-al-aʻlām wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna qatalū al-kafarah wa-badaʼū al-Islām. Qad tammat al-ḥāshiyah al-musammāh bi-al-Miṣrī al-wāqiʻah ʻalá Saʻd al-Dīn lil-ʻAllāmah al-thānī al-muḥaqqiq al-Taftāzānī, quddisa sirruhu, ʻalá yad aḍʻaf al-ʻibād wa-aḍall sabīl al-rashād Muḥyī al-Dīn -- al-mansūb ilá Shīrawān nāḥiyatan wa-ilá Farsā qaryatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-aḥsana ilayhimā wa-ilayhi. Fī yawm al-Sabt waqta al-ʻaṣr. Ibtadaytuhu wa-fī yawm al-Aḥad qabla al-ʻaṣr atmamtuhu -- ibn al-Ḥājjī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Khālidī al-Naqshabanidī al-Farsāfī, fī sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-tisʻīn wa-sanatayn min Hijrah [al-Hijrah] al-Nabawīyah al-Muṣṭafawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-akmal taḥīyah min jānib Rabb al-Barīyah fī [kull] waqt wa-sāʻah ilá abad al-abadīyah. Āmīn. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "Praise be to God who enabled me to complete [the copying of the manuscript], and prayer and peace be upon His Messenger, the master of the nations, and upon his family who were for the faith like banners, and upon his companions who killed the infidels and started Islam. The marginalia titled "al-Miṣrī" [i.e. by the "Egyptian" author Ibn Qāsim al-ʻAbbādī] on the work of Saʻd al-Dīn, the second scholar, the learned al-Taftāzānī, may his secret be sanctified, by the hand of the feeblest slave who has strayed from the guided path, Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn al-Ḥājjī al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Khālidī al-Naqshabanidī al-Farsāfī, who is from the region of Shīrawān [probably Shirvān (Irān)], from the village of Farsā. May God forgive him and his parents and be kind to them and to him. I started the copying on the afternoon of Saturday and finished it before the afternoon of Sunday, in the year one thousand two hundred ninety two of the Hijrah of the Prophet Muḥammad, may the best of prayer and most perfect of peace be upon him from the Lord of Creation at every time and every hour for ever and ever. Amen. It is completed."

Hādhā kitāb adhkuru fīhi Ḥadīth Miʻrāj Muḥammad Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ḥadīth al-Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī [?] al-Baṣrī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh. Ruwiya ʻan Ibn ʻAbbās, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, qāl: Qāla Rasūl Allāh, Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fa-baynamā anā nāʼim dhāt laylah bayna al-Ṣafā wa-al-Marwah, kānat laylah muẓlimah wa-hiya dhāt raʻd wa-barq wa-shitāʼ, habaṭa ʻalayya al-Amīr Jibrīl, ʻalayhi al-salām ..."

Incipit of Poem on the seven voluntary fasts in Islam: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallama taslīman. Ayarghabu [Atarghabu] ajran li-qiyāmi [lil-qiyāmi] taṭawwuʻan // ʻalayka bi-ayyāmin rawtʹhu [rawatʹhā] al-awāʼilu. Wa-ʻiddatuhā sabʻu min al-ʻāmi kullihi // wa-fī ṣawmihā lil-ṣāʼimīna faḍāʼilu ..."

Incipit of Kitāb al-dumūʻ: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Abū ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ʻAlī al-Jawzī, raḥimahu Allāh wa-raḍiya ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtaraʻa al-ashyāʼ bi-laṭīf qudratih wa-badīʻ ṣanʻatih fa-aḥsana fīmā ikhtaraʻa, wa-abdaʻ al-mawjūdāt ʻalá ghayr mithāl, fa-lā sharīka la-hu fīmā abdaʻ. Allafa al-laṭīf wa-al-kathīf min aʻdād āḥād al-jawāhir wa-jamaʻa li-yufrida bi-al-waḥdānīyah kull maṣnūʻ ..."

Incipit of Kitāb Ādāb al-akl: "Kitāb Ādāb al-akl. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallama taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥsana tadbīr al-kāʼināt fa-khalaqa al-khalq wa-al-samāwāt wa-anzala al-māʼ al-furāt min al-muʻṣirāt fa-anshaʼa al-ḥayy wa-al-nabāt wa-qaddara al-arzāq wa-al-aqwāt wa-ḥafiẓ bi-al-maʼkūlāt qiwá al-ḥayawānāt wa-aʻāna ʻalá al-ṭāʻāt wa-al-aʻmāl al-ṣāliḥāt wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad dhī al-muʻjizāt al-bāhirāt ..."

Incipit of Kitāb Ādāb al-nikāḥ: "Kitāb Ādāb al-nikāḥ. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-karīm wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī lā tuṣādifu sihām al-awhām fī ʻajāʼib ṣanʻatih majrá wa-lā tarjiʻu al-ʻuqūl ʻan awāʼil badāʼiʻihi illā wālihatan ḥayrá wa-lā tazālu laṭāʼifu ʻamalihi niʻmatan ʻalá al-ʻālamīn tatrá, fa-hiya tatawālá ʻlayhim ikhtiyāran wa-qahran ..."

Incipit of Miscellaneous Ḥadīths and advices: "Wa-min baʻḍ taʼālif al-Aḥādīth: Man dakhala ʻalá marīḍ an yaḍaʻa yadahu ʻalá jabīnihi aw mawḍiʻ min jasadihi wa-an yadʻwa la-hu li-qawlihi, ʻalayhi al-salām: Mā min ʻabdin Muslimin yaʻūdu marīḍan lā yaḥḍuru ajaluhu fa-yaqūlu nasʼalu Allāh al-ʻaẓīm rabb al-ʻarsh al-ʻaẓīm an yashfiyaka wa-yuʻāfiyaka illā shafāhu Allāh ..."

Incipit of Tanwīr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam taslīman. Kitāb Tanwīr al-ghabash taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj al-Jawzī, raḥimahu Allāh. Qāla, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu fī wa-ṣīyatihi li-waladih Abū al-Qāsim: Innī kafaytuka istiʻārat al-kutub li-annī taraktu laka miʼat taʼlīf min taṣnīfī minhā fī al-tafsīr wa-al-Ḥadīth wa-ghayr dhālika ... Qāla al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ḥāfiẓ Jamāl al-Dīn wa-qudwat al-aʼimmah wa-al-muḥaddithīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAlī al-Jawzī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātihi. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ikhtāra min jamīʻ al-makhlūqāt al-insān thumma iṣṭafá minhu ahl al-taqwá wa-al-iḥsān thumma jaʻala ʻalá maḥall naẓarihi al-qulūb lā al-abdān ..."

Incipit of Bāb al-ʻAql ḥujjat Allāh ʻalá khalqih: "Bāb al-ʻAql ḥujjat Allāh ʻalá khalqih wa-huwa mālik al-qalb wa-amīr al-jasad wa-wazīr al-rūḥ wa-tarjumān al-ʻabd wa-bi-hi yaqaʻu al-tadbīr wa-tathbut al-ḥujjah. Wa-huwa ʻaqlān, ʻaql mawhūb wa-ʻaql maksūb. Fa-al-ʻaql al-mawhūb huwa alladhī wahaba Allāh ʻazza wa-jall lil-ʻulamāʼ yumayyizūn bi-hi al-ḥaqq wa-al-bāṭil, wa-al-ʻaql al-maksūb huwa alladhī ishtarakat [fīhi] jamīʻ al-khalāʼiq wa-uʻṭiya minhu lil-malāʼikah wa-banī Ādam wa-al-bahāʼim ..."

Incipit of Questions and answers on Islamic law: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh Sayyidī al-Ḥasan ibn Masʻūd al-Yūsī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanh, fī baʻḍ ajwibatihi fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-wird, hal huwa lāzimah am lā ..."

Incipit of An anecdote regarding the encounter of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀbid with al-Khaḍir and Ilyās: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Dhakara Abū Bakr al-Muṭawwiʻī ʻan Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀbid qāl: Kuntu jālisan fī Bayt al-Maqdis ʻinda Bāb Sulaymān, ʻlayhi al-salām, yawm al-Jumʻah baʻda al-ʻaṣr, idh jāʼa ilayya shakhṣān, aḥaduhumā yushbihu khilqtuhu khilqatanā wa-al-ākhar ʻaẓīm al-khalq, kānat jabhatuhu ʻarīḍatan wa-kāna fīhā athar ḍarbah wa-sallamā ʻalayya ..."

Incipit of Excerpts from Tuḥfat al-albāb fī ʻajāʼib al-buldān: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Dhukira fī Tuḥfat al-albāb fī ʻajāʼib al-buldān anna fī balad al-Sūdān ummah bilā ruʼūs wa-qad dhakarahum al-Shaʻbī fī kitāb Sīrat al-mulūk. Wa-qad dhakara anna fī bilād al-Maghrib ummah min walad Ādam kulluhum nisāʼ wa-lā yaʻīshu fī arḍihim dhakar ..."

Incipit of Excerpts from Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān al-kubrá: "Wa-min kitāb Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān. Ḥarf al-Yāʼ. Yājūj wa-Mājūj, summū bi-dhālika li-kathratihim. Wa-qīl huwa ism Aʻjamī ghayr mushtaq. Qāla Muqātil: Hum walad Yāfit ibn Nūḥ, ʻlayhi al-salām. Wa-ammā qawlu man qāl anna Ādam nāma wa-iḥtalam wa-iltaṣaqa manīyuhu bi-al-turāb fa-tawallada minhu hādhā al-ḥayawān fa-mardūd bi-ʻadam iḥtilām al-anbiyāʼ ʻalayhim al-salām ..."
Secundo folio of Kitāb al-dumūʻ: ilayhi wa-rajaʻ wa-ashhadu.
Secundo folio of Kitāb Ādāb al-akl: taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh.
Secundo folio of Kitāb Ādāb al-nikāḥ: wa-qālū inna ʻĪsá.
Secundo folio of Miscellaneous Ḥadīths and advices: fī jawāzihi bi-asmāʼ Allāh.
Secundo folio of Tanwīr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash: ʻalá mā hiya ʻalayh.
Secundo folio of Bāb al-ʻAql ḥujjat Allāh ʻalá khalqih: wa-qalb madhbūḥ wa-qalb maṭrūḥ.
Secundo folio of Questions and answers on Islamic law: wa-kataba Sayyidī Muḥammad.
Secundo folio of An anecdote regarding the encounter of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀbid with al-Khaḍir and Ilyās: wa-ʻalá ṭarīqat rajul.
Secundo folio of Excerpts from Tuḥfat al-albāb fī ʻajāʼib al-buldān: mattá buniyat hādhihi al-madīnah.
Secundo folio of Excerpts from Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān al-kubrá: aḥaduhumā lil-ākhar ṣār.
15.5 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18 cm; 20-24 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding, flap missing; central medallion on both covers; leaves are loose within the binding as usual with some Islamic bindings.
In fair, small Maghribī script, in black ink on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.
On the back of the front cover a leaf is glued which contains some folkloric medicinal recipes.
On folio 1a a poem in eight verses about the seven voluntary fasts in Islam.

On folios 55b-57b different anecdotes about: The faithful Jinn (muʼminū al-Jinn) and whether they can enter Paradise and can see God, whether women can see God in Paradise, whether a man can marry a female Jinn (jinnīyah), the seven categories of keeping vigil in prayer at night (marātib iḥyāʼ al-layl), enumeration of the virtuous nights and days (bayān al-layālī wa-al-ayyām al-fāḍilah).
On folios 87b-100b a collection of miscellaneous Ḥadiths and advices on permissable and prohibited acts.
On folio 140b: a. Two Ḥadīths on the pursuit of knowledge. b. On God the cause of all causes. c. Six verses on when not to return greetings.
On folio 147a-147b several scribbles in illegible Maghribī hand writing: Ḥadīths, anecdotes, the numerical values of the letters of the Arabic alphabet (ḥisāb al-jummal).
Colophon of Poem on the seven voluntary fasts in Islam. Colophon missing. Ends with: Wa-thālithu ayyām al-Muḥarrami innahu // jalīlun wa-ʻĀshurāʼu [wa-ʻĀshūrāʼu] fīhi aqāwilu."

Colophon of Kitāb al-dumūʻ (folio 55a): "Intahá Kitāb al-Dumūʻ. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh wa-ilayhi al-rujūʻ. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad dhī al-majd wa-al-maqām al-marfūʻ wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ulī al-ikhlāṣ lillāh wa-al-khushūʻ. Wa-raḥima Allāh man allafahu wa-kātibahu wa-kāsibahu wa-qāriyahu wa-sāmiʻahu wa-mustaʻmilahu wa-li-man daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah wa-al-raḥmah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. ʻĀm 1181."

Translation of the colophon of Kitāb al-dumūʻ: "Kitāb al-Dumūʻ has ended. Praise be to God. To Him is the returning. May prayer and peace be upon our Master Muḥammad who has the glorious and sublime status, and on his family and companions who are loyal and submissive to God. May God have mercy on its author, its copyist, he who benefits from it, its reader, he who listen to it, its user, and on him who asks God to forgive them and have mercy upon them. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. The year 1181."

Colophon of Kitāb Ādāb al-akl: Colophon missing. Ends with: "... wa-qāla ayḍan: ʻAjibtu li-man yadkhulu al-ḥammām ʻalá al-rīq thumma yuʼakhkhiru al-akl baʻda an yakhruja kayfa lā yamūtu. Wa-ʻajibtu li-man iḥtajama thumma bādara al-akl kayfa lā yamūtu. Wa-qāla ayḍan lam ara shayʼan anfaʻu lil-wabāʼ min duhn al-banafsaj yuddahanu bi-hi wa-yushrab."

Colophon of Kitāb Ādāb al-nikāḥ: "Wa-hādhā alladhī wajadnā fa-qayyadnāh min baʻḍ al-awrāq, wa-lam najid lahum [la-hā] awwalan wa-lā ākhiran wa-fīhim [wa-fīhā] batr wa-tamzīq min ṭūl al-zamān ʻalayhim [ʻlayhā]. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Wa-ākhir daʻwānā an al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon of Kitāb Ādāb al-nikāḥ: "This is what we found and recorded from some leaves, but we did not find to them neither a beginning nor an end. There were in them gaps and tearing due to the passage of time. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them peace. We conclude with: Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe."

Colophon of Miscellaneous Ḥadīths and advices: "Wa-hādhā mā wajadnāhu muqayyadan fa-qayyadnāh wa-lillāh katabnāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran athīran ilá yawm al-dīn wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. ʻAlá [yad] ʻabdihi Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥassānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu. Āmīn ʻĀm 1181."

Translation of Miscellaneous Ḥadīths and advices: "This is what we found written and we recorded. We copied it for the sake of God. May God pray on our Master and Lord Muḥammad and on his family and companions and grant them abundant and pleasant peace until Judgement Day. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. Copied by His slave Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥassānī, may God forgive him. Amen. The year 1181 Hijrī [1767 or 1768]."

Colophon of Tanwīr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash: "Kamula bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ḥusn ʻawnih Kitāb Tanwīr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj al-Jawzī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanhu. Āmīn. Wa-al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-mudhnib ʻubayd Allāh wa-aqall al-ʻabīd Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥassānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, yawm al-Jumʻah ākhir )26) maḍat min Dhī al-Ḥijjah ʻām 1181 [14 May, 1768]."

Translation of the colophon of Tanwīr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash: "The book of Tanwīr al-ghabash fī faḍl al-Sūdān wa-al-Ḥabash by al-Shaykh al-Faqīh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj al-Jawzī (May the exalted God have mercy upon him and be pleased with him. Amen) is completed by the praise of God and His abundant help. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe. Copied by the guilty slave, the little slave of God and the least among the slaves, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥassānī, may God forgive him, on Friday, the end of the 26th of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 1181 [14 May, 1768]."

Colophon of Bāb al-ʻAql ḥujjat Allāh ʻalá khalqih. Colophon missinng. Ends with: "... wa-lā yuṣghī al-muʼmin al-ʻāqil li-khurāfat man yaqūlu al-maʻbūdāt al-bāṭilāt maʻa Allāh ka-al-aṣnām wa-al-Shams wa-al-Qamar hiya al-manfīyah li-annahā layst bi-ālihah li-ḥudūthihā wa-iftiqārihā wa-lā muthbitah li-wujūdihā wa-thubūtihā. Qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Inna alladhīna tadʻūna min dūn Allāh ʻibādun amthālukum' wa-lam yaqul ālihah mithlī, wa-shattāna mā bayna mā istaghraqatʹhu al-ʻubūdīyah wa-bayna mā wajabat la-hu al-ulūhīyah. H. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman."

Colophon of Questions and answers on Islamic law: "Kutiba hādhā min baʻḍ al-awrāq waqafa ʻalayhim [ʻalayhā] Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tāghazūtī wa-ʻallama ʻalayhim [ʻalayhā] bi-ʻalāmatihi. Wa-naqalahā ʻabd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥassānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of Questions and answers on Islamic law: "This was copied from some leaflets found by Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Tāghazūtī which he marked by his own handwriting. Copied by the slave of God Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ḥassānī, may God forgive him. Amen."

Colophon of An anecdote regarding the encounter of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀbid with al-Khaḍir and Ilyās: "Manqūl min kitāb al-Tādilī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātihi. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon of An anecdote regarding the encounter of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-ʻĀbid with al-Khaḍir and Ilyās: "Copied from the book of al-Tādilī, may God be pleased with him and benefit us with his blessings. Amen."

Colophon of Excerpts from Tuḥfat al-albāb fī ʻajāʼib al-buldān. Colophon missing. Ends with: "... Fa-lā taʻjaban yā hādhā mimmā raʼaytahu // fa-kullu umūr al-dunyā hādhā maṣīruhā. H."

Colophon of Excerpts from Ḥayāt al-ḥayawān al-kubrá. Colophon missing. Ends abruptly with: Yanāmu bi-iḥdá muqlatayhi wa-yattaqī // bi-ukhrá al-aʻādī fa-huwa yaqẓānu nāʼimu. Wa-ghayruhu ..."

title: 880-02 Tāj al-tarājim fī ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / al-Qāsim ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Quṭlūbughā.

notes.text: Title from title page.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Translation of the colophon: "This blessed book is completed by the praise of God, may He be exalted and glorified. May prayer be upon His Messenger, the Illiterate Prophet, and upon his family and all his companions. Copied by the poorest and the neediest to his Lord on the Day of Judgement, the day when livers thirst, the poor Zakarīyā ibn Ṣāliḥ ibn Yaḥyá al-Dayrī al-Ḥanafī al-ʻAbsī al-Khālidī, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims. Incipit of Maʻrifat al-Islām wa-al-īmān: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad Sayyid al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ajall al-zāhid Aḥmad ibn al-Islām: Bāb Maʻrifat al-Islām wa-al-īmān, wa-al-aṣl fīhi mā ruwiya ʻan ʻAbd Allāh ibn ʻUmar, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, annahu qāl: Kāna al-julūs ʻinda Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam idhā [idh] ḥaḍara shakhṣ bi-aḥsan bizzah wa-ajmal ṣūrah wa-jalasa ʻinda Rasūl Allāh ..."

Incipit of Shurūṭ al-bāṭinah fī aʻmāl al-ṣalāh: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-ammā Shurūṭ al-bāṭinah fī aʻmāl al-ṣalāh sittah, aḥaduhā ḥuḍūr al-qalb fī jamīʻ al-ṣalāh, wa-thānīhā al-tafahhum bi-maʻná al-qirāʼah kullihā li-anna man lā yafhamu maʻnāhā lā yaḥṣalu riḍāʼ al-Raḥmān ..."

Incipit of al-Sharʻ fī al-ṣalāh: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Iʻlam anna al-Sharʻ fī al-ṣalāt bi-al-ʻilm, wa-huwa an yaʻlama amrun [amran] min awāmir Allāh taʻālá wa-yaʻlamahā ka-mā umira bi-hi. Awwal mā yafʻalu minhā al-qiyām wa-al-nīyah, thumma al-takbīr, thumma al-tawajjuh, thumma al-taʻawwudh, thumma al-tasmiyah, thumma al-qirāʼah, thumma al-rukūʻ, thumma al-iʻtidāl, thumma al-sujūd al-awwal ..."

Incipit of Sufi mystical tract on how to know God and be one with Him: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nawwara qulūb al-ʻārifīn bi-al-tawḥīd wa-al-ʻirfān wa-shaqqa [wa-shafá] ʻuyūb al-muwaḥḥidīn bi-al-ṭāʻāt wa-tark al-ʻiṣyān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá man bi-hi hadá Allāh ahl al-Islām wa-al-īmān Muḥammad Sayyid al-khalq min al-ins wa-al-jinn ..."

Incipit of Sharṭ al-ṣalāh: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ammā arkān [al-ṣalāh] fa-tisʻat ʻashar ruknan. al-Awwal al-nīyah, wa-shurūṭuhā sittah. al-Awwal an yaqṣuda al-ṣalāh, wa-al-thānī an yuʻayyina al-ṣalāh ka-al-ẓuhr wa-al-ʻaṣr wa-al-Jumaʻah wa-ghayrihin ..."

Incipit of Nūr al-muṣallī: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī nawwara wujūdahu bi-hādhā al-Kitāb wa-[alqá?] faraḥ qulūbuhu bi-sabab qirāʼat al-Kitāb, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā al-kitāb al-ismuhu Nūr al-muṣallī min kalām al-Shaykh Abī Bakr, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu al-ʻazīz. Wa-fī hādhā al-kitāb khamsat abwab [abwāb]. al-Bāb al-awwal fī tartīb al-wālḍūʼ [al-wuḍūʼ]. al-Bāb al-thānī fī tartīb ghasl al-janābah. al-Bāb al-thālith fī tartīb afʻāl al-ṣalāh ..."

Incipit of Risālah tataʻallaqu bi-al-tajwīd: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn wa-al-ʻāqibah lil-muttaqīn wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi Risālah yataʻallaqu [tataʻallaqu] bi-al-tajwīd. Faṣl fī al-iẓhār. Iʻlam anna al-nūn al-sākinah wa-al-tanwīn idhā laqiyā ḥurūf al-ḥalq yuẓharān ..."

title: 880-02 Ijāzah min ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Fazmawī ilá tilmīdhihi al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn ʻAlī al-Bāzārjīfī : manuscript / ʻAlī Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī al-Istānbūlī.

Issued by me, I, the poor to the affluent God, Riḍā ibn Yūnus al-Jānakī al-Fātsawī mawlidan wa-al-Istānbūlī mawṭinan, dated 5 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 1321 of the Hijrah [23 January, 1904]. Fī al-yawm al-rābiʻ min Jumādá al-Ākhirah, li-sanat ithnay ʻashrah wa-thalāthimiʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah [hijrat] man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf." [Seal of] ʻUthmān Nūrī.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī jaʻala al-ʻibādah maftaḥ al-saʻādah wa-maṭmaḥ al-siyādah wa-malmaḥ al-ḥusná wa-al-ziyādah, wa-jaʻala al-ṣalāh ʻamūd qiyāmihā wa-dhurwat sanāmihā wa-ʻumdat aḥkāmihā, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá afḍal khalqihi Sayyidinā Muḥammad alladhī juʻilat fī al-ṣalāh qurrat ʻaynihi, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi alladhīna fāzū min maʻdin al-dīn bi-lujaynih wa-ʻaynih. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-ghanī Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad ibn Ibrāhīm al-Ḥalabī: Qad sharaḥtu kitāb Munyat al-muṣallī sharḥan wa-sammaytuhu bi-Ghunyat al-mutamallī, wa-lākin lammā raʼaytu fīhi baʻḍ al-iṭālah allatī rubbamā awjabat lil-mubtadīn wa-al-qāṣirīn al-malālah, fa-aḥbabtu an akhtaṣir min farāʼid dalāʼilihi wa-azīd fī fawāʼid masāʼilihi tasʹhīlan lil-ṭālibīn wa-tanwīran lil-rāghibīn ..."

M."
