Includes an elaborate index of contents: Folios 237a-237b (pages 473-474).

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Ikhtilāf al-aʼimmah, al-musammá, Raḥmat al-ummah, taʼlīf al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Qurashī al-ʻUthmānī Qāḍī Ṣafad al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-ruḍwānih. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn."

On the margin of page 472: "... Ṭālaʻa fī hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf al-Sibāhī bi-Dimashq al-maḥrūsah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-man daʻá la-hu bi-al-maghfirah. Āmīn. Fī tāsiʻ wa-ʻshrīn shahr al-Ḥijjah sanat arbaʻ wa-ʻishrīn [year not mentioned]."

Author's colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu, raḥimahu Allāh raḥmatan wāsiʻah wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakatihi wa-ʻilmih, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Qurashī al-ʻUthmānī, Qāḍī Ṣafad al-Shāfiʻī: Faraghtu min taʼlīf hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak fī laylah yusfiru ṣabāḥuhā ʻan nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, ḥādī ʻashar Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-ḥarām, sanata thamānīn wa-sabʻimiʼah bi-rabḍ Ṣafad, ḥamāhā Allāh taʻālá."

Translation of the author's colophon: "The author (Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Ḥusayn al-Qurashī al-ʻUthmānī, the Chief Judge of Ṣafad), may God have abundant mercy upon him, and may He benefit us by his blessing and knowledge, said: I finished writing this blessed book on Tuesday morning, 11 Dhū al-Qaʻdah, 780 Hijrī [9 March, 1379], in the city of Ṣafad, may God protect it."

Copyist colophon: "Qāla kātibuhu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-dhanb wa-al-taqṣīr, al-rājī ʻafwa rabbihi al-qadīr, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Jafrī [or al-Jaʻbarī (?)] baladan, al-Hāshimī nasaban: Katabtuhu min nuskhah waqaʻat bi-yadī bi-madīnat Salānīk min arḍ al-Rūm, maktūb fīhā: Qāla kātib hādhihi al-nuskhah bi-yadihi al-fāniyah li-nafsih wa-liman shāʼa Allāh min baʻdih, Jaʻfar ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Jaʻfar ibn Sulaymān al-Sanhūrī al-muqrī al-Azʹharī nazīl al-Qāhirah al-maḥrūsah, fī shahr Allāh al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat khams wa-khamsīn wa-thamānimiʼah. Wa-faraghtu min kitābatihi yawm al-Sabt baʻda al-ẓuhr bi-madīnat Salānīk al-madhkūrah fī thānī ʻashar min shahr Ramaḍān min shuhūr sanat thalāth wa-tisʻmiʼah. Allāhumma ighfir lanā wa-li-wālidaynā wa-li-mashāyikhinā wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn, yā Rabba al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the copyist colophon: "The copyist ... Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Jafrī [or al-Jaʻbarī (?)] baladan, al-Hāshimī nasaban, said: I copied this copy from a copy I saw in the city of Salānīk ... in which was written: The copyist of this book, Jaʻfar ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Jaʻfar ibn Sulaymān al-Sanhūrī al-muqrī al-Azʹharī, copied it for himself ... in Muḥarram, 855 [February/March, 1451]. The present copy was completed on Saturday afternoon, in the afore mentioned city of Salānīk on 12 Ramaḍān, 903 Hijrī [13 May, 1498] ..."

title: [Shipping receipt for bales of cottonwool shipped board the Adolphus].

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Completed in pen and black ink.

Transcription, with manuscript text noted in square brackets: "Shipped, by the Grace of God, in good Order and condition by [G. Armistead] in upon the good ship called the [Adolphus] whereof is Master, under God, for this present voyage, [Johann Popp] and now riding at Anchor in the [Roads of Heligoland] and by God's Grace, bound for [Gothenburg or any other port or ports in the Baltic Lay] [T & R fifty bales cottonwool. T & R three bales cottonwool] being marked and numbered as in the margin, and are to be delivered in the like order and condition at the aforesaid Port of [Gothenburg or other] (The Act of God, the King's Enemies, Fire, and all other and every then dangers and accidents of the seas, and of navigation, of whatever nature and kind soever excepted) unto [Order] or to [my] assigns, he or they paying freight for the said goods [as of agreement] with Primage and average accustomed. In witness whereof he Master or Purser of the ship [both] affirmed to [2] bills of lading, all of this tenor and date ; the one of which [2] bills being accomplished, the other [1] to stand void. And so God send the good ship to her desired Port in safety. Amen. Dated in [Heligoland 11th October 1810] [Johann Popp]

title: 880-03 Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī hadānā lil-īmān wa-al-Islām, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī istanqadhanā min ʻibādat al-awthān wa-al-aṣnām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah al-kirām ..."
Secundo folio: wa-aṣḥābihi al-nujabāʼ al-bararah.
11.5 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 10; 13 lines per page.
Binding: In crushed brown leather binding with flap; both covers and flap are tooled in gold color.

In elegant naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords and markings in red; text completely vocalized; pages are ruled in two blue lines; all sentences are separated with rosettes in gold, or red, or blue and black; the opening two pages are highly illuminated in gold, brown, blue, and other colors; head and tail pieces illuminated in gold, blue, red, and other colors on folios 15b, 16a, 18b, 19a, 38b, 45b, 59b, 63a, 76a, 77a, 83b, 88b, 101a, 104a, 104b, 105a, 108b, 109a; there are decorations in similar colors on folios 9a, 2b, 13a, 32b, 55b, 59b, 64b, 68b, 97b, 107b; some of the names of the Prophet Muḥammad are written in gold circles and all are separated by small or large rosettes in blue and gold; folios 16b and 17a contain two full-page miniatures, one of them representing the Kaʻbah in Mecca, the other the tomb of the Prophet Muḥammad in the Medina Mosque.
On folio 2a: "... wa-sammaytuhu bi-Kitāb Dalāʼil al-khayrāt wa-shawāriq al-anwār fī dhikr al-ṣalāh ʻalá al-Nabī al-mukhtār."

On the margins of folios 108a-109b, an "Ijāzah," a certificate in which a teacher (name not mentioned) authorizes his student (name not mentioned) to transmit and teach the book to others. The chain of transmitters ends with the author of the book al-Jazūlī himself: "... ʻan al-muʼallif Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Sulaymān al-Jazūlī al-Maghribī al-Shādhilī, quddisa sirruhu al-ʻālĭ."
Colophon: Colophon missing. Ends with: "... Hādhā dhullunā ẓāhir bayna yadayk wa-ḥālunā lā yakhfá ʻalayk, amartanā fa-taraknā wa-nahaytanā ..."

title: Treatises on God's unity and other Islamic doctrinal issues : manuscript.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Risālah fī al-tawḥīd: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-mimmā kataba Abū Muḥammad Sayyidī ʻAbd Allāh al-Habṭī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanhu, li-man yaqifu ʻalayhi munabbihan fīhi ʻalá sharḥ al-ʻaqāʼid al-Islāmīyah wa-al-īmānīyah wa-ghayrihā min al-adhkār al-sharʻīyah, wa-al-ḥaḍḍ bal wa-al-taḥrīḍ ʻalá al-taʻlīm wa-al-ʻilm wa-al-ʻamal bi-hi, wa-hādhā naṣṣuhu: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī qāla fī Kitābihi alladhī unzila bi-hi Jibrīl al-amīn min ʻind Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-makīn ..."
Secundo folio of Risālah fī al-tawḥīd: ilá al-farsh wa-kadhālika.
Incipit of Short poem on "ḥalāl": al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Wa-in tarid maʻrifat al-ḥalāli // khudh mā naẓamnāhu wa-lā tubāli.

Incipit of On the existence of God: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām Abū ʻAmr wa-ʻUthmān ibn ʻAbd Allāh al-Salālijī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanhu wa-razaqanā Allāh: Inna al-ʻālam ʻibārah ʻan kull mawjūd siwá Allāh wa-siwá ṣifat dhātihi. Thumma al-ʻālam ʻalá qismayn, jawāhir wa-aʻrāḍ. Fa-al-jawhar huwa al-mutaḥayyiz wa-al-ʻaraḍ huwa al-maʻná al-qāʼim bi-al-jawhar. Faṣl. Wa-al-dalīl ʻalá thubūt al-jawhar tanāhī al-ajsām. Bal al-ajsām fī inqisāmihā ilá aḥad yastaḥīl inqisāmuh, fa-dhālika huwa al-jawhar li-anna al-qismah hiya al-iftirāq wa-al-shayʼ al-wāḥid lā yufāriqu nafsah ..."
Secundo folio of On the existence of God: wa-intifāʼuhā baʻda wujūdihā.

Incipit of Miscellaneous doctrinal issues: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Ṣifat Allāh tabāraka wa-taʻālá tanqasimu ilá arbaʻat aqsām, wa-qism al-maʻānī ilá arbaʻat aqsām. Qism lā yataʻallaqu wa-huwa al-ḥayāt [al-ḥayāh], wa-qism yataʻallaqu bi-al-mumkināt wa-huwa faqaṭ dūna al-wājibāt wa-al-mustaḥīlāt wa-huwa al-qidrah wa-al-irādah ..."

Incipit of On the significance of "Lā ilāha illā Allāh": "al-Ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-karīm wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh al-zāhid Sayyidī ʻAbd Allāh al-Habṭī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātih. Āmīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull niʻmah anʻama bi-hā ʻalá jamīʻ al-anām wa-lā niʻmah ajall wa-aʻẓam min niʻam al-Islām, wa-ʻalá Mawlānā Muḥammad al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-dhurrīyatihi al-kirām wa-ʻalá aʼimmat al-ummah maṣābīḥ al-ẓalām. Wa-baʻd, fa-al-tawḥīd rāʼs al-dīn wa-mūjib ruḍwān Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ..."
Secundo folio of On the significance of "Lā ilāha illā Allāh": fa-man fahimahā fa-li-yaḥmad.

Incipit of Questions and answers about miscellaneous legal and doctrinal issues: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Sayyidī, raḍiya Allāh ʻankum wa-arḍākum. Jawābukum lillāh wa-li-Rasūlihi ʻan masʼalat rajul yaqbiḍu ʻalá al-zayt wa-al-shamʻ fī ʻilm al-ghayb, fa-ʻinda wafāt al-ajal lam yaqbiḍ ghallat al-zayt wa-lā ghallat al-shamʻ, mādhā yalḥaqu rabb al-māl ..."
Secundo folio of Questions and answers about miscellaneous legal and doctrinal issues: al-dakhl maʻahā fī dhālik.

Incipit of Questions on doctrinal issues: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Suʼila al-Imām shaykh shuyūkhinā Sayyidī al-ʻArabī al-Fāsī, raḥimahu Allāh ʻamman yaqūlu fī ḥaqq al-malāʼikah, ʻalayhim al-salām, innahum dhukūr wa-hal waṣfuhum bi-al-dhukūrīyah aw al-unūthah naqṣ, wa-hal hum ajrām shaffāfah nūrānīyah, fa-ajāb ..."
Secundo folio of Questions on doctrinal issues: wa-maʻa dhālika qad jāʼa.

Incipit of Questions on Islamic law: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Suʼila al-ʻAllāmah Sayyidī al-Ḥasan ibn Masʻūd al-Yūsī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-raḍiya ʻanh, ʻan "ṭābah", hal hiy ḥarām, aw ḥalāl, aw makrūhah, fa-ajāba bi-mā naṣṣuhu: al-Jawāb, wa-Allāh al-muwāfiq lil-ṣawāb, hādhihi al-ʻushbah ḥādithah fī al-bilād al-Maghribīyah, fa-lam yūjad ʻalayhā naṣṣ mimman taqaddama min al-fuqahāʼ ..."
Secundo folio of Questions on Islamic law: al-nafs wa-raʼāhā fa-lammā.

Incipit of Legal questions and answers, titled "Taqyīd masāʼil": "Taqyīd masāʼil. al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Sayyidī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻankum wa-arḍākum wa-mattaʻa al-Muslimīn bi-ṭūl ḥayātikum. Jawābukum al-shāfī al-mubārak al-kāfī lillāh wa-li-Rasūlihi min masāʼil majmūʻah. Fa-saʼala wāḥidun: Karāhat al-ghasl min dūn istitār, hal dhālika al-istitār min nafsihi, aw min al-ghayr ..."
Secundo folio of Legal questions and answers, titled "Taqyīd masāʼil": dirhamān wa-al-maqṣūd wāḥid.
13.5 x 18.7 cm; written surface: varies; lines per page vary.
Binding: In modern European dark blue leather with front cover embossed with a central medallion.
In fair Maghribī script (in different hands), in black ink on white paper, with headings, keywords and markings in red or green, some worm holes with minor loss of text.
The pages of this manuscript are numbered in Arabic numerals: 111-212, which may mean that this manuscript was extracted from another codex.

Risālah fī al-tawḥīd ends with: "... wa-lā taḥsabanna Allāh ghāfilan ʻammā yaʻmalu al-ẓālimūn. Ilá Allāh marjiʻukum fa-yunbiʼukum bi-mā kuntum taʻmalūn. Subḥāna Rabbika Rabbi al-ʻIzzati ʻammā yaṣifūn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, huwa ḥasbunā wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
Short poem on "ḥalāl" ends with: Aw dhahaba ṭullābuhu fī al-ḥalāli // ihdinā yā Rabbu ilá al-ḥalāli. Intahá.

On the existence of God ends with: "... ʻaqīdat Ahl al-Sunnah talaqqāhā al-khalaf ʻan al-salaf, wa-Allāh al-mustaʻān lil-mutamassik bi-hā wa-al-qiyām bi-riʻāyat ḥuqūqihā wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻalī al-ʻaẓīm, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-karīm wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Miscellaneous doctrinal issues ends with: "... man laqiya akhāhu wa-sallama ʻalayhi faqad afshá al-salām, wa-man aṭʻama ahlahu wa-ʻiyālahu ḥattá yushbiʻahum faqad aṭʻama al-ṭaʻām, wa-man ṣāma Ramaḍān wa-min kull shahr thalāthat ayyām fa-qad ṣāma al-ṣiyām, wa-man ṣallá al-ʻishāʼ al-ākhirah fī jamāʻah fa-qad ṣallá wa-al-nās niyām niyām al-Yahūd wa-al-Naṣārá [... ...] darajātuhā, fa-fī al-Tirmidhī al-Jannah miʼat darajah, kull darajah minhā mā bayna al-masāʼ wa-al-ākhar."

On the significance of "Lā ilāha illā Allāh" ends with: "... wa-al-aṣnām laysat bi-ālihah li-annahā ḥādithah wa-laysat bi-manfīyah li-anna al-nafī maʻnāh al-ʻadam wa-al-talāshī wa-al-faqd. Wa-al-aṣnām laysat bi-maʻdūmah wa-lā mutalāshiyah wa-lā mafqūdah bal hiya thābitah mawjūdah, wa-kayfa yantafī man huwa mawjūd, bal yalzamu ʻlayhi al-kadhib, wa-hādhā lā yuʻqal, fa-ifham. Wa-Allāh al-muwāfiq lil-ṣawāb."

Questions and answers about miscellaneous legal and doctrinal issues ends with: "... al-jawāb lil-Faqīh al-ḥāfiẓ al-ḥujjah al-qāḍī al-ʻādil al-muftī al-qudwah Sayyidī Ibrāhīm al-Jalālī, ḥafiẓahu Allāh wa-lā mazīd ʻalá mā qālahu wa-katabahu, wa-kafá bi-hi ḥujjatan, wa-jazāhu Allāh taʻālá khayran wa-ajzá al-ʻulamāʼ al-nāṣiḥīn al-ḥāfiẓīn li-sharīʻat nabīyihim, al-muḥāfiẓīn ʻalá dhurrīyatih wa-al-ṣāʼinīn la-hā mimmā yastaysiru jānibahā al-ẓāhir. Wa-salāmun ʻalá man yaqifu ʻlayhi. Wa-kutiba min khaṭṭ man naqala min khaṭṭ Sayyidī Muḥammad al-ʻArabī, laṭfa Allāh bi-al-jamīʻ, innahu mujīb qarīb. Intahá al-ḥājah minhu."

Questions on doctrinal issues ends with: "... qāla taʻālá fī qiṣṣat Ibrāhīm ʻalayhi al-salām: Inna Allāh yaʼtī bi-al-Shams min al-mashriq wa-yaʼtī bi-hā min al-maghrib, fa-buhita alladhī kafar. Wa-qad kāna [...] Ibrāhīm ʻalayhi al-salām. Fa-man yaʻtaqidu al-nujūm wa-al-aflāk, wa-innamā hādhā min maqālāt ..."
Questions on Islamic law ends with: "... fa-lā ḥanatha ʻalayh. Intahá. Min al-khiṭāb bi-ʻaynihi ʻalá mukhtaṣar Khalīl, raḥimahu Allāh. Intahá."
Legal questions and answers, titled "Taqyīd masāʼil" ends with: "Ammā al-ḥalīb bi-al-ḍarīb Biʻhu wa-lā // tabiʻi al-ziyādah fī [...] fa-yamtaniʻā."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ-i bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb : manuscript / ʻAbd al-ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn al-Birjandī.

notes.text: Title of Sharḥ-i bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Sharḥ-i bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb: "Sharḥ-i bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb. Muḥaqqiq mudaqqiq Mullā ʻAbd al-ʻĀlī Parjadī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Fātiḥat-i khiṭāb dar sih bāb va khātimat-i maqāl dar hamah-i ḥāl-i sipās ... Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá rabbihi al-hādī ʻAbd al-ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-Barjandī, sharaḥa Allāh ṣadrahu wa-atamma ʻalá samāʼ al-saʻādah badrahu ... bi-muṭālaʻat Kitāb Bīst bāb dar maʻrifat-i aʻmāl-i asṭurlāb ... sulṭān al-ḥukamā al-mutaʼallihīn, mukammil ʻulūm al-awwalīn, makhzan asrār al-ḥikam wa-al-kamāl min maṭliʻ al-anwār al-mayāmīn wa-al-saʻādāt Khawājah Naṣīr al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Dīn Muḥammad al-Ṭūsī ṭayyaba Allāh mashhadah ..."
Secundo folio of Sharḥ bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb: kih raqm-i zadah-i kalk.

Incipit of the Mathematical "lughz": "Hādhā lughz min al-Shaykh Bahāʼ al-Dīn, ʻalayhi al-raḥmah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Akhbirūnī ʻan ism kitābin aqalluhu min al-ḥurūf al-nūrānīyah wa-aktharuhu min ḥurūf al-zubālīyah, wa-aḥad niṣfayhi yukmilu al-rajul, wa-bi-al-niṣf al-ākhar takmulu al-shahādah ..."
Secundo folio of the Mathematical "lughz": al-Shams ʻan al-ufuq.
16.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 18-19 lines per page.
Binding: In red leather binding, some tooling to the covers.
In small naskh taʻlīq script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; numerous notes on the margins; numerous astronomical and geometrical diagrams; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Short paragraphs about: Eclipse of the Sun and the Moon (in Arabic); Talismans (in Arabic); Simple way to know the hour of the day (in Arabic); Time spent by "Ahl al-Kahf" "the Seven Sleepers" (in Persian); Mathematical calculations on the beginning of the Hijrī year (in Persian); Quotation from a certain musician "Mūsīqī Mīrzā Muḥammad ʻAlī" (could not be identified) about arithmetic and astronomy (in Persian).
On the margin of folio 78b: "... fa-yaqūlu aḥwaj al-khalq ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-ghanī Muḥammad al-mushtahir bi-Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī, ʻufiya ʻanhu ..."
On folios 80a-80b: Some mathematical and geometrical notes and criticism of "al-Muḥaqqiq al-Dawwānī" (probably Muḥammad ibn Asʻad al-Dawwānī, 1426 or 1427-1512 or 1513), in Persian.

Colophon of Sharḥ-i bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb: "al-Ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi dāyiman mutawātiran. Qad faraghtu min taswīd hādhihi al-awrāq fī Dār al-Khilāfah al-Ṭahrān, fī al-Madrasah al-Nāṣirīyah, al-laylah al-Thulāthāʼ min Ramaḍān, fī sanat 1307 Hijrīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā al-salām."

Translation of the colophon of Sharḥ-i bīst bāb-i asṭurlāb: "Praise be to God in the beginning and in the end. Prayer and peace be upon His messenger, continuously and repeatedly. I finished copying these leaflets at the Abode of the Caliphate, Tehran, at al-Madrasah al-Nāṣirīyah, on Tuesday night, 3 Ramaḍān, 1307 [1890] of the Hijrah [of the Prophet Muḥammad], may peace be upon Him."

Colophon of the Mathematical "lughz": "... Wa-linaqtaṣir ʻalá hādhā al-qadr min al-iṭnāb fī awṣāf dhālika al-kitāb, wa-al-ʻāqil yakfīhi al-ishārah, wa-al-jāhil lā yatanabbah bi-alf ʻibārah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon of the Mathematical "lughz": "... Let us limit ourselves to this much of verbosity in the description of that book, for the wise understands from a hint, but the ignorant cannot be alerted even with a thousand statements. Praise be to God in the beginning and in the end. It is completed."

title: 880-02 Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn wa-multaqá al-nayyirayn : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn al-Sāʻātī.

notes.text: Title from colophon (folio 254b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh jāʻil al-ʻulamāʼ anjuman lil-ihtidāʼ zāhirah, wa-aʻlāman lil-iqtidāʼ ẓāhirah, wa-ḥujjah ʻalá al-ḥaqq qāṭiʻah, wa-maḥajjah ilá al-ṣidq shāriʻah ... Ammā, baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb yaṣghuru lil-ḥāfiẓ ḥajmuhu wa-yaghzuru lil-ḍābiṭ ʻilmuhu ... yaḥwī Mukhtaṣar al-Shaykh Abī al-Ḥasan al-Qudūrī wa-Manẓūmat al-Shaykh Abī Ḥafṣ al-Nasafī ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-raḥmah ʻalá man tabiʻahum.
18.5 x 27.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5; 9 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding which is in poor condition; front cover tooled with geometrical designs; back cover embossed with central medallion.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; numerous notes and inserts; text fully vocalized; catchwords.
Folio 1a contains an index of contents and some legal opinions of Islamic law on different issues, written in a different hand.

On the back of the preliminary leaf an ownership statement: "Ṣāḥib hādhihi al-kitāb Ḥamzah al-Ḥamdī Aqsarāʼī min sulālat Shaykh Jamāl al-Dīn Aqsarāʼī [Probably: Aqsarāʼī, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, active 14th century]"
On folio 254b an ownership statement: "Ṣāḥib hādhihi al-kitāb al-Sayyid al-Shaykh Ḥamzah al-Ḥamdī Aqsarāʼī, maʼdhūnan bi-al-iftāʼ. 4 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 80."

Colophon: "Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Hādhā ākhir Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn wa-multaqá al-nayyirayn, wa-qad ataytu bi-hi ʻalá mā assastuhu min tilka al-qawāʻid, wa-ijtahadtu fī al-tawfīq bayna al-masāʼil al-shawārid, wa-lam atruk min al-kitābayn illā masāʼil yasīrah ṭaraḥtuhā ʻamdan, aw masāʼil ukhar ghayyartu ṣīghatahā ʻamdan, aw zidtu fīhā qaydan īthāran lil-aṣaḥḥ min al-madhāhib wa-al-aqwá, wa-taḥarriyan lil-iḥtiyāṭ fī al-fatwá. Wa-anā multamis mimman yanquluhu an lā yuhmila wājib al-iʻrāb, fa-inna al-mutashābih fīhi jamm, wa-khuṣūṣan fī jināsātihi al-khaṭṭīyah, fa-inna al-iḥtiyāṭ fīhā ḥatm. Wa-Allāh huwa al-mashkūr ʻalá ifāḍat niʻamihi wa-al-masʼūl khātimat al-saʻādah bi-faḍlihi wa-karamih. Tammat. Tārīkh sanat 847."

Translation of the colophon: "The author, may God have mercy upon him, said: This is the end of Majmaʻ al-baḥrayn wa-multaqá al-nayyirayn. I wrote it according to the rules I established. I endeavored to bring into harmony the diverse quoted issues. I did not leave out of the two books except a few issues which I deliberately discarded, or some issues whose structure I deliberately changed, or to which I added a statement to make them compatible with the soundest and most correct opinions, so that one can be prudent in issuing a fatwá [legal opinion]. I request from those who make copies of the book not to neglect the case-endings of the text because of the many similarities in meanings, especially in the handwritten homonyms, to which caution is definitely recommended. God is to be thanked for His abundant blessings. He is the giver of bliss by His favor and generosity. It is completed. Dated in the year 847 [1443 or 1444]."

title: Writings on Islamic literature : manuscript.

Incipit of Short prayer for the new Islamic year: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh muqaddir al-shuhūr wa-al-aʻwām wa-mujaddid al-duhūr wa-al-ayyām alladhī iftataḥa al-ʻām bi-al-shahr al-ḥarām. Bi-hi khalaq al-samāwāt wa-al-arḍ wa-mā baynahumā fī sittat ayyām thumma istawá ʻalá al-ʻarash munfaridan bi-al-baqāʼ wa-al-dawām ..."
Secundo folio of Short prayer for the new Islamic year: la-hu fīhā bi-al-ghudū.

Incipit of Mukhtaṣar Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh rāfiʻ aʻlām al-sharīʻah al-gharrāʼ jāʻiluhā shajaratan aṣluhā thābit fī al-arḍ wa-farʻuhā fī al-samāʼ ..."
Secundo folio of Mukhtaṣar Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah: jidduhu razaqahu Allāh.

Incipit of Farāʼid al-fawāʼid li-taḥqīq maʻānī al-istiʻārah wa-aqsāmihā: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu li-wāhib al-ʻaṭīyah, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr al-barīyah wa-ʻalá ālihi dhawī al-nufūs al-zakīyah. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna maʻānī al-istiʻārah wa-mā yataʻallaqu bi-hā qad dhikrat fī al-kutub mufaṣṣalah ḥasīrat al-ḍabṭ fa-aradtu dhikrahā mujmalatan maḍbūtatan ʻalá wajh naṭaqa bi-hi kutub al-mutaqaddimīn wa-dalla ʻlayhi zabr al-mutaʼkhkhirīn, fanaẓamtu Farāʼid al-fawāʼid li-taḥqīq maʻānī al-istiʻārah wa-aqsāmihā wa-qarāʼinihā fī thalāthat ʻuqūd ..."
Secundo folio of Farāʼid al-fawāʼid li-taḥqīq maʻānī al-istiʻārah wa-aqsāmihā: bi-mutaʻalliqi maʻná al-ḥarf.

Incipit of Gloss on a commentary on al-Risālah al-Samarqandīyh: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-muftaqir ilá alṭāf rabbihi khafīyah [al-khafīyah] ʻIṣām al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad [ibn] Ibrāhīm, ḥaffahumā [Allāh] bi-maghfirah [...]: Aḥsan mā yuzādu bi-hi niʻam [al-niʻam] al-wafīyah wa-tudfaʻu bi-hi al-balīyah fī al-bukrah wa-al-ʻashīyah, al-ḥamdu lillāh al-wāhib al-ʻaṭīyah ..."
Secundo folio of Gloss on a commentary on al-Risālah al-Samarqandīyh: al-ūlá ammā baʻd.

Incipit of Tarikat al-mayyit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn ḥamda al-shākirīn wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr al-barīyah Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭayyibīn. [Qāla] Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Taʻallamū al-farāʼiḍ wa-ʻallimūhā al-nās, fa-innahā niṣf al-ʻilm. ʻIlman anna raḥmat Allāh tataʻallaqu bi-Tarikat al-mayyit, ḥuqūq arbaʻah murattabah, al-awwal yabdaʼu bi-takfīnih wa-tajhīzih min ghayr tabdhīr wa-lā taqtīr ..."
Secundo folio of Tarikat al-mayyit: lahum sihām muqaddarah.

Incipit of al-Masāʼil allatī tukassaru ʻalá ṭāʼifah wāḥidah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Masāʼil allatī tukassaru ʻalá ṭāʼifah wāḥidah. Thalāth zawjāt wa-arbaʻ banāt wa-jaddatān wa-sittat aʻmām. 144. Imaraʼah wa-thamānī banāt wa-arbaʻ jaddāt wa-sittat akhawāt li-ab. 144 ..."
Secundo folio of al-Masāʼil allatī tukassaru ʻalá ṭāʼifah wāḥidah: ān mablagh rā ba-manzilah-ʼi.

Incipit of Treatise on the burden of proof for a claimant: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Laka al-ḥamdu wa-al-minnah, wa-ʻalá Nabīyika al-ṣalāh wa-al-taḥīyah. Idhā qulta bi-kalām, in kunta nāqilan fa-yuṭlabu minka al-ṣiḥḥah wa-muddaʻiyan fa-al-dalīl, wa-lā yumnaʻu al-naql wa-al-muddaʻá illā majāzan. Wa-al-manʻ ṭalab al-dalīl ʻalá muqaddimah ..."

Incipit of Treatise on the structure of the Arabic language: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Kalimah lafẓ wuḍiʻa li-maʻná mufrad, hiya ism wa-fiʻl wa-ḥarf, li-annahā immā an tadulla ʻalá maʻná fī nafsihā aw lā ..."
Secundo folio of Treatise on the structure of the Arabic language: ʻalam al-fāʻilīyah wa-al-naṣb.

Incipit of Treatise on the case endings in the Arabic language: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Marfūʻāt huwa [hiya] mā ishtamala ʻalá ʻalam al-fāʻilīyah, fa-minhu al-fāʻil wa-huwa mā usnida ilayhi al-fiʻl aw shibhuhu wa-quddima ʻalayhi ʻalá jihat qiyāmihi mithl qāma Zayd wa-Zayd qāʼimun abūhu wa-al-aṣl an yaliya al-fiʻl, fa-lidhālika jāza ḍarab ghulāmahu Zaydun ..."
Secundo folio of Treatise on the case endings in the Arabic language: mithl Zaydun li-man qāla.

Incipit of al-Risālah al-Shamsīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-manṭiqīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-lammā ashāra ilayya man suʻida bi-luṭf al-ḥaqq wa-al-dīn bi-taḥrīr kitāb kadhā wa-kadhā fa-bādartu bi-muqtaḍá ishāratihi wa-sharaʻtu fī taḥrīrihi wa-taṣnīfih wa-sammaytuhu bi-Risālat [al-Risālah] al-Shamsīyah fī qawāʻid [al-qawāʻid] al-manṭiqīyah, wa-rattabtuhu ʻalá muqaddimah wa-thalāth maqālāt wa-khātimah muʻtaṣiman bi-ḥabl al-tawfīq min wāhib al-ʻaql wa-mutawakkilan ʻalá jūdihi al-mufīḍ lil-khayr wa-al-ʻadl ..."
Secundo folio for al-Risālah al-Shamsīyah fī al-qawāʻid al-manṭiqīyah: tasalsul bal baʻḍ.

Incipit of Anonymous commentary on an anonymous treatise on Arabic grammar: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qawluhu al-murād bi-al-ḥamd al-maʻná al-maṣdarī. Āh. Iʻlam anna al-fāʻil idhā aḥdatha amran fī maḥall munfaʻil yaḥṣalu la-hu ṣfah iʻtibārīyah hiya al-ījād wa-al-īqāʻ wa-anna la-hu al-maṣdar al-maʻlūm wa-lil-munfaʻil ṣifatān dhālika al-amr al-ḥāṣil bi-al-īqāʻ wa-huwa qad yakūnu wa-ḍʻan wa-qad yakūnu kayfan ..."
Secundo folio of Anonymous commentary on an anonymous treatise on Arabic grammar: min mithl qiyām al-Shams.

Incipit of al-Risālah al-jāmiʻah li-khamsat ashyāʼ: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá mā anʻamahu bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi wa-uthnī ʻlayhi bi-ālāʼihi ... Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhihi Risālah jāmiʻah li-khamast ashyāʼ. al-Awwal asmāʼ al-ʻulamāʼ al-madhkūrīn fī Jāmiʻ al-rumūz fa-kānat sabʻ wa-sabʻīn isman baʻda al-miʼatayn, wa-al-thānī al-kutub allatī naqala ʻanhā al-shāriḥ, aʻnī Mawlānā Shams al-Dīn Muḥammad, fa-kāna khamsah wa-tisʻīn kitāban baʻda al-miʼatayn, wa-al-thālith mawāḍiʻ ṭaʻana fīhā al-shāriḥ ʻibārat al-matn, aʻnī mukhtaṣar al-Wiqāyah fa-kānat thalāthmiʼah wa-ithnay ʻashar mawḍiʻan ..."
Secundo folio of al-Risālah al-jāmiʻah li-khamsat ashyāʼ: ʻalyhi wa-sallam sayyid.

Tammat."

Translation of the colophon of volume 2: "The seal of the scrutinizers, our Master, the author, said: This gloss was completed on the morning of Tuesday, 14 Ṣafar, 1193 Hijrī [3 March, 1779] by the author, the poor to the forgiveness of his Lord, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī al-Ṣabbān, may their Lord treat them by abundant mercy. Amen. This blessed gloss was copied on Sunday [sic], 12 Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 1271 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [Tuesday, 2 January, 1855], may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him, by the poor Aḥmad Duwaydār al-Shaybīnī, may God forgive him, his parents and the Muslims and have mercy upon them. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, His family and companions and grant them peace. Amen. Amen. By the intercession of the Master of the forefathers. Amen. It is completed."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā Wird al-aqṭāb. Dhakar al-Shaykh Muḥyī al-Dīn annahu wird al-aqṭāb wa-al-mukammalīn min aṣḥāb al-dawāyin [al-dawāthir] al-kubrá, dhakartuhu lil-ikhwān rajāʼ al-ʻamal bi-hi, wa-dhakartu fī akhir kull dhikr baʻḍ mā yuntijuhu min al-aḥwāl al-bāṭinah, wa-Allāh yanfaʻu man yashāʼ, innahu samīʻ mujīb. Wa-yashtamilu hādhā al-wird ʻalá khamsah wa-ʻishrīn ṣifah min al-dhikr."
Secundo folio: al-takhalluq bi-ṣifāt al-ṣāliḥīn.
16.5 x 23.2 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; keywords in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a, in a different hand: "Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ Wird al-aqṭāb lil-Imām al-Quṭb Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī."

On folio 1a, two ownership notes, as follows: "Mulk al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn al-marḥūm al-Ḥājj Khalīl al-ʻUbaydī [?] baladan, al-Rāziqī nasaban, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Rifāʻī ṭarīqatan, ghufira la-hu wa-li-wālidayh." "Thumma intaqala ilá mulk al-faqīr Aḥmad al-ʻInānī."

At the end of folio 4a, a title of another book on the ceremony of sufi initiation "lubs al-khirqah" (wearing of the rag) by ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī: "Kitāb al-Qawl al-mubīn li-dalīl lubs al-khirqah wa-al-talqīn, taʼlīf al-Quṭb al-Rabbānī Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, ʻammat barakatuhu. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 4b an illegible invocation, in sixteen verses, written in a different hand, against "al-rīḥ al-aḥmar" ("red wind", some kind of demonic possession): "Ṣifat duʻāʼ sharīf lil-rīḥ al-aḥmar. Wa-hādhā huwa al-duʻāʼ, fa-yuktab wa-yuqraʼ wa-yuʻallaq wa-yuqraʼ."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi yawm al-Sabt al-mubārak li-thalāth layālin baqiyat min shahr al-Ḥijjah, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-sittah wa-thamānīn 1186 min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, aḥsana Allāh khitāmahā bi-jāh [Khayr] al-Barīyah. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was concluded on Saturday, three nights remaining from the month of Dhū al-Ḥijjah, the year 1186 of the Hijrah [21 March, 1773], may God end it well by the intercession of the Prophet Muḥammad. Amen. Praise be to God the Lord of the Universe."

title: 880-02 Manẓūmah Lāmīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Brīyah : manuscript / Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Saʻīd al-Būṣīrī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn ʻalá al-qawm al-ḍāllīn al-muḍillīn. Ilá matá anta billādhāti mashghūlu // wa-anta ʻan kulli mā qaddamta masʼūlu. Fī kulli yawmin turajjī an tatūba ghadan // wa-ʻiqdu ʻazmika bittaswīfi makhlūlu ..."
Secundo folio: Muḥammadun ḥujjat Allāh.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 17.5 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; text fully vocalized; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Manẓūmah Lāmīyah fī madḥ Khayr al-Barīyah ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-hiya miʼatā bayt wa-arbaʻah. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Wa-hiya lil-Shaykh al-Būṣīrī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Āmīn."
At the head of folio 1a, an endowment statement: "Waqf lillāh taʻālá."
On folio 5b, nine verses from "al-Munfarijah" of Ibn al-Naḥwī, Yūsuf ibn Muḥammad, approximately 1041-1119 or 1120: "Ishtadī azmatu tanfarijī // qad ādhana layluki bi-al-faraji ..."
Colophon: "Tammat bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusni tawfīqih. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh. Āmīn."
Translation of the colophon: "It is concluded by the help of God and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God. Amen."

title: 880-02 Takhmīs al-qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah fī madḥ Ashraf al-Barīyah : manuscript / al-Sirāj al-Warrāq, Abū Ḥafṣ ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām muʼallif al-Witrīyah [... ...] Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr ibn Rashīd al-Baghdādī al-wāʻiẓ, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻannā. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala baʻḍ al-nabīyīn ʻalá baʻḍ wa-rafaʻa baʻḍahum fawqa baʻḍ darajāt, fa-ātá Ādam al-ṣafwah wa-Ibrāhīm al-khillah wa-Mūsá tisʻ āyāt bayyināt wa-baʻatha ʻĪsá bi-ibrāʼ al-akmah wa-al-abraṣ wa-aḥyá ʻalá yadayhi al-amwāt ..."
Secundo folio: lī maʻahum qadaman.
15 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; text within double red frame; fully vocalized; many wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.

On folio 1a an ownership statement: "Hādhā al-kitāb huwa Takhmīs al-Qaṣīdah al-Witrīyah fī madḥ ashraf al-barīyah, mulk al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-faqīr Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Shānūtī, al-muʻtarif bi-al-taqṣīr, dakhala fī mulkihi fī 18 Rajab al-fard sanat 1295 [18 July, 1878], khamsah wa-tisʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf Hijrīyah min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ʻalayhi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-mushtarāhu fī al-tārīkh al-madhkūr min al-Shaykh Maḥmūd ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Zamak bi-mablagh qadruhu AY [?] taʻrīfah [currency unit], kamā al-waṣl al-maʼkhūdh ʻalá al-Shaykh Maḥmūd al-madhkūr bi-khaṭṭ yadihi jamīʻuhu wa-maḥfūẓ bi-ṭaraf al-Shaykh Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Shānūtī al-mushtarī. Kātibuhu Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Shānūtī al-Faqīh."

On folio 3a-3b: "Qāla al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah al-Sirāj al-Warrāq mukhammis al-Witrīyah: Ammā baʻd fa-innī raʼaytu al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī al-manām yaṭūfu bi-al-Bayt fa-ṭuftu warāʼahu ḥattá intahá ilá al-Rukn al-Yamānī ..."

The quintuplicate of al-Sirāj al-Warrāq starts with: "Badaʼtu bi-dhikri Allāh madḥan muqaddaman. Wa-uthnī bi-ḥamdi Allāh shukran muʻaẓẓaman. Wa-akhtumu qawlī bi-al-ṣalāti wa-innamā. Uṣallī ṣalātan tamlaʼu al-arḍa wa-al-samā // ʻalá man la-hu aʻlā al-ʻulā mutabawwaʼu."
The quintuplicate ends with: "Yamīnan bi-Rabbī inna qalbī yuḥibbuhu // wa-dhāka rajāʼī fī al-mamāti wa-fī al-maḥyā."

Colophon: "Tammat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr Aḥmad Yūsuf al-Samānūdī al-Shādhilī al-Aḥmadī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-mashāyikhihi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Tamm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Āmīn. Taḥrīran dhālika yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, thālith ʻishrīn Rabīʻ Ākhir, sanat 1226 min Hijratihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam wa-ʻaẓẓama wa-karram."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy is completed by the praise of God, His help and His benevolence, by the copyist, the poor Aḥmad Yūsuf al-Samānūdī al-Shādhilī al-Aḥmadī, may God forgive him, his parents, his masters and all Muslims. It is completed. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace. Written on blessed Thursday, 23 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 1226 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [17 May, 1811] ..."

title: 880-02 Risālah fī ism Allāh al-aʻẓam : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn Mūsá ibn Muḥammad al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-fāḍil wa-al-niḥrīr al-kāmil, shaykh al-sharīʻah wa-al-ḥaqīqah, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Mūsá al-Qulaybī al-Mālikī al-ʻUmarī al-Ghawthī, mā naṣṣuhu: Ittafaqa al-muʻtaddu bi-ittifāqihim anna al-ism al-aʻẓam ʻArabī, bal ḥaká baʻḍuhum al-ijmāʻ ʻalá dhālik wa-ikhtalafū baʻda dhālika fī taʻyīnihi wa-ʻadam taʻyīnih ʻalá qawlayn. al-Qawl al-awwal anna al-ism al-aʻẓam wāḥid bi-ʻaynih, ay ism mutaʻayyan laysa dāʼiran fī sāʼir al-asmāʼ. Wa-ajmaʻa ahl hādhā al-qawl annahu aḥada ʻashara ḥarfan ..."
Secundo folio: tawāfuqihim fī al-asmāʼ.
16.5 x 22.2 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 14 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; some keywords and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a are scribbled three verses of poetry in poor style, incorrect rhythm and some structural and grammatical mistakes.

On folio 4b are written in a different hand four quintuplicates attributed to Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Miṣrī (could not be identified) which start with: "Yā jamālan mā mithluhu min shabīh // kullu khayrin yurjá li-man tajtabīh ...", and an incantation against ants attributed to al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Rifāʻī (could not be identified).
Colophon: "Intahá bi-ḥurūfihi. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."
Translation of the colophon: "The copying is completed. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, His family and companions and give them peace."

title: 880-03 Masāʼil Ibn Hishām : manuscript / ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf ibn Hishām.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh musbigh al-ʻaṭāʼ, musbil al-ghiṭāʼ, muʻṭī al-niʻam wa-al-ālāʼ, al-maḥmūd ʻalá al-sarrāʼ wa-al-ḍarrāʼ, al-mashkūr fī al-shiddah wa-al-rakhāʼ, aḥmaduhu wa-lā maḥmūd ʻalá al-ḥaqīqah siwāh, wa-ashkuruhu shukran lā yaʼbāh wa-lā yansāh, wa-uṣallī ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad nabīyihi alladhī min khayr al-ʻanāṣir iṣṭafāh ..."
Secundo folio: fīhā wa-yatakhāṣamūn bi-hā.
15 x 22 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Masāʼil Ibn Hishām."
On folio 2a: "Hādhihi Masāʼil Ibn Hishām fī alghāzih ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Yā Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 3a: "... wa-jaʻaltuhu bi-rasm al-khizānah al-mawlawīyah al-sulṭānīyah al-malakīyh al-Kāmilīyah, adām Allāh mulk mālikihā ..."
On folios 1a-2a: Miscellaneous quotations, anecdotes and grammatical riddles and parsing.
Text folios 2b-21b.
On folios 22a-27b, in a different hand: Various grammatical rules.
Folio 28 is blank.
On folios 29a-40b, in a different hand: Various quotations, poems, anecdotes, advices, tales and prayers.
Colophon (folio 21b): "Tammat al-Alghāz bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih wa-karamih."
Translation of the colophon: "The Riddles are completed by the praise of God and His benevolence and generosity."

title: 880-03 Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr al-Tilimsānī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit (folio 1b): "Hādhā kitāb mukhtaṣar min Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Allāh, innī asʼaluka al-iʻānah ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Qāla Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr // mubtadiʼan bi-bismi al-ilāh al-qadīri. al-Ḥamdu lillāhi alladhī ʻallamanā // sirra al-kunūzi wa-bihi awlānā ... Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Durrati al-anwāri // taḥqīqun fī ṣanāyiʻi al-abrāri ..."
Secundo folio: Wa-sammaytuhu bi-Durrati al-anwāri.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Brown leather binding with flap, covers embossed with central medallions, in four numbered quires.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; many commentaries and corrections on the margins; magic squares; text within double red frames; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb mukhtaṣar min Tāj al-mulūk wa-bughyat al-mālik wa-al-mamlūk musammiyan [musammá] bi-Durrat al-anwār lil-fāḍil Ibn al-Ḥājj al-Kabīr al-Tilimsānī, wa-huwa ʻumdah fī al-funūn al-maʻdūmah, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Bi-jāh Sayyid al-Mursalīn."
On folio 1a: A medical snuff recipe for those afflicted with the spirits of the rebellious Jinn: "Ṣifat saʻūṭ lil-muṣāb bi-aryāḥ al-jān al-mutamarridīn ..."
On the margin of folio 136b, a coallation note: "Balaghah muqābalatan bi-ghāyat al-diqqah ʻalá yadinā. Kātibuhu al-faqīr Muḥammad Aḥmad al-Khawjah."
On folios 137a and 138a-138b, medico-magical recipes, in a different hand.

Colophon (folio 136b): "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb fī yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak al-muwāfiq 4 arbaʻah khalat min shahr Jumād Awwal, sanat 1007 [?] alf wa-sabʻ sinīn [?] min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-adhká [wa-azká] al-taḥīyah wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāyiman abadan ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. ʻAlá yad kātibihi al-faqīr ilá Allāh ʻAlī ibn Sālim ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayh wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Tamm. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ wa-al-maʼāb. Wa-ilá Allāh tarjiʻ al-umūr. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "This book was concluded on blessed Monday, 4 Jumād Awwal, 1007 [?] of the Hijrah of the Prophet ... Copied by ... ʻAlī ibn Sālim ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Shāfiʻī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Fawāʼid fī al-ṣilāt wa-al-ʻawāʼid : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sharjī al-Zabīdī.

notes.text: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn bi-jamīʻ maḥāmidihi ʻalá mā asbagha min jazīl ʻawāʼidihi ḥamdan yuwāfī mā ajzala min niʻamihi wa-fawāʼidih wa-yukāfī mā yafḍulu bi-hi min zawāʼidihi wa-ṣilātih, wa-salāmuhu ʻalá Nabīyihi Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, alladhī ʻallama al-Qurʼān min aʻlam shawāhidih wa-dīn al-Islām min taʼsīsih wa-qawāʻidih, ṣallātan taʻummu ajmaʻa ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-wāfidih ..."
Secundo folio: jawwidʹhā fa-ghufira lah.
15.3 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 10.8 x 15.7 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers embossed with central medallions.
In medium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and keywords in red; many magic squares; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb Fawāʼid fīhi majmūʻah."
On folio 84b: "Tamma Kitāb al-Fawāʼid wa-al-ṣalawāt, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh taʻālá."
Colophon: "Wa-qad tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad kātibihi Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. M. Sanat 1157."

Translation of the colophon: "The book was concluded by the praise of God, His help and abundant benevolence. Copied by the poor Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad in the year 1157 Hijrīyah [1744 or 1745]. May God forgive the copyist and all Muslims."

title: 880-03 al-Risālat al-Qushayrīyah fī al-taṣawwuf : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī.

notes.text: Title from printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī tafarrada bi-jalāl malakūtih wa-tawaḥḥada bi-jamāl jabarūtih wa-taʻazzaza bi-ʻulū aḥadīyatih wa-taqaddasa bi-sumū ṣamadīyatih wa-takabbara fī dhātih ʻan muḍāraʻat kull naẓīr wa-tanazzaha fī ṣifātih ʻan kull tanāhin wa-qaṣīr ... Ammā baʻd, fahādhihi risālah katabahā al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī, raḥimahu Allāh, bi-balad Dār al-Salām, fī sanat 437. Ammā baʻd, fa-qad jaʻala Allāh taʻālá hādhihi al-ṭāʼifah ṣafwatan wa-faḍḍlahum ʻalá kathīr min al-nās baʻda rusulihi wa-anbiyāʼihi, ṣalāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: mā yazwī wa-yadfaʻ.
10.3 x 15 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 12 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap, covers and flap embossed with central medallions.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālat al-Shaykh al-ʻārif al-kāmil al-muḥaqqiq ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Hawāzin al-Qushayrī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-ḥasharanā maʻahu fī dār karāmatih bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn. M."

On folio 1a are written titles of three works as follows: Risālat al-tajrīd [fī] kalimat al-tawḥīd li-Aḥmad al-Ghazzālī (Ghazzālī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, died 1126). Risālah Tāʼīyah al-Shaykh [Ibn] Ḥabīb al-Ṣafadī (Ṣafadī, ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Muḥammad, died 1509 or 1510). Tāʼīyat al-ʻUlaymī (could not be identified)."

Wa-qāla Allāh taʻālá: 'Wa-khashiʻat al-aṣwāt lil-Raḥmān fa-lā tusmaʻu illā hamsan'. Wa-kam bayna ʻabdin yaskutu taṣāwunan ʻan al-kadhib wa-al-ghaybah wa-bayna ʻabdin yaskutu li-istīlāʼ sulṭān ..."

title: 880-02 Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1b.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka yā man dhātuka bi-dhātik wa-ṣifātuka bi-maʻānīka lā bi-dhātik, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-muballigh lil-aḥkām wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih dhawī al-itqān wa-al-iḥkām, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā ant, khalaqtanā wa-narāka bi-lā mithāl, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammad rasūluka al-ṣādiq fī kull ḥāl. Wa-baʻd, fayaqūlu faqīr raḥmat rabbihi al-dayyān Muḥammad al-Damanhūrī mubtaghī al-ghufrān innahu lammā kānat al-manẓūmah allatī anshaʼahā Shaykhunā al-Najjārī sahlat al-tanāwul yakhūḍu al-ʻaql fī baḥrihā al-jārī, ḥāwaltu an ashraḥahā bi-sharḥ yuzīlu ghiṭāhā wa-yubayyinu min al-marām mā taṭwī taḥta jināhā, walāsīmā wa-qad ashāra bi-hi ʻalayya Shaykhunā al-madhkūr fa-jāʼa bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi mubashshiran bi-al-surūr. Wa-sammaytuhu Futūḥāt al-rashīd ʻalá Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on blessed Thursday, 7 Shaʻbān, 1249 [20 December, 1833] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him, copied for himself, by the poor to the forgiveness of the Creator, Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-madʻū al-Najjārī."

title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī.

Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān ibn Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yaqtaniʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-ḥālī an aṣnaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá Qaṣīdat Badʼ al-amālī li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī, wa-sammaytuhu Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī ..."

title: 880-02 al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah.

notes.text: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-huwa ḥasbī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-wāḥid al-aḥad, al-fard al-ṣamad, al-munfarid ʻan al-ṣāḥibah wa-al-walad, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-taslīm ʻalá man ikhtārahu Allāh ḥabīban min al-abad, Muḥammad al-mukhtār dhī al-faḍl wa-al-madad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi mā tanaffasa mutanaffis ilá al-abad. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-faqīr ilá raḥmat rabbihi al-qadīr al-munʻim al-mannān ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Shihāb al-Dīn Khalīfah al-Ustādh al-aʻẓam al-Shaykh Shiḥādhah al-ʻIrāqī, taghammadahum Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih wa-askanahum fasīḥ jinānih: Hādhā sharḥ laṭīf ʻalá risālat al-Shaykh al-Imām Sayyidī Muḥammad ibn al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Maydānī, raḥimahumā Allāh taʻālá, jaʻaltuhu tadhkirah li-abnāʼ jinsī wa-sammaytuhu bi-al-alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah, wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlih an yanfaʻanī bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "al-Alfāẓ al-qalīlah fī al-ʻulūm al-jalīlah is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence. God suffices us. He is the best advocate."

title: 880-02 al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim al-Damanhūrī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1b.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Ḥamdan li-man abdaʻa al-uṣūl wa-al-muwalladāt wa-ikhtāra minhā dhawī al-rawīyah wa-al-ʻuqūl al-bāhirāt, wa-ṣalātan wa-salāman ʻalá aṣl al-nashʼatayn wa-khulāṣat man ātāhu Allāh al-ḥikmatayn, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-mutamassikīn bi-millatihi wa-al-ʻāmilīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu aḥqar al-anām Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, ṭahharahu Allāh min waṣmat al-anām: Hādhihi masāʼil muzdariyah jalīlah tataʻallaqu bi-ʻilāj al-maqʻadah al-ʻalīlah bi-adwiyah shahīrah kathīrat al-wujūd, qarībat al-taḥṣīl li-kull faqīr wa-ghanī kanūd, sammaytuhā bi-al-Kalām al-yasīr fī ʻilāj al-maqʻadah wa-al-bawāsīr, wa-rattabtuhā ʻalá muqaddimah wa-maqṣūd wa-khātimah, rājiyan minhu subḥānah an yamunna ʻalaynā bi-ḥusn al-khātimah ..."

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālah fī ʻilāj al-maqʻdah wa-al-bawāsīr lil-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Damanhūrī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Qāla muʼallifuhu: Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi fī al-ʻāshir min al-sābiʻ min al-tāsiʻ min al-sābiʻ min al-thānī ʻashar min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taswīdihi yawm al-Jumʻah rābiʻ ʻashar Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhur sanat alf wa-miʼah arbaʻah wa-tisʻīn min al-Hijrah. Tamma bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih yawm al-Aḥad, ghurrat shahr Ṣafar al-khayr, sanat 1298. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "The author said: It was completed on the tenth of the seventh of the ninth of the seventh of the twelfth of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best of prayer and peace be upon him [10 Rajab, 1169 Hijrī = 10 April, 1756]. Its drafting "taswīd" was completed on Friday [sic], 14 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1194 of the Hijrah [Monday, 20 March, 1780]. The copy was completed, by the praise of God, His help and abundant benevolence, on Sunday, the beginning of Ṣafar, 1298 [3 January, 1881]. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them peace."

title: 880-02 Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1b.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma ʻalá mā ʻallamtanā min farāʼid ʻaqāʼid al-īmān wa-nashkuruka ʻalá mā alhamtanā min sāṭiʻ al-ḥujaj wa-qawāṭiʻ al-burhān, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallim ʻalá man ʻaṣamtahu min al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-hādīn ṭarīq al-ḥaqq wa-al-ḥāmīn sharāʼiʻ al-Islām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūl afqar al-ʻibād ilá raḥmat al-karīm al-jawwād Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Faraqī al-Zakī, ʻāmalahu Allāh wa-al-Muslimīn bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Lammā kāna ʻilm al-tawḥīd awwal wājib ʻalá al-mukallaf fahman lā yaṣiḥḥu wājib wa-lā mandūb bi-dūnih jazman, wa-kānat manẓūmat Shaykhinā al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Najjārī min ajall mā ṣunnifa fīhi nafʻan li-mā annahā qad ishtamalat maʻa wajāzat lafẓihā wa-suhūlat tanāwulihā ʻalá al-ʻaqāʼid murdafah bi-adillatihā jamʻan, fa-insharaḥ ṣadrī la-hā ghāyat al-inshirāḥ, fa-sharaʻtu fī taʼlīf sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalayhā, mustaʻīnan bi-al-ʻAlīm al-Fattāḥ, wa-huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, wa-sammaytuhu "Fatʹḥ al-murīd li-Khulāṣat al-tawḥīd ..."

title: 880-02 Muḥāḍarat al-abrār wa-musāmarat al-akhyār : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.

title: 880-03 al-Taysīr li-ḥifẓ madhāhib al-qurrāʼ al-sabʻah : manuscript / Abū ʻAmr ʻUthmān ibn Saʻīd al-Dānī.

Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih."
On folios 95b-96a, a commentary, in a different hand, on "Āyat al-Riddah" (the apostasy verse. Qurʼān: Sūrat al-Baqarah: 217)

Colophon (folio 95b): "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi [kitābat] hādhā al-kitāb al-mubārak al-musammá bi-Taysīr [al-Taysīr], yassara Allāh ʻalaynā amranā fī al-dunyā wa-Yawm al-Dīn, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá al-ghanī ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh fī Ḥalab al-Shahbāʼ, fī Madrasat al-Aḥmadīyah, wa-dhālika fī yawm al-Khamīs min shuhūr sanat 1189 min Hijrat man ʻalayhi alf salām wa-alf taḥīyah. Wa-arjū min al-khillān an yuṣliḥū mā fīhā min al-ʻayb wa-al-nuqṣān."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy of this blessed book, titled "al-Taysīr", may God facilitate our condition in this world and on Judgement Day, was completed by the poor to God, the Rich and Most High, ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAbd Allāh, on blessed Thursday, 1189 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [1175 or 1176; date of the day and name of the month not mentioned] at al-Madrasah al-Aḥmadīyah, in Aleppo, Syria. I request my colleagues to correct whatever defects or shortcomings they may find in it."

title: 880-03 Kitāb al-Ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī.

notes.text: Title of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼiyah from folio 1a.
Title of Mawlid al-Nabī supplied by cataloger.
Title of al-Dimyāṭīyah from caption (folio 40b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh, mūḍiḥ al-ṭarīqah wa-mumidd masālik al-ḥaqīqah Tāj al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalabahu wa-mathwāh: Min ʻalāmāt al-iʻtimād ʻalá al-ʻamal nuqṣān al-rajāʼ ʻinda wujūd al-zalal. Irādatuka al-tajrīd maʻa iqāmat Allāh iyyāka fī al-asbāb min al-shahwah al-khafīyah, wa-irādatuka al-asbāb maʻa iqāmat Allāh iyyāka fī al-tajrīd inḥiṭāṭ al-himmah al-ʻalīyah ..."
Secundo folio of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: lā yakun taʼakhkhur.

Incipit of Mawlid al-Nabī (folio 27b): "Hādhā al-Mawlid li-baʻḍ al-muḥaqqiqīn, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī sharrafa al-anām bi-ṣāḥib al-maqām al-aʻlá, wa-kammal al-wujūd bi-akmal mawlūd ḥawá sharafan wa-faḍlan, sharrafa bi-hi al-ābāʼ wa-al-judūd, wa-malaʼ al-wujūd bi-hi ʻadlan. Ḥamilat bi-hi ummuhu Āminah, fa-lam tajid li-ḥamlihi thiqalan, wa-waḍaʻathu, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, makhtūnan madhūnan fī khilaʻ al-ḥusn yuḥlá, wa-wulida, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bi-wajh lā yurá aḥsana minhu wa-lā aḥlá ..."
Secundo folio of Mawlid al-Nabī: wa-nārat bi-hi al-akwān.
Incipit of al-Dimyāṭīyah: "Hādhihi al-Dimyāṭīyah. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Badaʼtu bi-Bismillāhi wa-al-ḥamdi awwalan // ʻalá niʻamin lam tuḥṣa fīmā tanazzala ..."
Secundo folio of al-Dimyāṭīyah: Wa-yā qābiḍu iqbiḍ.
13.5 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 7 x 13.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Ḥikam lil-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻārif billāh taʻālá Tāj al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Iskandarī al-Shādhilī, qaddasa Allāh taʻālá rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu wa-nafaʻanā Allāh bi-ʻulūmihi wa-al-Muslimīn fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn."
On the right margin of folio 42b, someone wrote three verses of poetry as a supplement to the verses of al-Dimyāṭīyah.

Colophon of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: "Tammat al-Ḥikam bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, wa-ṣallá Allāh wa-sallam ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam wa-ʻaẓẓam, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-Shahīr bi-al-Habrāwī, sanat 1112."

Translation of the colophon of al-Ḥikam al-ʻAṭāʼīyah: "The copy of al-Ḥikam was completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant favor. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them peace and glory. Copied by the poor faqī ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-Shahīr bi-al-Habrāwī, in the year 1112 Hijrī [1700 or 1701]."
Colophon of Mawlid al-Nabī: "ʻAlá yad kātibihā al-marqūm, sanat 1112."
Translation of the colophon of Mawlid al-Nabī: "The copy was completed by the hand of the aforementioned copyist, in the year 1112 Hijrī [1700 or 1701]."

Colophon of al-Dimyāṭīyah: "Biʻawn Allāh taʻālá tammat wa-bi-al-khayr ʻammat. Katabahā li-nafsihi, wa-liman shāʼa Allāh min baʻdih, ʻUbayd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Habrah, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-liman daʻā lahum bi-al-maghfirah wa-dhālika ẓuhrīyat nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ li-sittata ʻashar yawman maḍat min shahr Ṣafar al-khayr min shuhūr sanat 1112."

Translation of the colophon of al-Dimyāṭīyah: "It [the copy] was completed by the help of God, may He be praised. May it be wide-spread. Copied by ʻUbayd al-Ghanī ibn Muḥammad al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Habrah, may God forgive him and his parents and whosoever beseech God to forgive them, on Wednesday noon, 16 Ṣafar, 1112 Hijrī [2 August, 1700]."

title: 880-02 Tadhkirat ulī al-albāb bi-maʻrifat al-ādāb : manuscript / Muḥammad ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn Tāj al-ʻĀrifīn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshada hādhihi al-ummah ilá ādāb lā tuḥṣá, wa-khaṣṣahā bi-faḍāʼil wa-mazāyā lā tustaqṣá, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh shahādata ʻabd muḥtāj ilá fayḍ ʻAllām al-Ghuyūb, wa-anna Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, ajall ṭālib wa-maṭlūb, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn, mā ṭalaʻa najm wa-afila gharūb. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf, al-multajī ilá karam al-Raʼūf al-Laṭīf, Muḥammad al-madʻū ʻAbd al-Raʼūf ibn al-Munāwī al-Ḥaddādī, kafāhu Allāh sharra al-munāwī wa-al-muʻādī: Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm ilá maʻrifat ādāb al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jimāʻ ..."
Secundo folio: al-awwal fī ādābihi al-sharʻīyah.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In beautiful thick naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
Folio 81 is blank.
Text folios 1b-80a.

Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, sayyid al-aḥbāb, wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-atbāʻ wa-tābiʻīhim bi-iḥsān. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-salāmun ʻalá al-mursalīn, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man ikhtaṣṣanā bi-risālat Abī al-Qāsim, wa-ikhtaṣṣahu bi-al-shafāʻah al-ʻuẓmá yawm al-hawl, al-ʻāṣim mā ashfaqat al-umm ʻalá waladihā al-bārr al-rāḥim ... Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-muftaqir ilá al-ghfrān ... ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Maḥallī al-Azʹharī al-Shāfiʻī ... Lammā an manna Allāh ʻalayya bi-al-ijtimāʻ ʻalá ... Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Nūr al-Dīn ʻAlī al-Shabramallisī ... kāna min jumlat mā qaraʼtuhu ʻalayhi Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ lil-Shams Ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī, wa-ḥaṣala min dhālika fawāʼid, nashaʼa baʻḍuhā min asʼilat al-ḥāḍirīn, baʻda al-murājaʻah bi-ḥasab al-ṭāqah, wa-aktharuhā min fawāʼid Ustādhinā al-madhkūr, ghayra jawābin li-suʼāl, fa-aḥbabtu an ajmaʻahā fī hādhihi al-awrāq, khishyata ḍayāʻihā, baʻda an istajaztuhu, fa-ajāz. Wa-wasamtu mā jamaʻt bi-"Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan Matn wa-Sharḥ Abī Shujāʻ" ..."
Secundo folio: ʻalá wifq murādihi al-muwaffiq.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound; wrapped in a sheet of paper.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some of the phrases of the original "Matn" and "Sharḥ" are written in red preceded by the phrase "qawluhu" (his statement); catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Ḥāshiyat al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah al-ḥabr al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-waḥīd dahrih, Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn, Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Shabrāmallisī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-barakātih wa-bi-ʻulūmih, ʻAlī ibn Qāsim al-Ghazzī, ʻalá Abī Shujāʻ. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Min niʻam Allāh taʻālá ʻalá al-ʻabd al-faqīr Sulaymān al-Minūfī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu. Āmīn. M."
On the front of the wrapping sheet: "Ḥāshiyat al-Shabramsallī [sic] ʻalá Ibn Qāsim."

On the back of the wrapping sheet a quotation from "Ṭirāz al-majālis" of al-Shihāb al-Khafājī (Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Khafājī, 1571 or 1572-1659) praising the Prophet Muḥammad and his parents.

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ fī salkh al-Ḥijjah, sanat alf wa-miʼah tisʻah wa-arbaʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, ʻalá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh Sulaymān al-Minūfī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ghafara la-hu. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on Wednesday, at the end of Dḥu al-Ḥijjah, 1149 of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best of prayer and peace be upon him, by the poorest of the poor to God, Sulaymān al-Minūfī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī, may God forgive him and pardon him. Amen."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih, zayn al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-fasaḥa fī qabrih wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāh min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāh li-fahm mā sharraʻahu min al-aḥkām ... Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-mujtahid al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu wa-yubayyinu murādahu wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahu, wa-sammaytuhu "Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-sharḥ taḥrīr tanqīḥ al-lubāb". Wa-Allāh al-karīm asʼal an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-wajhihi al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm."
Secundo folio: thumma bi-al-ḥamd la-hu jamʻan.
23 x 16.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 16 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap, central medallion on cover and flap; in 20 numbered quires.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper with the phrases of Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb in red; some commentaries on the margins and interlinear; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Sharḥ al-Taḥrīr, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, wa-waḥīd dahrihi wa-farīd ʻaṣrihi wa-awānih, zayn al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, maḥajjat al-munāẓirīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements, as follows: "Mulk al-faqīr ilá Allāh taʻālá Muḥammad Ibrāhīm ʻArab al-Shāfiʻī." "Qad intaqalat al-milkīyah min al-madhkūr yamīnahu ilá al-fāḍil al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm Rābiḥ al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban. Wa-bi-dhā lazim al-taʼshīr li-yuʻlam."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-kitāb yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, thalāthata ʻashar khalat min shahr Rabīʻ Ākhir alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wa-thalāthah wa-sabʻīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-rājī ʻafwa Rabbihi al-qadīr Muḥammad Ibrāhīm ʻArab al-Zankalūnī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Bakrī ṭarīqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-wālid wālidayhi wa-li-khwānihi fī Allāh taʻālá. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed on blessed Thursday, 13 Rabīʻ Ākhir, 1273 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [11 December, 1856], may the best of prayer and peace be upon Him, by ... Muḥammad Ibrāhīm ʻArab al-Zankalūnī baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Bakrī ṭarīqatan, may God forgive him, his parents and the parents of his parents, and his brethren in God, Most High. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and his family and his companions and grant them peace."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / al-Jalāl al-Maḥallī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓah wa-yubayyinu murādah wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilah wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilah ʻalá wajh sahl lil-mubtadiʼīn, ḥasan lil-nāẓirīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. 16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 19 lines per page.

Fa-in fuqida wa-intaqala [intaqala] ilá Ruwāq al-Shuwām, waqfan sharʻīyan lā yubāʻ wa-lā yūhab. Fa-man baddalahu baʻdamā samiʻahu, al-Āyah [Qurʼān, Sūrat al-Baqarah: 181]."
