Sanat 1133 [1720/1721]." (Two illegible seals). "al-Ḥamdu lillāh. Malakahu al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn [...], ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-mashāyikhihi, wa-ʻafá ʻanhu. Āmīn." "Tamallakahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr [...] faḍl Rabbih al-sattār [... ... ...] ghafara [... ...] wa-li-wālidayhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn."

Colophon: "Wa-li-yakun dhālika ākhir kitāb 'Lawāqiḥ al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah', wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam. Tammat 'al-ʻUhūd al-Muḥammadīyah', bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, fī thāmin Jumād al-Thānī, min shuhūr sanat 1125, ghafara Allāh li-kātibihā wa-li-wālidayhi wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "Let this be the end of the book of 'Lawāqiḥ al-anwār al-Qudsīyah fī bayān al-ʻuhūd al-Muḥammadīyah'. God, may He be praised and glorified, is more knowledgeable. 'al-ʻUhūd al-Muḥammadīyah' is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, on 8 Jumād al-Thānī, 1125 [of the Hijrah = 2 July, 1713]. May God forgive its copyist, his parents and all Muslims. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. Amen."

title: 880-02 al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad al-ʻAyyāshī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī arshadanā li-iqāmat waẓāʼif al-Islām, wa-ḥaḍḍanā ʻalá takthīr dhikrihi fī al-ghudw wa-al-āṣāl ʻalá al-dawām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-badr al-tamām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-sādāt al-aʻlām. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Allāh subḥānuh, al-mutaʻalliq bi-adhyāl awliyāʼih, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Bakr al-ʻAyyāshī, nawwara Allāh qalbahu, wa-satara ʻaybahu, wa-khatama bi-kalimatay al-shahādah qawlahu, wa-faʻala bi-ummat Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, mithlahu, qāl: Ṭāla mā khālaja qalbī an aḍaʻa taqyīdan yakūnu ka-al-sharḥ ʻalá 'al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah', al-jāmiʻah li-khayray al-dunuā wa-al-ākhirah, allatī sārat masīrat al-Shams fī al-bilād, wa-intafaʻa bi-hā fī jamīʻ al-aqṭār al-ʻibād, munṭawiyan ʻalá tafsīr gharāʼibihā, wa-muḥtawiyan ʻalá faḍīlat adhkārihā ... wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah' ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ammā Zarrūq fa-bi-al-Rāʼ al-maftūḥah.
11 x 18 cm; written surface: 7.5 x 13.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of "al-Wazīfah al-Zarrūqīyah" and markings in red; catchwords.
On folio 56a: Six verses of poetry attributed to al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī (a prominant Sufi; died 561/1166)
Folio 60 is blank; text of "al-Anwār al-sanīyah ʻalá al-Waẓīfah al-Zarrūqīyah" (folios 1b-56a); on folios 56b-59a: Various invocations.

Author's colophon (folios 55b-56a): "Qāla muqayyiduhu, al-faqīr li-Rabbihi, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad: Hādhā mā yassara Allāh mimmā qaṣadtu min hādhā al-kitāb, wa-astaghfiru Allāh al-ʻAẓīm mimmā zalla bi-hi al-lisān, wa-adkhalahu dhuhūl al-nisyān. Wa-man ẓafira bi-khaṭaʼ aw taqṣīr fa-li-yumahhid ʻudhrī li-ḍaʻfī wa-ʻajzī wa-qillat biḍāʻatī. Wa-asʼalu Allāh an yanfaʻa bi-hi man ṭālaʻahu, aw qaraʼahu, aw ḥaṣṣalahu, aw saʻá fī shayʼ minhu, wa-an yuʻāmila jamīʻanā bi-faḍlihi, wa-an yakhtima lanā bi-al-ḥusná bi-raḥmatihi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Its author, the poor to his Lord, ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn Muḥammad, said: This is what God facilitated of what I intended to do in this book. I beg forgiveness from God Almighty to what the tongue might have erred and what the confusion of forgetfulness might have introduced. He who finds a mistake or shortcoming [in the book], let him take my excuse with ease, because of my weakness, inability and insufficiency. I invoke God to benefit with it he who studies it, he who reads it, he who memorizes it, or endeavors in part of it; and to treat us all according to His favor, and to seal our life and all Muslims amicably, by His mercy. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe."

Colophon of the copy from which the present copy was transcribed: "Kamula hādhā al-sharḥ al-mubārak ʻalá Waẓīfat al-Shaykh Zarrūq, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-nafaʻanā bi-ʻulūmihi -- Āmīn -- fī yawm al-Aḥad, fī shahr Dhī al-Ḥijjah, 18 khalat, sanat 1287. Hādhā tārīkh al-nuskhah al-manqūl minhā hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah."

Translation of the colophon of the copy from which the present copy was transcribed: "Completed is this blessed commentary on the Doctrine of al-Shaykh Zarrūq, may God be pleased with him and benefit us by his sciences -- Amen -- on Sunday, 18 nights having passed of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, the year 1287 [of the Hijran = 12 March, 1871]. This is the date of the copy from which this blessed copy was transcribed."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa itmām kitābat hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārakah laylat al-Jumʻah al-gharrāʼ al-mubārakah, 26 maḍat min shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah al-mubārak, min sanat 1332 Hijrīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalawāt wa-al-taslīmāt al-zakīyah, ʻalá yad kātibihā al-faqīr Muḥammad Rajab Ṭaḥḥān, aṣlaḥa Allāh aḥwālahu fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah wa-al-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This blessed copy was completed on the night of glorious and blessed Friday, 26 nights having passed of the blessed month of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, the year 1332 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [16 October, 1914], may the best prayers and purest peace be upon Him, by its copyist, the poor Muḥammad Rajab Ṭaḥḥān, may God remedy his conditions, and all Muslims, in this world and the Hereafter. Amen."

title: 880-02 al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Aḥmad al-Shaʻrānī.

notes.text: Title of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar from folio 2a.
Title of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz from folio 150b.
Title of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad from folio 190a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Aḥmadu Allāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá sāʼir al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi jawāhir wa-durar iltaqaṭṭuhā min kalām shaykhī wa-qudwatī ilá Allāh taʻālá, al-Shaykh al-kāmil, al-rāsikh al-ummī al-Muḥammadī, ṣāḥib al-kushūfāt wa-al-ʻulūm wa-al-asrār wa-al-taṣrīf fī arḍ Miṣr, Sayyidī ʻAlī al-Khawwāṣ al-Burullusī, tilmīdh Sayyidī Ibrāhīm al-Mabtūlī [Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī al-Matbūlī, died 1472?], raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá mashāyikh al-ʻaṣr min barakātihi wa-barakat ʻulūmihi fī al-dunyā wa-al-ākhirah. Āmīn. Wa-qad ṣaḥibtuhu naḥwa thalāthīn sanah, minhā ʻashr sinīn mulāzamatan, fa-kuntu kull kalimah samiʻtuhā minhu tataʻallaqu bi-āyah, aw Ḥadīth, aw ghayrihimā, aḥfaẓuhā wa-arqumuhā ʻindī fī qirṭās, ilá an ṣāra dhālika naḥw mujalladāt. Wa-kāna yaqūlu lī: Idhā samiʻta minnī kalimah marmāhā baʻdīd ʻan al-afhām fa-tarjimhā ʻannī bi-al-ʻibārah al-maʼlūfah bayna al-nās ..."
Secundo folio of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar : fa-kayfa bi-ghayrihim fa-mā kāna.

Incipit of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. Qāla al-Shaykh Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Salām ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātihi. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī fataḥa bi-mafātīḥ al-ghuyūb aqfāl al-qulūb, wa-rafaʻa ḥujub al-sarāyir, wa-jalā abṣār al-baṣāʼir, fa-ẓahar mā kāna maḥjūban wa-jalā ʻarāʼis al-wujūd fī musawwāt [mirʼāt?] al-shuhūd, fa-man fahima al-maqṣūd balagha al-maṭlūb. Waffaqa man shāʼa min ʻibādih, fa-jāhada fī Allāh ḥaqqa jihādih, bi-mā sabaqa la-hu fī al-maktūb, thumma hadāhu baʻdamā bayyana hudāhu, thumma raqqāhu baʻdamā naqqāhu min al-ʻubūdīyah, thumma wallāhu baʻdamā tawallāhu, thumma awlāhu niʻaman lā yaḥṣuruhā ḥaysūb ..."
Secundo folio of Incipit of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: li-tafrīj al-kurūb yawma lā tashrīqa li-shams wa-lā ghurūb.

Incipit of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-awwal, fa-laysa li-awwalīyatihi amad, wa-al-ākhir alladhī tantahī dūna ākhirīyatihi al-mudad, al-ẓāhir alladhī lā yaẓharu ʻalá ghaybihi aḥad, al-bāṭin alladhī lā yudrikuhu al-ṭālib wa-law ijtahad, al-wāḥid alladhī lā yadkhulu fī taʻaddud, al-wāḥid alladhī lā yushbihu aḥadīyatahu aḥad, al-fard alladhī tanazzaha ʻan al-zawjah wa-al-walad. Aḥmaduhu ḥamd man ṭalaba wa-ijtahad, wa-jadda fa-wajad ..."
Secundo folio of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad: ḥaqīqatan illā Allāh ʻazza wa-jall.
15.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 10 x 15.5 cm; 21-23 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with embossed central medallion; back cover missing.
The three manuscripts are copied in the same hand; in good Maghribī script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar, lil-ʻālim al-Rabbānī wa-al-haykal al-ṣamadānī, Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Wahhāb al-Shaʻrānī, maddanā Allāh min madadih. Āmīn. Wa-fī hādhā al-kitāb ayḍan Kitāb Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz lil-ʻAllāmah Ibn Ghānim al-Maqdisī, raḥimahu Allāh. Āmīn. Kitāb Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad."

Colophon of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá́ Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm."

Translation of the colophon of al-Jawāhir wa-al-durar: "Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. There is no power nor might except in God, the Most High, the All Powerful."

Colophon of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: "Kamula Kitāb Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz, bi-ḥamd Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn ʻawni. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran dāʼiman abadan."

Translation of the colophon of Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz: "The book of 'Ḥall al-rumūz wa-mafātīḥ al-kunūz' is completed by the praise of God and His abundant benevolence. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and companions and grant them abundant, continuous and everlasting peace."

Colophon of Ifrād al-Aḥad ʻan afrād al-ʻadad: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with "al-Bāb al-khāmis" (Chapter five), as follows: "... Aẓananta anna ṭahārata qudīyatī tudannisuhā awsākh al-mudhnibīn? Akhashīta ʻalá wasīʻ raḥmatī an taḍīqa bi-zumrat al-khāṭiʼīn? Akhifta anna malābis maghfiratī yakhliquhā talabbus al-musayyibīn? Lā taʻtaqid anna kamāl lāhūtīyatī lā yatimmu illā bi-ḥasanāt al-ṭāʼiʻīn. Akhaṭara bi-bālika anna jamāl aḥadīyatī lā yaqūmu illā bi-qurbāt al-muqarribīn? Yā Dāwūd: In qaddastanī wa-sammaytanī, fa-innamā dhālika athar taʻarrufī ilayka wa-barakat tawfīqī laka bi-al-dalālah ʻalayya. Wa-al-quddūsīyah ṣifatī, wa-al-subbūḥīyah naʻtī, fa-idhā ..."

title: 880-01 Mukhtaṣar Minhāj al-ʻābidīn : manuscript.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qad rattaba al-Imām, Ḥujjat al-Islām, Abū Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī, raḥimahu Allāh, kitāb Minhāj al-ʻābidīn ʻalá sabʻ ʻaqabāt: al-Ūlá ʻaqabat al-ʻilm, al-thāniyah ʻaqabat al-tawḥīd, al-thālithah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāʼiq (wa-hiya al-dunyā, wa-al-khalq, wa-al-Shayṭān, wa-al-nafs), al-rābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ʻawāriḍ (wa-hiya al-rizq, wa-al-akhṭār min kull shayʼ yukhāfu aw yurjá aw yurādu aw yukrahu; fa-inna ʻawāʼiq al-umūr mubhamah, fa-yashtaghilu al-qalb bi-hā, wa-al-shadāʼid, wa-anwāʻ al-qaḍāʼ), al-khāmisah ʻaqabat al-bawāʻith (wa-hiya al-khawf wa-al-rajāʼ), wa-al-sādisah ʻaqabat al-qawādiḥ (wa-hiya al-ʻujb wa-al-riyāʼ), al-sābiʻah ʻaqabat al-ḥamd wa-al-shukr ..."
Secundo folio: wa-al-zawl mutafarrid bi-al-qidam.
14.5 x 20.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Mukhtaṣar Minhāj al-ʻābidīn lil-Imām Abī Ḥāmid al-Ghazzālī, nafaʻanā Allāh taʻālá bi-hi wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

At the end of the treatise, the copyist started copying another treatise on Sufism and Sufis (eight lines only, title not provided, by Abū al-Naṣr ibn Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Abī al-Ḥasan (could not be identified).

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ʻawn al-Malik al-Wahhāb fī niṣf shahr Dhi [Dhī] al-Ḥijjah, sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-ithnay ʻashar, ʻalá yad al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Ḥanafī al-Miṣrī, ghafara Allāh la-hu, wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhih, wa-li-kull al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King, in the middle of the month of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, 1112 [of the Hijrah = 23 May, 1701], by the poor Ibrāhīm al-Ḥanafī al-Miṣrī, may God forgive him, his parents, his teachers and all Muslims."

title: 880-02 al-Sayr wa-al-sulūk ilá Malik al-Mulūk : manuscript / Qāsim ibn Ṣalāḥ al-Dīn al-Khānī.

notes.text: Title from folio 6b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Hādhā al-kitāb Sayr al-mulūk. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ahbaṭa bi-ḥikmatihi asrār dhātih min samāʼ al-ʻamāʼ ilá arḍ al-ṭabīʻah al-kullīyah, wa-awdaʻahā bi-qudratih fī ṣadaf al-nuṭaf iẓhāran li-khawāṣṣ al-asmāʼ, fa-inḥajabat al-ẓulumāt al-nafsānīyah ḥijāban ansāhā mā kānat ʻalayhi min al-kamālāt, fa-mālat ilá al-shahawāt, wa-rakanat ilá al-maḥsūsāt, wa-alifat al-ʻādāt, fa-lam tadhkur awṭānahā, wa-lā khaṭara bi-bālihā mabādīhā al-ʻalīyah. Thumma arsala ilayhā rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-ẓāhirah wa-rusulan ʻalá ṣūratihā al-bāṭinah ..."
Secundo folio: ṣifātihā min ṣifātih.
13.5 x 20.7 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 14.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding; cover embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the back of the front cover: "Kitāb al-Aghawānī". "ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Aḥmad ʻĀṣī yatazawwaju ʻĀtikah bint Muṣṭafá al-Nābulusī".

On folio 1a: Three ownership statements, as follows: "Malakahu bi-faḍl Allāh ʻAbd al-Qādir ibn Rashīd al-Usṭuwānī; ṭarīqatuhu Shādhilī, nisbatuhu Yashruṭī. Sanat 1299 [of the Hijrah =1784/1785]." "Tamallaka hādhā al-kitāb, bi-ʻawn [...]. Sanat 1224 [of the Hijrah = 1809/1810]." "ʻInd Ḥajjū ibn Ṣallū. Sant 1224 [of the Hijrah = 1809/1810."
At the head of folio 1b: An ownership statement: "Ṣāḥibuhu Aḥmad ibn Ḥusayn Mūsá."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... wa-ammā al-ʻārifūn al-aqwiyāʼ fa-innahu lā yuḍilluhum illā bimā yunāsibuhum mimmā dhukira min anwāʻ al-iḍlāl. Wa-mā dhakarnāhu min anwāʻ al-ḍalāl qalīl bi-al-nisbah ilá mā yaẓharu bi-hi, laʻanahu Allāh, min al-anwāʻ, wa-lā taqdiru, ayyuhā al-akh, ʻalá raddihā illā bi-al-tamassuk bi-al-Sharīʻah wa-ṣuḥbat al-ʻulamāʼ al-ʻāmilīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Ashraf al-Anbiyāʼ wa-al-Mursalīn. Wa-al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn."

title: 880-02 Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī al-Harawī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī wajaba wujūd dhātih, wa-thabbata karamuhu wujūdahu wa-shuhūd ṣifātih, wa-aẓhara afʻālahu al-ḥamīdah fī ṣaḥāʼif maṣnūʻātih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá zubdat makhlūqātih wa-ʻumdat mawjūdātih, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-atbāʻih, fī ḥarakātihi wa-sakanātih. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-multajī ilá ḥaram Rabbihi al-Bārī, ʻAlī ibn Sulṭān Muḥammad al-Qārī: Lammā sharaʻtu fī sharḥ al-Fiqh al-akbar lil-Imām al-aʻẓam wa-al-humām al-aqdam, kāna fī nīyatī wa-ṭawīyatī an yakūna mukhtaṣaran, bi-ḥaythu yartafiʻu bi-hi al-mubtadī wa-yantafiʻu bi-hi al-muntahī, thumma injarra al-kalām ilá al-kalām ḥattá kharaja ʻan intiẓām al-marām, fa-sanaḥa bi-bālī wa-khayālī an aḍaʻa sharḥan mūjazan ʻalá qaṣidat 'Badʼ al-amālī' li-yakūna mufīdan lil-adānī wa-al-aʻālī, wa-yaṣīra mūjiban li-taraqqī ḥālī wa-sababan li-ḥusn maʼālī. Wa-sammaytuhu 'Ḍawʼ al-maʻālī li-Badʼ al-amālī', fa-aqūlu: Qāla al-nāẓim, wa-huwa al-Shaykh al-ʻallāmah Abū al-Ḥasan Sirāj al-Dīn ʻAlī ibn ʻUthmān al-Ūshī: ... Yaqūlu al-ʻabdu fī Badʼ al-amālī // li-tawḥīdin li-naẓmin ka-al-laʼālī ..."
Secundo folio: kamā qāla qāʼil lā tadaʻnī.
16 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and dark red leather on flap.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; with the phrases of "Badʼ al-amālī" and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.
The poem of "Badʼ al-amālī" of al-Ūshī ends with: Wa-innī al-dahra adʻū kunha wisʻī // li-man bi-al-khayri yawman qad daʻā lī.

Colophon: "Najazat bi-ʻawn Allāh wa-ḥusn tawfīqih ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-faqīr li-raḥmat Mawlāhu al-Ghanī, Muṣṭafá Ṭāyiʻ Qaṣṣāb, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-muʻallimīhi, wa-li-kāffat al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the help of God and His abundant benevolence, by the hand of the poor servant to his Rich Lord, Muṣṭafá Ṭāyiʻ Qaṣṣāb, may Gof forgive him, his parents, his teachers and all Muslims. Amen."

title: 880-02 Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-ḥikam ʻalá qulūb al-kalim bi-aḥadīyat al-ṭarīq al-amam min al-maqām al-aqdam, wa-in ikhtalafa al-nuḥal wa-al-subul, li-ikhtilāf al-umam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá mumidd al-himam min khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam, bi-al-qīl al-aqwam, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Ammā baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam fī mubashshirah raʼaytuhā fī al-ʻushr al-ākhir min Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-maḥrūsat Dimashq, wa-bi-yadihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, kitāb, fa-qāl lī: 'Hādhā Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam'. Khudhhu wa-ukhruj bi-hi ilá al-nās yantafiʻūna bi-hi. Fa-qultu: 'al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah lillāh wa-Rasūlih wa-ulī al-amr, kamā umirnā ..."
Secundo folio: fa-awwal mā alqāhu al-Mālik ʻalayy.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 18 cm; 23-24 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings, keywords and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Malakahu min faḍl Rabbih al-Ṣamad, Ibrāhīm ibn Muḥammad, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Fī sanat 1130 [of the Hijrah = 1717/1718]."

On folio 1a: "Minhāj al-muḥaqqiqīn, Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam, lil-Shaykh al-ʻalamah [al-ʻallāmah], al-ʻāmil al-mukmil al-kāmil, quṭb al-aqṭāb, qudrat [qudwat] al-ʻārifīn, zubdat al-muḥaqqiqīn, muḥyī al-millah wa-al-dīn, Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh, Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn al-ʻArab [al-ʻArabī] al-Ṭāʼī al-Ḥātimī al-Andalusī, qaddasa Allāh rūḥahu wa-nawwara ḍarīḥahu, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn min barakātihi. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: Three couplets of poetry attributed to al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Ghanī (al-Nābulusī, 1641-1731), praising Ibn al-ʻArabī and his book "Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam".
Colophon: "Katabahu li-nafsihi Darwish [Darwīsh] ʻAbd al-Qādir al-ʻUmrānī, fī 3 Rajab, sanat 1023."
Translation of the colophon: "Copied by Darwīsh ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir al-ʻUmrānī, for himself, on 3 Rajab, 1023 [of the Hijrah = 9 August, 1614]."

title: 880-02 Iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl : manuscript / Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Rūmī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-anām wa-al-mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-azwājihi wa-dhurrīyatihi ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá alladhīn ittabaʻūhum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ʻājiz al-faqīr ilá raḥmat Mawlāhu al-ghanī al-qadīr, Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahumā Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Inna al-ʻulamāʼ qālū: Dallat al-Aḥādīth al-ṣiḥāḥ ʻalá anna al-rūḥ tuʻādu ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl, lākin hādhihi al-iʻādah lā taḥṣulu bi-hā al-ḥayāh al-maʻhūdah allatī taqūmu bi-hā al-rūḥ bi-al-badan wa-tadbīrih, wa-yaḥtāju maʻahā ilá al-akl wa-al-shurb wa-al-jamāʻ, wa-innamā yaḥṣulu bi-hā lil-badan ḥayāh ukhrá, yaḥṣulu bi-hā al-imtiḥān bi-al-suʼāl. Wa-kamā anna ḥayāt al-nāʼim, wa-huwa ḥayy, ghayr ḥayāt al-mustayqiẓ, fa-inna al-nawm akhū al-mawt, wa-huwa lā yanfī ʻan al-nāʼim iṭlāq ism al-ḥayāh ʻalayhi, fa-kadhālika ḥayāt al-mayyit ʻinda iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá badanihi ghayr ḥayāt al-ḥayy, wa-hiya ḥayāh lā tanfī ʻanhu iṭlāq ism al-mawt ʻalayhi ..."
Secundo folio: shuhadāʼ kānū aw ghayr shuhadāʼ.
16.5 x 23 cm; written surface: 12 x 19 cm; 31 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; catchwords.

The treatise is wrapped in a folded sheet of paper, in which is written a letter from ʻAbd Allāh al-Zarrū, addressed to al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-Bukhārī (or al-Najjārī), dated 2 Muḥarram, 1231 (4 December, 1815), informing him that he has sent him with his paternal uncle al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Raḥmān al-Zarrū half a "raṭl" (around 1.5 kg) of soap (41 pieces).

On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Risālat Iʻādat al-rūḥ ilá al-badan waqt al-suʼāl, lil-Shaykh al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Nūḥ ibn Muṣṭafá al-Ḥanafī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-al-Muslimīn bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: A cryptic message written in separate Arabic letters (without spaces between the words) and a date 1283 of the Hijrah (1866/1867).
At the upper left corner of folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mulk al-rājī ʻafwa al-Bārī ʻabdihi Muḥammad Aḥmad ʻAlī ʻĪsá al-Najjārī.
The treatise is accompanied by a modern handwritten translation into English (name of the translator not mentioned).

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, aʻlam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman kathīran. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "God, May He be praised and glorified, is more knowledgeable. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions and grant them abundant peace. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. Amen. Amen. Amen. Amen."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan shawārid al-ṭalāq wa-al-ikhtilāʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Manfalūṭī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-jāmiʻ bayna man arāda min al-ʻibād, al-jāʻil bayna al-zawjayn libāsan li-baʻḍihimā, mā dāmā bilā nafād, wa-ʻallaqa nuṭaf qudratihi bi-al-takhalluq bi-ijtimāʻ māʼihimā in arād, aʻṭá fa-aghná, wa-manaʻa fa-afná, fa-lā mushāḥḥata fī ḥukmihi wa-lā ʻanād, al-māniʻ bayna man arāda al-manʻ baynahumā ʻalá ḥasb mā arād, al-jāʻil ʻalá taʻlīq qudratihi bi-al-tamānuʻ mabānya tadullu ʻalayhi bilā shakkin wa-lā irtidād ..."
Secundo folio: faḍlan ʻan darajātihim al-ʻāliyah.
16.2 x 23.3 cm; written surface: 9 x 16.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard cover with flap (in 13 unnumbered quires); dark red leather on spine and flap.
In large and good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings on the margins; keywords and markings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb Kashf al-qināʻ ʻan shawārid al-ṭalāq wa-al-ikhtilāʻ, lil-ʻabd al-faqīr al-Sayyid Muḥammad Shahīyah al-Shāfiʻī al-Manfalūṭī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn."
On folios 123a-123b: Different quotations on divorce and khulʻ, in a different hand.
Folio 124 is blank; text folios 1b-122b.

Colophon: "Tamma hādhā al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, ṣabīḥata yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn yawman khalat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1287, ʻalá yad kātibihi ʻAlī Badawī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This book is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, on the morning of blessed Monday, twenty eight nights having passed from the month of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1287 [of the Hijrah = 28 June, 1870], by the hand of its copyist, ʻAlī Badawī, may God forgive him, his parents and the Muslims. Amen."

title: 880-02 Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam : manuscript / Ibn al-ʻArabī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻālim, al-rāsikh, al-muḥaqqiq, al-mukāshaf, waḥīd ʻaṣrih wa-farīd dahrih,Muḥyī al-Dīn Abū ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad al-ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh munzil al-ḥikam ʻalá qulūb al-kalim bi-aḥadīyat al-ṭarīq al-amam min al-maqām al-aqdam, wa-in ikhtalafat al-nuḥal wa-al-milal, li-ikhtilāf al-umam. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá mumidd al-himam min khazāʼin al-jūd wa-al-karam, bi-al-qīl al-aqwam, Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-innī raʼaytu Rasūl Allāh, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, fī mubashshirah raʼaytuhā fī al-ʻushr al-ākhir min al-Muḥarram, sanat sabʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sittimiʼah, bi-maḥrūsat Dimashq, wa-bi-yadihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, kitāb, fa-qāl lī: 'Hādhā Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam'. Khudhhu wa-ukhruj bi-hi ilá al-nās yantafiʻūna bi-hi. Fa-qultu: 'al-Samʻ wa-al-ṭāʻah lillāh wa-li-Rasūlihi wa-ulī al-amr minnā, kamā umirnā ..."
Secundo folio: al-nafīsah allatī yadkhuluhā al-talbīs.
15 x 20 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 14.5 cm; 17 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On the front cover: Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam.
On the lower edge of the manuscript: "Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam lil-Shaykh al-Akbar."

On folio 1a: "Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam, lil-Shaykh al-Ustādh, al-ʻārif billāh wa-al-dāll ʻalayhi, Muḥammad Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn ʻAlī ibn ʻArabī al-Ḥātimī al-Ṭāʼī al-Andalusī, qaddasa Allāh sirrahu, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: A reader's statement: "Naẓara fīhi wa-taʼammala maʻāniyahu al-faqīr al-mudhnib al-Sayyid Aḥmad ibn al-Sayyid Ṣāliḥ al-Khayyāṭ, sanat 1259, fī Rabīʻ al-Thānī, 4, nahār al-Arbiʻāʼ, baʻda al-Shams [4 May, 1843]. Thamanuhu 25."

Colophon: "Tamma Kitāb Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam, ʻalá muʼallifihi ruḍwān Allāh wa-raḥmatuhu al-wāsiʻah. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Khayr Rusulihi ajmaʻīn, wa-ʻalá ikhwānihi min al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-mursalīn. Āmīn. ʻAlá yad afqar al-wará wa-khādim anʻilat al-fuqarā, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ṭāhā, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-man qaraʼa fīhi wa-taʻaṭṭafa ʻalayhi bi-daʻwah aw Fātiḥah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, wa-al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt, fī sant 1137."

Translation of the colophon: "The book of 'Fuṣūṣ al-ḥikam' is completed, may God be pleased with its author and have abundant mercy upon him. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. May prayer and peace be upon the best of all God's Messengers [Prophet Muḥammad], and upon His brethern, the Prophets and Messengers. Amen. Copied by the poorest of mankind and the servant to the sandals of the poor ones [the Sufis], Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Ṭāhā, may God forgive him, his parents, and him who reads it [the manuscript] and have sympathy towards him, by reciting an invocation or al-Fātiḥah [the first sūrah in the Qurʼān]. May God also forgive all believers, men and women, all Muslims, men and women, the living among them and the dead. In the year 1137 [of the Hijrah = 1724/1725]."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ al-Kharīdah al-bahīyah : manuscript / Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-ʻUqbāwī. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūl Allāh Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu rājī ʻafwa al-masāwī, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī: Lammā arāda Allāh bi-ḥuṣūl al-khayr al-kathīr, jadhaba al-qalb li-ʻaqīdat ahl al-tawḥīd, lil-Quṭb al-shahīr alladhī ʻamma al-nafʻ bi-hi, wa-huwa Shaykhunā Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr, fa-kānat nafʻan ṣirfan, lil-kabīr wa-al-ṣaghīr, wa-kayfa lā, wa-hiya bārizah ʻamman shughluhu bi-Rabbihi, al-muʻriḍ ʻan al-dunyā bi-yadihi wa-qalbihi, alladhī jaʻalahu Allāh bāb kull khayr lil-ʻibād ..."
Secundo folio: bi-hi fī al-dunyā yawm al-tanād.
16 x 22.7 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 15 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In large good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in purple; notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords; text within double purple frames.

Author's colophon: "Hādhā mā sahhala Allāh bi-hi min fayḍ al-Quṭb al-kabīr al-shahīr, Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Dardīr, ʻalá yad jāmiʻihi, rājī al-ʻafwa min al-balāwī, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī, khatama Allāh la-hu bi-al-īmān, wa-jaʻalahu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-aṣḥābihi mimman yuḥsharu maʻa al-muʼallif fī zumrat Sayyidī [Sayyid] al-anām, al-Hāshimī al-muẓallal bi-al-ghamām, ʻalayhi wa-ʻalá ālihi atamm al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."

Translation of the author's colophon: "This is what God facilitated from the emanation of the great and celebrated Master, Sayyidī Aḥmad al-Dardīr, by its compiler, who hopes to be spared the calamities, Muṣṭafá ibn Aḥmad al-ʻUqbāwī, may God seal his life with faith, and may He grant it also to his parents and companions, who will be gathered with the author, in the company of the Master of mankind, the Hashimite [Prophet Muḥammad], who is sheltered with the clouds, may the most perfect prayer and peace be upon him and upon his family."

Copyist's colophon: "ʻAlá yad kātibihi al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, al-dhalīl al-ḍaʻīf, al-muḍṭar li-raḥmat Rabbihi al-qadīr, al-ʻājiz al-miskīn, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, al-Qāḍī al-Manfalūṭī al-Mālikī madhhaban. Wa-billāh al-tawfīq. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. 1278, fī Rajab."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "[Copied] by the poor and despised, the lowly and feeble, who is in need of the mercy of his Mighty Lord, the inadequate and miserable, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, al-Qāḍī al-Manfalūṭī al-Mālikī madhhaban. Success comes from God. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, and on his family and companions and grant them peace. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. In Rajab, 1278 [January, 1862]."

title: 880-02 Nuzhat al-majālis wa-muntakhab al-nafāʼis. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻAbd al-Salām al-Ṣaffūrī.

notes.text: Title from reference sources.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla rajul li-Ibn Sīrīn, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu: Raʼaytu fī al-manām dīkan yaqūlu: Allāh. Allāh Allāh. Fa-qāl: Baqiya min ajalika thalāthat ayyām. Fa-kāna ka-mā qāl. Fa-nasʼalu Allāh taʻālá an yakhtuma aʻmālanā bi-al-tawḥīd fī ʻāfiyah. Wa-raʼaytu fī 'Tahdhīb al-asmāʼ wa-al-lughāt' anna Muḥammadan ibn Sīrīn adraka thalāthīn ṣaḥābīyan. Wa-kāna abūhu ʻabdan li-Anas ibn Mālik, fa-kātabahu ʻalá ʻishrīn alf dirham, fa-addāhā wa-ʻutiq. Wa-ummuhu Ṣafīyah kānat mawlāh ayḍan li-Abī Bakr al-Ṣiddīq, Raḍiya Allāh ʻanhum ajmaʻīn. Bāb 'Dhikr al-mawt wa-al-amal wa-faḍl al-ṣabr wa-al-riḍā' ..."
Secundo folio: taysīr al-ḥisāb wa-rafʻ al-ʻadhāb.
14.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with central medallion.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords.

Wa-ʻan Ibn ʻUmar wa-Anas ibn Mālik, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, qālā: Qāl al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: Inna taḥta al-ʻarsh madīnah. Wa-qāla al-Qurṭubī fī Tafsīrihi: Sabʻīna madīnah mithl al-dunyā sabʻīn marrah, mamlūʼh min al-malāʼikah, kulluhum ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall, al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣabīb al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān, Innahu ʻalá kull shayʼ qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā 'Taʻlīq ʻalá al-muqaddimah al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah' al-mansūbah lil-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: mutarādifān illā fī al-ḥajj.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 9 x 17 cm; 21 lines per page.

title: 880-02 Ghāyat al-maqṣūd li-man yataʻāṭá al-ʻuqūd : manuscript / Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī, wa-ʻalyahi tawakkulī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī ḥarrama al-sifāḥ wa-aḥalla al-nikāḥ lil-khāṣṣ wa-al-ʻāmm, wa-bayyana al-ḥarām wa-al-ḥalāl min al-nisāʼ, ʻalá lisān man arsalahu raḥmatan lil-anām. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānuhu wa-taʻālá, ʻalá mā manaḥanā min al-anʻām, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻallām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabdahu wa-rasūlah ashraf al-anām, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn bilā infiṣām. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr al-muʻtarif bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr, Aḥmad al-Dayrabī al-Shāfiʻī al-Ghunaymī: Qad saʼalanī wālidī wa-baʻḍ al-ikhwān min al-anām, aḥsana Allāh lī wa-lahum ka-al-mabdá al-khitām, an aktuba shayʼan min al-masāʼil al-sharīfah al-mutaʻalliq bi-al-nikāḥ ʻalá madhhab al-Shāfiʻī wa-Abī Ḥanīfah, fa-ajabtuhum li-dhālik ..."
Secundo folio: al-nafīs ibn ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 18.5 cm; 23 lines per page.

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.

Fa-al-yaqīīn lā yazūl bi-al-iḥtimāl, wa-al-ṣighar munāfin lil-ḥaml. Fa-idhā baqiya fīhā ṣifat al-ṣighar ḥukima bi-muḍī ʻiddatihā bi-thalāthat ashhur, wa-ḥumil al-ḥaml ʻalá annahu ḥādith fa-lā yathbut al-nasab. Alā tará annahā law aqarrat bi-muḍī al-ʻiddah, thumma wa-ladat li-sittat ashhur lam yathbut al-nasab li-wujūd dalīl al-inqiṭāʻ bi-muḍī al-ʻiddah, thumma waladat li-sittat ashhur lam yathbut al-nasab ..."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-bi-hi thiqatī. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām al-awḥad, Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn wa-al-Dunyā ibn Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, saqá Allāh tharāhu ṣabīb al-raḥmah wa-al-ruḍwān, wa-askanahu fasīḥ al-jinān, Innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr, wa-bi-ʻibādihi khabīr: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Taʻlīq lil-Imām al-ʻallāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Ramlī ʻalá Muqaddimat al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻāmil Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh taʻālá bi-raḥmatih, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: taʻālá. Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17.5 cm; 15 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark red leather on spine and flap.
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, some phrases in red; some corrections on the margins; many underlined phrases; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Taʻlīq laṭīf ʻalá al-Muqaddimah al-mashhūrah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah, taʼlīf al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah al-Shaykh Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Zāhid, lil-Shaykh al-Imām Abī al-ʻAbbās al-Ramlī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: An anecdote by a reader about why the author of "Sittūn masʼalah fi al-fiqh" was called "al-Zāhid" (the Ascetic), as follows: "Fāʼidah. Qawluhu 'Wa-yuʻrafu bi-al-Zāhid'. Wa-qad saʼala baʻḍuhum ʻan sabab tasmiyat al-Shaykh bi-al-Zāhid, wa-in kān kull walī wa-lā budda la-hu min al-zuhd. Wa-maʻa dhālik lam yashtahir bi-hi fī Miṣr illā huwa, fa-qāl: Ṣanaʻa marratan al-kaymīyah, naḥwa khamsat qanāṭīr dhahaban, thumma naẓara ilayhā, wa-qāl: 'Uffin lil-dunyā'. Thumma amara bi-ṭarḥihā fī sarāb [sirdāb] jāmiʻihi, fa-ashharahu Allāh taʻālá min dhālika al-yawm bi-al-zuhd. Intahá. ʻInānī."
Colophon: "Tammat yawm al-Aḥad, 29 Shawwāl, sanat 1268."
Translation of the colophon: "Completed on Sunday, 29 Shawwāl, 1268 [16 August, 1852]."

title: 880-02 Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, Sībawayh zamānih, farīd ʻaṣrih wa-awānih, zayn al-millah wa-al-dīn, lisān al-mutakallimīn, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn, muḥyī sunnat Sayyid al-Mursalīn, Abū Yaḥyá, Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu aʻlá farādīs jannatih, bi-mannihi wa-karamih. Āmīn: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faqqaha fī dīnihi man iṣṭafāh min al-anām, wa-hadá man irtaḍāh li-fahm mā sharraʻahu min al-aḥkām. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá jamīʻ naʻmāʼihi, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá tazāyudi ālāʼihi, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-ʻAllām. Wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā wa-Nabīyanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh sayyid al-anām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhā sharḥ ʻalá mukhtaṣarī al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu, yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilahu, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilahu. Wa-sammaytuhu "bi-Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb". Wa-Allāh al-Karīm asʼalu an yajʻalahu khāliṣan li-Wajhihi al-Karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-Jannāt al-Naʻīm ..."
Secundo folio: al-karīm wa-sababan lil-fawz bi-jannāt al-naʻīm.
19.5 x 27 cm; written surface: 9.5 x 17.5 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in 20 numbered quires).
In clear naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper, with the phrases of Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb in orange; numerous notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
Folio 199 is blank; text folios 1b-198a.

On folio 1a, within a geometrical design: "Hādhā Kitāb Tuḥfat al-ṭullāb, al-musammá bi-Sharḥ Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām wa-al-Muslimīn Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Kayfa aqūl hādhā al-kitāb mulk al-faqīr Ḥusayn ʻAql al-Shāfiʻī al-Zaʻbalāwī, wa-al-mulk lillāh taʻālá waḥdahu." And the owner's seal, which reads: "Rājī al-faḍl Ḥusayn ʻAql".

Colophon: "Qad wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-sharḥ, al-musammá bi-Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab sulṭān al-ummah wa-ḥabr al-aʼimmah, ṣāḥib al-ʻilm, al-Imām Muḥammad ibn Idrīs al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, wa-nafaʻanā bi-barakātih, qubayla ẓuhr al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, al-muwāfiq 28 Rajab, ʻām 89 min baʻd al-miʼatayn wa-al-alf, ʻalá yad kātibihi al-faqīr Ḥasan ʻAql, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-lil-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-Nabī al-Ummī, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Translation of the colophon: "This commentary, titled 'Taḥrīr Tanqīḥ al-Lubāb fī al-fiqh ʻʻalá madhhab [al-Imām al-Shāfʻī]', may God bestow His mercy upon him, let him dwell in His spacious Paradise, and benefit us by his blessing, was completed in the forenoon of blessed Monday, 28 Rajab, 1289 [of the Hijrah = 1 October, 1872], by the hand of its copyist, the poor Ḥasan ʻAql, may God forgive him, his parents and the Muslims. Amen. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, the Illiterate Prophet, and upon his family and companions and grant them peace."

title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālihi. al-Ḥamdu li-man iṣṭafá li-dīnihi khulāṣat al-ʻālamīn, wa-hadá man aḥabbahu lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn, ḥamdan nasluku bi-hi minhāj al-ʻārifīn, wa-numnaḥu bi-hi dukhūl riyāḍ al-shākirīn, wa-nashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lahu shahādata al-muqinīn, wa-nashhadu anna Sayyidinā Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, bahjat al-muwaḥḥidīn, wa-nuṣallī wa-nusallimu ʻalá al-ḥāwī li-jamīʻ faḍāʼil al-mursalīn, man nabbaha al-ʻuqūl li-taḥrīr tanqīḥ aḥkām al-dīn, al-baḥr al-muḥīṭ, al-qudwah al-ʻuẓmá fī al-ʻālamīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi, hudāt al-ummah wa-al-tābiʻīn. Wa-baʻd, fa-yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilá Mawlāh, al-rājī ʻafwa mā iqtarafahu wa-janāh, Sulaymān ibn ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafá Allāh ʻanhu wa-ʻan aḥbābihi: Qad saʼalanī baʻḍ aṣdiqāʼī al-fuḍalāʼ an ajmaʻa mā katabtuhu ʻalá nuskhatay Sharḥ al-Minhāj wa-Ḥāshiyat al-Shabrāmallisī ʻalayhi, bi-mā taḥarrara min ḥawāshīhi fī al-ṭurūs wa-qarrarathu shuyūkhī fī al-durūs, fa-ajabtuhu li-dhālik, wa-in kuntu lastu ahlan li-tilka al-masālik, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd' ..."
Secundo folio: bi-riwāyat kull kalām lā yubdaʼ fīhi.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 12 x 18.5 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 44 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some phrases preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.

title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 2 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.

notes.text: Title from the incipit of al-Juzʼ al-awwal (volume one, folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi tawakkulī. Kitāb al-Ṣawm. Furiḍa al-ṣawm fī Shaʻbān fī al-sanah al-thāniyah min al-Hijrah. Wa-shahruhu afḍal al-shuhūr, wa-huwa min khaṣāʼiṣ hādhihi al-ummah, kamā dhakarahu al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Suyūṭī, wa-naqalahu al-Ḥāfiẓ Ibn Ḥajar ʻan al-jumhūr. Wa-ḥamalū al-tashbīh al-wāqiʻ fī qawlihi taʻālá 'kamā kutiba ʻalá alladhīna min qablikum' ʻalá muṭlaq al-ṣawm, dūna qadrihi wa-zamanih. Wa-qīla innahu laysa min al-khuṣūṣīyāt bi-ḥaml al-tashbīh ʻalá ḥaqīqatih, li-annahu qīla: Mā min ummatin illā wa-qad furiḍa ʻalayhim Ramaḍān, illā annahum ḍallū ʻanhu. Qāla al-ʻAllāmah al-Ujhūrī al-Mālikī: Wa-furiḍa al-ṣiyām thānī al-Hijrah ..."
Secundo folio: ʻan farḍihi ʻalá al-muʻtamad.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 50 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some phrases preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-Juzʼ al-thānī min Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Bujayrimī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Manhaj."

Colophon: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-thānī min al-Ḥāshiyah al-madhkūrah bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi, yawm al-Aḥad al-mubārak, fī thamāniyat ʻashar yawman khalat min shahr Shaʻbān al-muʻaẓẓam, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼatayn wāḥid wa-arbaʻīn, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Rabbihi al-Raḥmān, Yūsuf Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf al-Ṣahrajtī [or al-Ṣahrijtī] baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn. Man raʼá ʻayban fa-yasturhu [fa-li-yasturhu] // Inna khayra al-nāsi man satarā."

Translation of the colophon: "The second part of the aforementioned commentary is completed, by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, on blessed Sunday, eighteen days having passed from the glorious month of Shaʻbān, of the year 1241 [of the Hijrah = 28 March, 1826], by the hand of the poor to his Merciful Lord, Yūsuf Sulaymān ibn ʻAbd al-Laṭīf al-Ṣahrajtī [or al-Ṣahrijtī] baladan, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan, may God forgive him and all Muslims. Amen. Whoever sees a blemish let him conceal it // for the best of mankind is he who conceals."

title: 880-03 al-Tajrīd li-nafʻ al-ʻabīd. Al-Juzʼ 3 : manuscript / Sulaymān ibn Muḥammad al-Bujayrimī.

notes.text: Title from the incipit of al-Juzʼ al-awwal (volume one, folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-lā tuʻassir. Kitāb al-Farāʼiḍ. Ākhiruhu ʻan al-ʻibādāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt, li-iḍṭirār al-insān ilayhimā, min ḥīn wilādatihi, dāʼiman aw ghāliban, ilá mawtihi, wa-li-annahumā mutaʻalliqān bi-idāmat al-ḥayāh al-sābiqah ʻalá al-mawt, wa-li-annahu niṣf al-ʻilm, fa-nāsaba dhikruhu fī niṣf al-kitāb. Qāla ʻalá al-Jalāl: Qawluhu, ay, masāʼil qismat al-mawārīth, ay, al-masāʼil allatī tuqsamu fīhā al-mawārīth, ka-al-masʼalah allatī takūnu min thamāniyah, ka-zawjah wa-bint wa-ʻam, wa-ka-allatī takūnu min sittah, fa-laysa al-murād bi-al-farāʼiḍ al-anṣibāʼ ..."
Secundo folio: wa-huwa mā yukhallifuhu min ḥaqq.
16.5 x 24 cm; written surface: 12 x 18 cm; 27 lines per page.
Binding: In light brown leather binding with flap (in 49 numbered quires); cover and flap embossed central medallion.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some phrases preceded by the word "Qawluhu" (his saying) in red; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-Juzʼ al-thālith min Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Sulaymān al-Bujayrimī ʻalá Sharḥ al-Manhaj li-Shaykh al-Islām Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻufiya ʻanhu. Āmīn."

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih, ʻalá yad al-faqīr ilá Allāh Yūsuf Sulaymān Yūsuf ʻAbd al-Laṭīf Muḥammad al-Ṣahrajtī [or al-Ṣahrijtī], al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan wa-khurqatan, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn wa-al-Muslimāt, wa-al-muʼminīn wa-al-muʼmināt, al-aḥyāʼ minhum wa-al-amwāt, wa-li-man ṭālaʻa fīhi min al-ʻulamāʼ wa-al-fuqahāʼ. Wa-al-ḥmadu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi al-ṭāhirīn. Āmīn. Taḥrīran fī khamasat ayyām maḍat min shahr Rabīʻ al-Thānī, sanat 1241. Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Kamula al-kitābu fa-takāmalat // rutab al-kamāli li-ṣāḥibih. Wa-ʻafá al-Ilāhu bi-mannihi // wa-bi-jūdihi ʻan kātibih."

Translation of the colophon: "The book is completed by the praise of God, His help and His abundant benevolence, by the hand of the poor to God, Yūsuf Sulaymān Yūsuf ʻAbd al-Laṭīf Muḥammad al-Ṣahrajtī [or al-Ṣahrijtī], al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan wa-khurqatan. May God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims, men and women, the faithful men and the faithful women, the living among them and the dead. May God also forgive those who read it; the learned and Islamic law scholars. Praise be to God Lord of the Universe. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and his virtuous family. Amen. Dated, five days having passed of the month of Rabīʻ al-Thānī, the year 1241 [17 November, 1825]. God is more knowledgeable of what is correct. The book is completed; thus are completed // the ranks of perfection to its author. May God forgive, by His generosity // and His benevolence, its copyist."

title: 880-02 al-Dirāyah sharḥ al-Hidāyah : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī ibn Ḥajar al-ʻAsqalānī.

notes.text: Title from the preliminary leaf.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlā maʻālim al-ʻilm wa-aʻlāmah, wa-aẓhara shaʻāʼir al-Sharʻ wa-aḥkāmah, wa-baʻatha rusulan wa-anbiyāʼ, ṣalawāt Allāh ʻalayhim ajmaʻīn, ilá sabīl al-ḥaqq hādīn, wa-akhlafahum ʻulamāʼ ilá sunan sinanihim dāʻīn, yaslukūn fīmā lam yuʼthar ʻanhum maslak al-ijtihād, mustarshidīn minhu fī dhālik, wa-Huwa walī al-irshād, wa-khaṣṣa awāʼil al-mustanbiṭīn bi-al-tawfīq ḥattá waḍaʻū masāʼil min kull jalī wa-daqīq, ghayra anna al-ḥawādith mutaʻāqibah al-wuqūʻ, wa-al-nawāzil yaḍīqu ʻanhā niṭāq al-mawḍūʻ, wa-iqtināṣ al-shawārid bi-al-iqtibās min al-mawārid wa-al-iʻtibār bi-al-amthāl min ṣanʻat al-rijāl ..."
