On the preliminary page: "Kitāb fiqh". "al-Dirāyah sharḥ al-Hidāyah". "Kubaykij".
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "al-Mulk lillāh al-Wāḥid al-Fard. Dakhala hādhā al-kitāb fī mulk Ṣ́āliḥ al-Barm, bi-al-shirāʼ al-sharʻī."

Text ends with: "... illā anna fī al-ghallah yaḥullu lil-fuqarāʼ dūna al-aghniyāʼ, wa-fīmā siwāhu min sukná al-khān wa-al-istisqāʼ min al-biʼr wa-al-siqāyah, wa-ghayr dhālik, yastawī fīhi al-faqīr wa-al-ghanī, wa-al-fāriq huwa al-ʻurf bayna al-faṣlayn, fa-inna ahl al-ʻurf yurīdūna bi-dhālik fī al-ghallah al-fuqarāʼ, wa-fī ghayrihā al-taswiyah baynahum wa-bayna al-aghniyāʼ, wa-li-anna al-ḥājah tashtamilu al-ghanī wa-al-faqīr fī al-shurb wa-al-nuzūl, wa-al-ghanī lā yaḥtāju ilá ṣarf hādhihi al-ghallah."
Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb wa-ilayhi al-marjiʻ [wa-]al-maʼāb. Tammat."
Translation of the colophon: "God is more knowledgable of what is correct. To Him is the reference and returning."

title: 880-02 al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ bi-taḥrīr Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Abī Sharīf.

notes.text: Title of al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ bi-taḥrīr Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ from reference sources.
Title of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī uṣūl al-fiqh wa-al-dīn from incipit (folio 115b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ bi-taḥrīr Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. Qāla al-faqīr Muḥammad ibn Abī Sharīf al-Maqdisī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu: Aḥmadu Allāh ʻalá mā manaḥa min al-ayd bi-anwār uṣūl [al-uṣūl] al-sharīfah, wa-manaḥa min ijtilāʼ asrār qawāʻidihā al-badīʻah, wa-uṣallī wa-usallimu ʻalá man jumiʻat la-hu jawāmiʻ al-kalim, wa-khuṣṣa bi-ʻumūm al-baʻthah ilá al-umam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābih al-hādīn ilá awḍaḥ amam, wa-aqūlu: Innahu lammā kāna kitāb 'Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ' taʼlīf al-ʻAllāmah, Qāḍī al-quḍāh, Tāj al-Dīn, Abī Naṣr, ʻAbd al-Wahhāb ibn Shaykh al-Islām Qāḍī al-quḍāh, Taqī al-Dīn, Abī al-Ḥasan al-Subkī, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhumā, yajrī min kutub al-uṣūl majrá al-insān min al-ʻayn wa-al-ʻayn min al-insān, qad ajāda fī waḍʻihi muʼallifuhu kull al-ijādah, wa-aḥsana kull al-iḥsān, ḥattá innahu fī al-ḥaqīqah khulāṣat kull basīṭ, wa-mustaṣfá kull wajīz fī al-fann wa-wasīṭ, wa-kāna sharḥuhu lil-ʻAllāmah Jalāl al-Dīn Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, qad ḥalla min al-shurūḥ maḥalla al-badr min al-kawākib wa-al-ṣadr min al-mawākib, ghayra annahu limā ghuliba ʻalayhi min al-ījāz kādat ishārātuhu fī baʻḍ al-mawāḍiʻ tuʻaddu min al-alghāz, ḥadānī dhālika ilá taʻlīq ḥawāshin taftaḥu min al-Sharḥ mughlaqah wa-tūḍiḥu mujmalah ..."
Secundo folio of al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ bi-taḥrīr Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ: idh al-thanāʼ al-tafṣīlī amr.

Incipit of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī uṣūl al-fiqh wa-al-dīn (folio 115b): "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā, Qāḍī al-quḍāh, Shaykh mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, ṣadr Miṣr wa-Makkah wa-al-Shām, ḥasanat al-layālī wa-al-ayyām, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, amtaʻa Allāh bi-wujūdihi al-anām wa-ḥasharahu fī zumrat Khayr al-Anām: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aʻlá maʻālim dīn al-Islām, wa-bayyana lanā qawānīn al-sharʻ wa-al-aḥkām, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad khayr al-anām, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi al-bararah al-kirām. Wa-baʻd, fa-hādhihi Ḥāshiyah wa-ḍaʻtuhā ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī uṣūl al-fiqh wa-al-dīn li-Shaykhinā al-Imām al-muḥaqiq, wa-al-ḥabr al-mudaqqiq, Abī ʻAbd Allāh Muḥammad Jalāl al-Dīn ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá, taftaḥu minhu mughlaqah, wa-tubayyinu mujmalah, wa-tubrizu mā ahmalah, maʻa bayān mā yuraddu ʻalayhi wa-al-jawāb ʻanhu, in amkan, wa-qad ataʻarraḍu fīhā li-kalām al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh, li-īḍāḥ, aw ghayrih. Wa-Allāh asʼal an yanfaʻa bi-hā, fa-innahu qarībun mujīb ..."
Secundo folio of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī uṣūl al-fiqh wa-al-dīn: qawluhu al-mubṭil ṣifat tark.
15.8 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15 cm; 23 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard cover with flap; light brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; some corrections on the margins; some markings in red; catchwords.
Some leaves of the codex might be missing or misplaced.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyat Ibn Abī Sharīf ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-Jawāmiʻ, raḥima Allāh muʼallifihā wa-al-Muslimīn ajmaʻīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a and folio 115a: An endowment statement: "Waqf al-Shaykh ʻUthmān al-Būṣīrī. Awqafa wa-ḥabasa wa-taṣaddaqa al-Shaykh ʻUthmān al-Būṣīrī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá wa-tajāwaza ʻan sayyiʼātih, hādhā al-kitāb al-musammá bi-Ḥāshiyat Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ, lil-ʻAllāmah Ibn Abī Sharīf, ʻalá ahl al-ʻilm bi-al-Jāmiʻ al-Azhar, wa-sharaṭa an yūḍaʻa fī Khizānat al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Balshūnī, bi-Ḥārat al-Shaykh Sulṭān, taḥta yad al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Shāfī al-Shubayshī [or al-Shabīshī], waqfan ṣaḥīḥan sharʻīyan, lā yubāʻ, wa-lā yūhab, wa-lā yurhan, wa-lā yutaṣarrafu fīhi bi-wajh min al-wujūh; fa-man baddalahu baʻdamā samiʻahu fa-innamā ithmuhu ʻalá alladhīna yubaddilūnahu. Ṣadara dhālika fī shahr Muḥarram sanat 1129 min al-Hijrah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām."
On folio 115a: "Ḥāshiyat Shaykh al-Islām ʻalá al-Maḥallī ʻalá Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ."

Colophon of al-Durar al-lawāmiʻ bi-taḥrīr Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-iʻlam anna al-kasr bi-hādhā al-taʻrīf alladhī iqtaṣara ʻalayhi al-muṣannif, ghayr qādiḥ, lā ʻalá ṭarīq al-Āmidī wa-Ibn al-Ḥājib, al-musammá ʻindahumā bi-al-naqḍ al-maksūr, wa-lā ʻalá ṭarīq al-Imām al-Bayḍāwī, kamā sa-yaẓharu laka fīmā baʻd, li-yataʻallaqa bi-hi al-jārr wa-al-majrūr, yūhimu annahu law lam yadhkurhu lam yakun lil-jārr wa-al-majrūr mutaʻalliq, wa-laysa kadhālika. Bal, law qāla: Wa-minhā al-kasr ʻalá al-ṣaḥīḥ la-kāna al-maʻná. Wa-min al-qawādiḥ al-kasr. Wa-taʻalluqu qawlihi ʻalá al-ṣaḥīḥ bi-mutaʻalliq minhā ..."

Colophon of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī uṣūl al-fiqh wa-al-dīn: "Wa-qad intahá naqlu mā manna Allāh taʻālá bi-hi, itqān muḥarririhi wa-ḥawāshī muḥabbirihi, ilá al-mubayyaḍah, fī al-thāmin [min] Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1148, bi-al-Qāhirah al-maḥrūsah. Taqabbala Allāh minhu, wa-shakara saʻyahu, wa-nafaʻanā bi-hi, wa-aʻāda ʻalaynā wa-ʻalá jamīʻ al-Muslimīn min barakatih wa-madadih, bi-jāh Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālih, Innahu jawwādun karīm, raʼūfun raḥīm. Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-kitāb al-sharīf al-mubārak fajra yawm al-Aḥad, thālith yawm fī Shawwāl, min shuhūr sanat alf wa-miʼah wa-thamāniyah wa-ʻishrīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá musharrifihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām. Taʻlīq al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr al-muʻtarif li-Sayyidihi bi-al-ʻajz wa-al-taqṣīr."

Translation of the colophon of Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ fī uṣūl al-fiqh wa-al-dīn: "The transfer of what God, may He be praised, facilitated, of the perfection of its author and the glosses of its refiner, to the fair copy, was completed on 8 Dhī al-Ḥijjah, 1148 [of the Hijrah = 20 April 1736], in protected Cairo. May God accept it from him, look favorably upon his endeavor, benefit us by him, and bestow upon us and all Muslims his blessings and support, through the intercession of our Master Muḥammad and his family. He is Generous and Benevolent, Merciful and Compassionate. This noble and blessed book was completed on the dawn of Sunday, 3 Shawwāl, 1128 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [20 September, 1716], may the best prayer and peace be upon Him. Copied by the poor and despised, who confesses to his Master his inability and inadequacy."

title: 880-02 Ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah : manuscript / ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd al-Maḥbūbī.

notes.text: Title from Incipit (folio 2a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi tammim bi-al-khayr. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá khayr khalqihi Muḥammad wa-ālihi ajmaʻīn. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-mutawassil ilá Allāh bi-aqwá al-dharīʻah, ay, al-wasīlah, ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd ibn Tāj al-Sharīʻah, suʻida jadduhu wa-unjiḥa jidduhu: Hādhā 'Ḥall al-mawāḍiʻ al-mughlaqah min Wiqāyat al-riwāyah fī masāʼil al-Hidāyah' allatī allafahā jaddī wa-ustādhī, Mawlānā al-aʻẓam, ustādh ʻulamāʼ al-ʻālam, Burhān al-Sharīʻah wa-al-Ḥaqq wa-al-Dīn, Maḥmūd ibn Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah, jazāhu Allāh ʻannī wa-ʻann jamīʻ al-Muslimīn khayr al-jazāʼ, li-ajl ḥifẓī. Wa-al-Mawlá al-muʼallif lammā allafahā sabqan wa-katab, wa-kuntu ajrī mā ajrī fī maydān ḥifẓihi ṭalqan, ḥattá ittafaqa tamām taʼlīfihi maʻa itmām ḥifẓī intashara baʻḍ al-nusakh ilá al-aṭrāf. Thumma baʻda dhālika waqaʻa fīhā shayʼ min al-taghayyurāt wa-nubadh min al-maḥw wa-al-ithbāt, fa-katabtu fī hādhā al-sharḥ al-ʻibārah allatī taqarrara ʻalayhi al-matn, li-taghayyur al-nusakh al-maktūbah ilá hādhā al-namaṭ. Wa-al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf lammā shahida fī akthar al-nās kasalan ʻan ḥifẓ al-Wiqāyah akhadhtu ʻanhā mukhtaṣaran mushtamilan ʻalá mā lā budda li-ṭālib al-ʻilm minhu, fa-aftaḥu fī hādhā al-sharḥ mughlaqātihi ayḍan ..."
Secundo folio: lā yadkhulu al-mirfaqān wa-al-kaʻbān fī al-ghasl.
21.5 x 31.5 cm; written surface: 13 x 21.5 cm; 26 lines per page.
Binding: In black buckram; dark brown leather on spine.

In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; many notes and corrections on the margins; some markings in red; some in red; some wormholes on the margins without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: Miscellaneous quotations and anecdotes.

On folio 1a: Two marriage records, for: 1. "Ḥusayn ibn ʻAbd Allāh, al-sākin bi-qaṣabat 'Lafkah'" and "Mārghrū [Margro, Magrete] bint ʻAbd Allāh, al-sākinah bi-al-qaṣabah al-mazbūrah. Shuhūd al-ḥāl: Mawlānā Khiḍr Khalīfah al-Khaṭīb. Maḥḍar, Ḥasan ʻAbd Allāh. Maḥḍar, Tarjumān ʻAbd Allāh wa-ghayrihim wa-al-ḥāḍirīn." 2. "Muṣṭafá ibn Iskandar, al-sākin bi-qaryat Qarqūr" and "Khristīnah [Christina] bint ʻAbd Allāh al-sākinah bi-qaryat [...]."
On folio 1b: Quotations from "al-Muntakhab min Zahr al-ʻarīsh fī aḥkām al-ḥashīsh."

On folio 2a: An ownership statement: "Istaṣḥabahu al-ʻabd al-faqīr ilayhi subḥānahu wa-taʻālá al-Ḥājj ʻUmar Raʼfat ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān Nūrī al-Kuraydī al-Ḥanafī al-Naqshabandī, sanat 147/12." Two seals. Partially legible ownership statement.
On folio 2a: "Kitāb Ṣadr al-Sharīʻah". Titles of the 55 chapters of the codex (Start with 'Kitāb al-Ṭahārah' and end with 'Kitāb al-Khunthá').

On folio 175b: An ownership statement: "Qad intaqala ilayya hādhā al-kitāb min Abī al-Ḥājj Muṣṭafá Afandī ibn ʻAbd al-Raḥīm Afandī ibn Qarah Qāḍī Muṣṭafá Afandī. Wa-anā al-faqīr Nūrī, al-Imām bi-Jāmiʻ Ṣūfī Muḥammad Bāshā." Seal.

Colophon: "Tammat bi-ʻawn Allāh taʻālá wa-ḥusn tawfīqihi. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl. Waqaʻa al-farāgh min taḥrīr hādhihi al-nuskhah al-mubārak [al-mubārakah] ʻalá yad al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-naḥīf, al-faqīr al-muḥtāj ilá raḥmat Rabbihi allaṭīf [al-Laṭīf], Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥājj Muṣṭafá al-maʻrūf bi-Ṭāʼifat Siqillīyah, ʻāmalahum Allāh bi-luṭfihi wa-karamihi al-jalī wa-al-khafī, yawm lil-Ithnayn [al-Ithnayn], maḍá sittah wa-ʻishrīn min shahr Rajab al-murjib, min shuhūr sanat sabʻ wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah. Wa-al-ḥmadu lillāh waḥdah. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbih ajmaʻīn. al-ʻAbd ʻāṣī, wa-Rabb [wa-al-Rabb] ʻāfī. al-Khaṭṭ bāqī wa-al-ʻabd fānī."

Translation of the colophon: "It is completed by the help of God, may He be praised, and His abundant benevolence. Praise be to God, for the completion and perfection. This blessed copy was written by the hand of the weak, feeble and poor servant, who is in need of the mercy of his gracious Lord, Muḥyī al-Dīn ibn Muḥammad ibn Ḥājj Muṣṭafá al-maʻrūf bi-Ṭāʼifat Siqillīyah, may God treat them all with His visible and invisible graciousness and benevolence, on Monday, 26 days having passed in the month of Rajab, of the year 967 [of the Hijrah = 2 May, 1560]. Praise be to God alone. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and all his companions. The servant is rebellious, but the Lord is forgiving. The script endures, but the servant perishes."

title: 880-02 Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Ibrāhīm Ḥijāzī al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī al-Aḥmadī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī khaṣṣa ahl al-ʻilm bi-al-iḥsān wa-man ʻallamahum maʻrifat al-uṣūl wa-al-tibyān, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyid walad ʻAdnān, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi dawī al-qadr wa-al-shān. Wa-baʻd. Hādhihi Ḥāshiyah ʻalá al-Sharḥ alladhī allafahu al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh Jalāl al-Dīn al-Maḥallī ʻalá matn Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ al-mansūb li-ʻAbd al-Wahhāb Taqī al-Dīn ibn al-Subkī, jamaʻahā al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī min taqrīr Shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah Muḥammad ʻUbādah, alladhī katabahu ʻan Shaykh al-Mashāyikh, al-Shaykh ʻAlī al-ʻAdawī, wa-min taqrīr shaykhihi al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Aḥmad al-Bīlī, wa-min Ḥāshiyat al-Najjārī, wa-min al-Kamāl ibn Abī Sharīf, wa-min Ḥāshiyat al-Kinānī, wa-ghayr dhālik. Wa-asʼalu Allāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm lahā. Āmīn."
Secundo folio: min taʻalluqihi bi-al-ḥamd.
17 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 14 x 19 cm; 37-41 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion (in 35 numbered quires).

In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of the original texts preceded by the phrase "qawluhu" (his saying); some comments on the margins; some corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhihi Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ, jamaʻahā al-faqīr Ibrāhīm Ḥijāzī al-Sandiyūnī al-Shāfiʻī min ḥawāshī al-Kitāb al-Karīm. Ijʻalhā khāliṣatan li-Wajhika al-Karīm. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: "Aḥmad al-Hāshimī al-Ḥanafī al-Azharī al-Ashʻarī al-Aḥmadī." "al-Shaykh Ibrāhīm al-Sandayūnī."
At the top of each quire: An endowment statement, as follows: "Waqf lillāh taʻālá ʻalá ṭalabat al-ʻilm bi-al-Azhar, wa-maḥalluhā Khizānat al-Najjārī fī Ḥārat al-Bashābishah."

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min jamʻ hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah yawm al-Khamīs al-mubārak, awwal shahr Jumād Awwal, alladhī huwa min shuhūr sanat 1229. Allāhumma ighfir li-mā [li-man] ṭālaʻahā, wa-daʻā li-man jamaʻahā bi-al-maghfirah. Allāhumma ighfir lanā wa-li-wālidīnā, wa-li-mashāyikhinā, wa-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Wa-hādhihi al-ḥāshiyah majmūʻah min taqārīr al-ʻAllāmah Shaykh al-Mashāyikh al-ʻAdawī alladhī [allatī] katabahā Shaykhunā al-Shaykh Muḥammad ʻUbādah, wa-min al-Najjārī, wa-Ibn Abī Sharīf, wa-al-Bannānī, wa-taqrīr Shaykhinā al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Bīlī, wa-ghayr dhālik. Allāhumma taqabbalhā min faḍlika wa-karamik. Yā Allāh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalayhi [wa-ʻalá ālihi] wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallama taslīman. ʻAlá yad afqar al-ʻibād ilá Allāh taʻālá, alladhī jamaʻahā wa-katabahā fī waqt ḍīq wa-ẓulm kathīr, al-faqīr Ibrāhīm al-Sandiyūnī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan, wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl."

Translation of the colophon: "The compilation of this commentary was completed on blessed Thursday, the beginning of Jumād Awwal, 1229 [of the Hijrah = 21 April, 1814]. O God forgive him who reads it and invokes forgiveness to its compiler. O God pardon us, our parents, our masters and all Muslims. This commentary was compiled from the glosses of al-ʻAllāmah Shaykh al-Mashāyikh al-ʻAdawī, which were recorded by our Master al-Shaykh Muḥammad ʻUbādah, and from al-Najjārī, Ibn Abī Sharīf and al-Bannānī, and from the gloss of our Master al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Bīlī, and others. O God accept it for the sake of Your favor and benevolence. O God. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions and grant them abundant peace. By the hand of the poorest of servants to God Almighty, who compiled and recorded it, at a time of great distress and oppression, the poor Ibrāhīm al-Sandiyūnī, al-Shāfiʻī madhhaban, al-Aḥmadī ṭarīqatan. God suffices us. He is the best advocate."

title: 880-02 Sharḥ Muqaddimat al-Zāhid  : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.

notes.text: Title supplied by cataloger.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla al-Shaykh al-ajall al-awḥad, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah Abū al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad ibn Ḥamzah al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatihi wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Ashraf al-Mursalīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā Taʻlīq ʻalá al-Muqaddimat al-maʻrūfah bi-al-Sittīn masʼalah, al-mansūbah lil-Shaykh Abī al-ʻAbbās Aḥmad al-Zāhid, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih wa-ruḍwānih. Āmīn, yaḥullu alfāẓahā, wa-yutammimu mafādahā. Wa-asʼalu Allāh taʻālá min faḍlihi al-jazīl an yanfaʻa bi-hi, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: wa-ammā al-wājib fa-huwa mā ʻadā al-farḍ.
17 x 22.5 cm; written surface: 8.5 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in one quire).
In clear naskh script, in black ink, on white paper, the phrases of 'al-Sittūn masʼalah' in red; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-Sittīn masʼalah lil-Shaykh al-Ramlī ʻalá al-tamām wa-al-kamāl, wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá kull ḥāl. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends abruptly with: "... wa-furūḍ al-ṣalāh, ay, arkānuhā, thamāniyah ʻashar: al-Awwal, al-nīyah bi-al-qalb, li-qawlihi, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam: 'Innamā al-aʻmāl bi-al-nīyāt'. Wa-yajibu an yanwiya fī al-farīḍah thalāthat ashyāʼ ..."

title: 880-03 Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī faḍḍala ʻulamāʼ al-Sharīʻah ʻalá man siwāhum fī al-dārayn, wa-jaʻalahum maljaʼan li-ʻibādihi wa-ijtabāhum. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá al-Nabī al-aʻẓam wa-al-Rasūl al-akram, Sayyidinā Muḥammad, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá sāʼir ikhwānihi min al-nabīyīn wa-al-mursalīn, wa-al-ṣaḥābah wa-al-qarābah wa-al-tābiʻīn, wa-ʻalá sāʼir aʼimmat al-dīn, khuṣūṣan al-arbaʻah al-mujtahidīn, wa-muqallidīhim ilá Yawm al-Dīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu afqar al-ʻibād ilá Mawlāhu al-Qadīr, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Dardīr: Hādhā 'Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá al-Mukhtaṣar' lil-Imām al-jalīl, al-ʻAllāmah Abī al-Ḍiyāʼ Sayyidī Khalīl, iqtaṣartu fīhi ʻalá fatḥ mughlaqih wa-taqyīd muṭlaqih, wa-ʻalá al-muʻtamad min aqwāl ahl al-madhhab, bi-ḥaythu matá iqtaṣartu ʻalá qawl, kāna huwa al-rājiḥ alladhī tajibu bi-hi al-fatwá, wa-in iʻtamada baʻḍ al-shurrāḥ khilāfah. Wa-billāh taʻālá astaʻīn, wa-ʻalayhi atawakkal, fa-innahu al-Mawlá al-Karīm alladhī ʻalayhi al-muʻawwal ..."
Secundo folio: li-anna al-awlá taqdīr al-mutaʻallaq.
16.5 x 23.5 cm; written surface: 9 x 15.5 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown cover with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion (in 50 mostly unnumbered quires).

In large naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of "al-Mukhtaṣar" of Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī, in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.

On folio 1a: "Kitāb munaḥ al-Mawlá li-Ustādhinā wa-ʻumdatinā al-ʻAllāmah al-Dardīr li-ḥall durar al-ʻAllāmah al-Imām Hibat al-Jalīl Sayyidī Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Mālikī, ʻammat barakātuhumā, wa-nuhilat nafaḥātuhumā, wa-ʻādat ʻalaynā ʻawāʼiduhumā. Āmīn."
On folio 1a: "ʻIddat karārīsihi 49 wa-niṣf, minhum min hādhā al-khaṭṭ karārīs 33, wa-mā baqiya min khaṭṭ al-juzʼ al-thānī."
Folios 331-495, copied in a different hand.
On the upper left corner of folio 495a: "Balagha muqābalatan ʻalá nuskhat al-muʼallif wa-ḥuḍūran ʻalayh."
Colophon: "Tamma al-juzʼ al-awwal bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih. Wa-yalīhi al-juzʼ al-thānī, wa-awwaluhu 'Bāb al-Khulʻ'. Tamm. Tamm. Tamm."

Translation of the colophon: "Part one is completed by the praise of God and His help. It will be followed by 'Part two' which starts with 'Bāb al-Khulʻ' [divorce initiated by the wife]. Completed. Completed. Completed."

title: 880-02 al-Jawharah al-munīfah fī sharḥ Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah : manuscript / Munlā Ḥusayn ibn Iskandar al-Rūmī al-Ḥanafī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 2a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi thiqatī. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-mutawaḥḥid bi-wujūb al-wujūd wa-al-baqāʼ, al-mutafarrid bi-al-qudrah al-kāmilah wa-al-ʻizz wa-al-kibriyāʼ, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá khayr khalqih Muḥammad, ashraf al-anbiyāʼ, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-bararah al-atqiyāʼ. Yaqūlu al-ʻabd al-ḥaqīr al-faqīr ilá Mawlāhu al-ʻazīz al-ghanī al-madʻū bi-Munlā Ḥusayn ibn Iskandar al-Ḥanafī, ʻāmalahu Allāh bi-luṭfihi al-khafī: Wa-baʻd, fa-innī istakhartu Allāh taʻālá fī waḍʻ sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá kitāb al-Waṣīyah, al-mansūb ilá al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah, raḍiya Allāh ʻanh, baʻda an waqaftu ʻalá sharḥihi lil-ʻAllāmah al-Akmal, wa-huwa sharḥ ʻaẓīm, lākin fī ʻibārātihi diqqah, wa-fīhi ayḍan dhikr madhāhib al-firaq al-ḍāllah, fa-yaʻsuru ʻalá al-mutaʻallimīn al-tamyīz; fa-innī, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, adhkuru al-ʻibārāt al-wāḍiḥah, wa-lā adhkuru madhāhib al-firaq al-ḍālah istiqlālan, wa-ayḍan azīdu fīhi, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, fawāʼida laṭīfah jalīlah, min al-targhīb wa-al-tarhīb. Wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Jawharah al-munīfah fī sharḥ Waṣīyat Abī Ḥanīfah' ..."
Secundo folio: sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá kitāb al-Waṣīyah.
12.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 5 x 11.5 cm; 10 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with dark brown leather on spine.
In clear ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of the "Wasīyah" in red; some note and corrections on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā kitāb Sharḥ mukhtaṣar ʻalá kitāb Waṣīyat al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah, raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanh."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-Sharḥ lil-Shaykh Muḥammad Maḥmūd al-maʻrūf bi-Akmal al-Dīn, kamā naṣṣa ʻalayhi ṣāḥib Kashf al-ẓunūn, wa-nabbaha ʻalayhi kātibuhu Aḥmad ʻUmar al-Maḥmaṣānī."

Author's colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Rasūlihi khayr al-anām. Wa-qad waqaʻa al-farāgh min taʼlīf 'Sharḥ Kitāb al-Waṣīyah' nahār al-Thulāthāʼ, al-thālith ʻashar min Jumādá al-Awwal, sanat alf wa-sabʻah wa-sittīn min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah. Wa-al-ḥamd lillāh waḥdah. Tamm."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Praise be to God for the completion. May prayer and peace be upon His Messenger, the best of mankind. The composition of 'Sharḥ Kitāb al-Waṣīyah' was completed on Tuesday, 13 Jumādá al-Awwal, 1067 of the Hijrah of the Prophet [27 February, 1657]. Praise be to God alone. It is completed."

title: 880-03 al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah : manuscript / Zayn al-Dīn ibn Ibrāhīm ibn Nujaym.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-[bi-hi] nastaʻīn. al-Ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-baʻd, fa-lammā yassara Allāh taʻālá itmām 'Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir al-fiqhīyah ʻalá madhhab al-Ḥanafīyah' al-mushtamil ʻalá sabʻat funūn, aradtu an ufahrisahu fī awwalihi li-yashula al-naẓar fīhi. al-Fann al-awwal fī al-qawāʻid, wa-hiya khams wa-ʻishrūn qāʻidah, [...] qawāʻid kullīyah wa-bawāqīhā qawāʻid juzʼīyah yankhariju ʻalayhi mā lā yanḥaṣiru min al-ṣuwar al-juzʼīyah. al-Ūlá lā thawāb illā bi-al-nīyah, wa-fīhā bayān mā yakūnu al-nīyah fīhi sharṭan wa-mā lā takūnu, wa-bayān dukhūlihā fī al-ʻibādāt wa-al-muʻāmalāt wa-al-khuṣūmāt wa-al-mubāḥāt wa-al-manāhī wa-al-matrūk ..."
Secundo folio: bi-al-ḥall wa-al-ḥurmah bi-iʻtibār mā quṣida la-hu.
12.5 x 19.7 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 13 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In dark brown leather binding with flap; cover embossed with central medallion and decorative frame; spine of the flap embossed with four small central medallions.

In small naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; some notes on the margins in Arabic and Ottoman Turkish; some corrections on the margins; some leaves are water-damaged; catchwords.

On folio 1a: Copyist's statement: "Katabtuhu bi-yadī al-fāniyah, anā al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr, ʻUmar ibn Abī Bakr ibn Muḥammad, al-Imām wa-al-Khaṭīb bi-Jāmiʻ al-Ghāzī Ḥikmat Pāshā." Seal of "ʻUmar ibn Abū Bakr".
On folio 1a: An ownership statement: "Mimmā anʻama Allāh taʻālá bi-al-irth minhu, raḥimahu al-Raḥmān wa-askanahu farādīs al-jinān [... ... ...] ibnuhu ʻUmar, ʻufiya [...]." An illegible seal.
On the lower edge of the codex: "Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir."

Author's colophon: "Wa-hādhā akhir mā awradtu min 'Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān', raḍiya Allāh taʻālá ʻanhu wa-arḍāh, al-jāmiʻ lil-funūn al-sabʻah allatī waʻadnā bi-hā fī khuṭbatihi al-farīdah fī nawʻihi, bi-ḥaythu lam uṭāliʻ la-hu ʻalá naẓīr fī kutub aṣḥābinā, raḥimahum Allāh taʻālá. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min taʼlīfihi fī al-sābiʻ wa-al-ʻishrīn min Jumādá al-Ākhirah, sanat tisʻ wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah. Wa-kānat muddat taʼlīfihi sittat ashhur, maʻa takhallul ayyām tawaʻʻuk al-jasad. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá al-tamām, wa-ʻalá Nabīyihi afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām, wa-ṣaḥbihi al-bararah al-kirām, wa-tābiʻīhi bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Qiyām. Wa-katabahu bi-yadihi al-fāniyah Zayn ibn Nujaym al-Ḥanafī, ghafara Allāh la-hu dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, wa-raḥima wālidayhi, wa-kashafa kurūbahu, wa-khatama la-hu bi-al-khayr ʻamalahu. Āmīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "This is the end of what I wanted to record in 'Kitāb al-Ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir fī al-fiqh ʻalá madhhab al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abī Ḥanīfah al-Nuʻmān', may God Almighty, be pleased with him and treat him favorably, including the seven themes which we promised in its introduction; a unique book, I have never read something similar to it in the works of our colleagues, may God Almighty have mercy upon them. It was completed on 27 Jumādá al-Ākhirah, the year 969 [of the Hijrah = 14 March, 1562], in a span of six months, interposed with days of indisposition of the body. Praise be to God on the completion. May the best prayer and peace be upon God's Prophet, and upon his righteous and honorable companions and those who graciously follow him until the Day of Resurrection. Written by Zayn ibn Nujaym al-Ḥanafī, in his perishing hand. May God forgive him his shortcomings, cover his blemishes, have mercy upon his parents, calm down his agonies and seal his work with success. Amen."

Copyist's colophon: "Wa-hādhā ākhir mā qālahu al-muʼallif, raḍiya Allāh ʻanhu wa-arḍāh, wa-jaʻala al-Jannah munqalibahu wa-mathwāh, bi-jāh Muḥammad Nabīyihi wa-Muṣṭafāh, wa-ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi wa-man wālāh. Billāhi yā mustafīdan min gharāʼibihi // lā tabkhalanna bi-an tadʻū li-kātibihi. Wa-sal min Allāhi ghufrāna al-dhunūb wa-qul // Yā Dhā al-Makārimi ighfir dhanba ṣāḥibihi."

Translation of the copyist's colophon: "This is the end of what the author said, may God be pleased with him, treat him favorably and make Paradise his abode and resting place, by the intercession of His Prophet and Chosen One, his family, his companions and his followers. By God, O you who benefit from its marvels // do not scrimp to invoke Him on behalf of its author. Implore God to forgive his sins and say // O You of Benevolence forgive the sin of its owner."

title: 880-02 al-Iḥrāz fī anwāʻ al-majāz : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-hādī man yashāʼu ilá ṣirāṭ [al-ṣrāṭ] al-mustaqīm, al-mubayyin ḥaqīqat al-majāz ilá al-sharīʻah al-samḥāʼ wa-al-dīn al-qawīm, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, al-murshshaḥ bi-al-āyāt al-Qurʼānīyah, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-muʻtaṣimīn bi-ḥablihi min al-dasāʼis al-Shayṭānīyah. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-yaqūlu faqīr Mawlāhu, Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī, ballaghahu Allāh min faḍlihi mā yatamannāhu min ḥusn al-masāʻī: 'Qad naẓamtu fī al-majāz naẓman badīʻ al-mabānī, jazīl al-maʻānī, wa-aradtu an ubayyina mā inṭawá taḥta niqābih, wa-akshifa mā khafiya min lubābih, bi-sharḥ laṭīf wa-uslūb ẓarīf, sālikan sabīl al-ikhtiṣār, wa-muqtaṣiran ʻalá al-muhimm min al-fann, ḥasbamā afādahu mashāyikhunā al-akhyār, wa-sammaytuhu 'al-Iḥrāz fī anwāʻ al-majāz', wa-ʻalá Allāh al-iʻtimād fī jamīʻ al-umūr, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl, niʻma al-mawlá wa-niʻma al-naṣīr' ..."
Secundo folio: al-ilṣāq majāz fī ghayrih.
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 8 x 15.5 cm; 19 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard binding with flap; black cloth on the spine of the cover and flap (in one quire).
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of the original poem and markings in purple; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Kitāb al-Iḥrāz fī ʻilm al-majāz, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Sujāʻī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. M. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon: No colophon. Text ends with: "... min jamīʻ al-ummah. Qāla fī al-Miṣbāḥ: 'al-Ummah, atbāʻ al-Nabī, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-al-jamʻ umam, mithla ghurfah wa-ghuraf'. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

title: 880-02 Fatḥ rawq al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal min al-maṣdar wa-naḥwihi wa-ism al-zamān wa-al-makān : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad al-Sujāʻī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ḥamdan li-man sharrafa bi-ṭalʻat Sayyidinā Muḥammad al-zamān wa-al-makān, wa-faḍḍalahu ʻalá sāʼir al-makhlūqāt min malik wa-uns wa-jān, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi al-kirām, wa-ʻalá man taṣaddara baʻdahum min al-sādah li-bayān al-aḥkām, ṣalātan wa-salāman dāʼimayn tudfaʻu bi-himā ʻannā jamīʻ al-ʻilal [wa-] al-balīyāt, wa-nakūnu min al-muqarrabīn ilá Allāh taʻālá fī al-ḥayāh wa-al-mamāt. Āmīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā taqyīd laṭīf li-naẓm al-ʻAllāmah al-Qāḍī shāriḥ al-Alfīyah li-Ibn Mālik, raḥimahumā Allāh, mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal wa-naḥwihi min al-maṣādir wa-asmāʼ al-zamān wa-al-makān. Wa-qad washshaḥtuhu bi-nafāʼis al-durar, wa-ḍammantuhu ashyāʼ kathīrah min al-masāʼil al-ghurar, wa-sammaytuhu 'Fatḥ al-rawq [rawq] al-Raḥmān bi-sharḥ mā jāʼa ʻalá mafʻal min al-maṣdar wa-naḥwihi wa-ism al-zamān wa-al-makān. Wa-Allāh asʼalu an yanfaʻa bi-hi, bi-jāh Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ḥizbihi. Āmīn ..."
Secundo folio: intahá. Wa-qawluhu min yaʼkul aw yashrab
16 x 23 cm; written surface: 11.5 x 17.5 cm; 22-25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound.
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; phrases of the original poem of al-Qāḍi shāriḥ al-Alfīyah and markings in purple; some notes and corrections on the margins; catchwords
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Sujāʻī ʻalá manẓūmat al-Qāḍī shāriḥ al-Alfīyah fī ḥukm al-maṣdar. M. M."

Author's colophon: "Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh wa-kafá, wa-salāmun ʻalá ʻibādihi alladhīna iṣṭafá. Wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá ashraf al-mursalīn wa-nukhbat Allāh min al-ʻālamīn, Sayyidinā wa-Mawlānā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ikhwānihi al-anbiyāʼ wa-al-malāʼikah al-muqarrabīn, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-al-tābiʻīn lahum bi-iḥsān ilá Yawm al-Dīn, wa-ʻalaynā minhum ajmaʻīn, bi-raḥmatika Yā Arḥm al-Rāḥimīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the author's colophon: "Praise be to God, and that is enough. May peace be upon His servants whom He had chosen. May prayer and peace be upon the Most Honorable of the Messengers, and the Choicest of God's created beings, our Lord and Master Muḥammad, and upon his brethren the prophets and the closest angels, and upon his family, his companions and those who gracefully follow them, until Judgement Day. May their peace be also upon all of us, by Your mercy, O Most Merciful of All Merciful Ones. Amen."

title: 880-02 Muʻīn al-ḥukkām fīmā yataraddadu bayna al-khaṣmayn min al-aḥkām : manuscript / ʻAlī ibn Khalīl al-Ṭarābulusī al-Ḥanafī.

notes.text: Title from folio 2b.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "[Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm]. Tabāraka alladhī abdaʻa al-mawjūdāt bi-qudratih, wa-ṣanaʻa al-makhlūqāt bi-ʻaẓamatih, wa-mayyaza kull min al-ʻālamīn bi-ṭabīʻatih. Aḥmaduhu ʻalá mā wahaba min nūrihi al-qudsī, wa-ajzala min ishrāq al-ḍiyāʼ al-ḥusnī, wa-awdaʻa miṣbāḥ al-qūwah al-ʻaqlīyah fī mishkāt al-qūwah al-naẓarīyah, wa-kammalahā bi-al-zujājah al-sharīfah al-bālighah allatī yakādu zaytuhā yuḍīʼ, wa-jaʻalahā nūran ʻalá nūr, kaannahā al-kawākib [al-kawkab] al-durrī, mutawaqqidatan min shajarah mubārakah ʻulwīyah, lā sharqīyah wa-lā gharbīyah. Wa-asʼaluhu an yuṣalliya ʻalá khayr barīyatihi wa-atammihim kamālan, wa-aʻẓamihim ishrāqan wa-ijlālan, Muḥammad, al-muʼayyad bi-al-Rūḥ al-Amīn, wa-ʻalá man irtaḍá min ālihi wa-aṣḥābihi ajmaʻīn ..."
Secundo folio: al-ʻulūm qadran wa-aʻazzihā makānatan.
12.5 x 20 cm; written surface: 6.5 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In yellow cardboard binding with flap; central medallion embossed on cover and flap.
In beautiful maedium naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in purple; markings in purple, some in red; catchwords.

The date of the year in which the copy from which the present copy was copied, i.e., the beginning of Jumādá al-Ākhirah, 994 of the Hijrah (20 May, 1586), does not correspond to the date given in the alphabetical reckoning (ḥisāb al-jummal), as follows: "Wa-lāḥa liya al-tārīkhu ḥālata al-itmāmi // tamma bi-ʻawn al-Ḥaqqi Muʻīnu al-ḥukkāmi [ = 977]. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābatihi fī awāʼil shahr Jumādá al-Ākhirah min shuhūr sanat arbaʻ wa-tisʻīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [20 May, 1586]."
Colophon: "Ḥarrarahu al-faqīr al-ḥaqīr Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAlī ʻĪntābī, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahu wa-satara ʻuyūbahu, fī awāʼil shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, li-sanat iḥdá ʻashar wa-miʼah wa-alf."

Translation of the colophon: "Copied by the poor and despised Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAlī ʻĪntābī, may God forgive his sins and cover his shortcomings, at the beginning of Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 1111 [of the Hijrah = 17 August, 1699]."

title: 880-02 Mukhtaṣar al-Qudūrī : manuscript / Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad al-Qudūrī.

notes.text: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Kitāb al-Ṭahārāt. Qāla Allāh: 'Yā ayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā qumtum ilá al-ṣalāh fa-ighsilū wujūhakum wa-aydiyakum ilá al-marāfiq wa-imsaḥū bi-ruʼūsikum wa-arjulikum ilá al-kaʻbayn'. Fa-faraḍ al-ṭahārāt ghasl al-aʻḍāʼ al-thalāthah, wa-masḥ al-raʼs, wa-al-mirfaqān wa-al-kaʻbān yadkhulān fī al-ghasl, wa-al-mafrūḍ fī masḥ al-raʼs miqdār al-nāṣiyah, wa-huwa rubʻ al-raʼs ..."
Secundo folio: thumma yatawaḍḍaʼ wuḍuʼ illā rijlayh.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 7-12 x 17-18 cm; 19-23 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes without loss of text; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Matn al-Qudūrī. Ḥanafī."
On folio 1a: An erased ownership statement and an illegible seal.
Colophon: "Tammat al-kitāb bi-ʻawn Allāh al-Malik al-Wahhāb, fī ghurrat Dhī al-Ḥijjah, sanat 1148."
Translation of the colophon: "The book was completed by the help of the Abundant Giving King, at the beginning of Dhī al-Ḥijjah, the year 1148 [of the Hijrah = 13 April, 1736]."

title: 880-03 al-Muntakhab fī uṣūl al-madhhab : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Akhsīkathī.

notes.text: Title from the printed versions.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Ammā baʻd ḥamd Allāh ʻalá nawālih, wa-al-ṣalāh ʻalá Rasūlihi Muḥammad wa-ālih, fa-inna uṣūl al-sharʻ thalāthah: al-Kitāb wa-al-Sunnah wa-ijmāʻ al-ummah, wa-al-aṣl al-rābiʻ al-qiyās al-mustanbaṭ min hādhihi al-uṣūl. Ammā al-Kitāb, fa-al-Qurʼān al-munzal ʻalá al-Rasūl, al-maktūb fī al-maṣāḥif, al-manqūl ʻanhu naqlan mutawātiran, bi-lā shubhah, wa-huwa al-naẓm wa-al-maʻná jamīʻan fī qawl ʻāmmat al-ʻulamāʼ, raḥimahum Allāh, wa-huwa al-ṣaḥīḥ min madhhab Abī Ḥanīfah, raḥimahu Allāh, illā annahu lam yajʻal al-naẓm ruknan lāziman fī ḥaqq jawāz al-ṣalāh khāṣṣatan ..."
Secundo folio: lā yukallimu hādhā al-ṣabī.
10 x 19.5 cm; written surface: 5.5 x 12 cm; 11 lines per page.
Binding: In marbled cardboard with dark brown leather on spine.
In good naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; many notes and commentaries on the margins and interlinear; some leaves seem to be missing; no catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Sharḥ al-Akhsīkathī fī al-uṣūl."

Colophon: "Wa-Allāh aʻlam bi-al-ṣawāb. Tamma al-kitāb bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih. Katabahu Muḥammad ibn Shams al-Dīn ibn Ḥājī al-mulaqqab bi-Shams al-Dīn, fī salkh shahr al-Muḥarram al-ḥarām, sanat tisʻ wa-ʻishrīn wa-sabʻimiʼah min al-Hijrah."

Translation of the colophon: "God is more knowledgeable of what is correct. The book was completed by the praise of God and His help. Copied by Muḥammad ibn Shams al-Dīn ibn Ḥājī al-mulaqqab bi-Shams al-Dīn, at the end of Muḥarram, 720 of the Hijrah [12 December, 1328]."

title: 880-03 Minhāj al-ṭālibīn : manuscript / Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī.

notes.text: Title of Minhāj al-ṭālibīn from reference sources.
Title of Sharḥ daqāʼiq alfāẓ al-Minhāj from incipit (folio 209a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit of Minhāj al-ṭālibīn: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir wa-lā tuʻassir. Qāla [al-Shaykh] al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf ibn Murrī ibn Ḥasan al-Nawawī, raḥimahu Allāh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh al-Barr al-Jawwād, alladhī jallat niʻmatuhu ʻan al-iḥṣāʼ bi-al-aʻdād, al-mannān bi-al-luṭf wa-al-irshād, al-hādī ilá sabīl al-rashād, al-muwaffiq lil-tafaqquh fī al-dīn man laṭufa bi-hi wa-ikhtārahu min al-ʻibād, aḥmaduhu ablagha ḥamdin wa-akmalahu wa-azkāhu wa-ashmalah, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu, lā sharīka lah, al-wāḥidu al-ghaffār, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-muṣṭafá al-mukhtār, ṣallá Allāh ʻalayhi wa-sallam, wa-azādahu faḍlan wa-sharafan ladayh. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna al-ishtighāl bi-al-ʻilm min afḍal al-ṭāʻāt, wa-awlá mā inṭawat ʻalayhi nafāʼis al-awqāt, wa-qad akthara aṣḥābunā, raḥimahum Allāh, min al-taṣnīf, min al-muṭawwalāt wa-al-mukhtaṣarāt. Wa-atqan mukhtaṣar 'al-Muḥarrar' lil-Imām Abī al-Qāsim al-Rāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh, dhī al-taḥqīqāt, wa-huwa kathīr al-fawāʼid wa-ʻumdah fī taḥqīq al-madhhab, muʻtamad lil-fatwá [lil-muftī] wa-ghayrihi min ulī al-raghabāt ... ... fa-raʼaytu ikhtiṣārahu fī niṣf ḥajmihi ..."
Secundo folio of Minhāj al-ṭālibīn: al-mustajādāt, minhā al-tanbīh ʻalá quyūd.

Incipit of Sharḥ daqāʼiq alfāẓ al-Minhāj: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā [Muḥammad] wa-sallam. Ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh, wa-ashhadu anna Muḥammadan Rasūl Allāh. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb fī 'Sharḥ daqāʼiq alfāẓ al-Minhāj', wa-al-farq bayna alfāẓihi wa-alfāẓ 'al-Muḥarrar' lil-Imām al-Rāfiʻī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá. Qawluhu fī al-Muḥarrar: 'Subḥānaka', munṣūb ʻalá annahu ism wāqiʻ mawqiʻ al-maṣdar, ay, sabbaḥtu Allāh subḥānan, ay, nazzahtuhu min al-naqāʼiṣ muṭlaqan ..."
Secundo folio of Sharḥ daqāʼiq alfāẓ al-Minhāj: baʻda fatḥ al-dāl wa-ankarahu al-Naḥḥās.
15.5 x 21 cm; written surface: 10 x 16 cm; 14-27 lines per page.
Binding: In brown leather binding with flap; cover and flap embossed with central medallion.
In good naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; headings in red; some notes and corrections on the margins; some wormholes; some leaves are replaced in different hands; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Kitāb Matn al-Minhāj fī al-fiqh, taʼlīf al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻĀlim al-ʻallāmah, al-ʻumdah al-fahhāmah, Muḥyī al-Dīn Yaḥyá ibn Sharaf al-Nawawī, nufiʻnā bi-hi."
At the head of folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa hādhā al-kitāb lillāh taʻālá Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."

Colophon of Minhāj al-ṭālibīn: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnih wa-ḥusn tawfīqih wa-mannihi wa-karamih. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-kāna al-farāgh minhu salkha sanat sabʻah wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah. Mulk al-faqīr Muḥibb al-Dīn ibn Abī Bakr al-Jāwilī."

Translation of the colophon: "The blessed book is completed by the praise of God, His help, His abundant benevolence, His graciousness and His generosity. God suffices us, He is the best advocate. It was completed at the end of the year 967 [of the Hijrah = 1 October, 1560]. Owned by the poor Muḥibb al-Dīn ibn Abī Bakr al-Jāwilī."

Colophon of Sharḥ daqāʼiq alfāẓ al-Minhāj: No colophon. The last page is missing; the text ends with: "... Qawluhu: 'Wa-law kātaba baʻḍa raqīq fasudat in kān bāqīhi li-ghayrihi wa-huwa murād al-Muḥarrar, li-qawlihi fa-al-kitābah bāṭilah. Wa-iʻlam anna al-fāsid wa-al-bāṭil min al-ʻuqūd ʻindanā sawāʼ fī al-ḥukm, illā fī mawāḍiʻ, minhā al-ḥajj wa-al-ʻāriyah wa-al-khulʻ wa-al-kitābah, fa-tajawwaza al-Muḥarrar bi-tasmiyatihā bāṭilah, wa-murāduhu annahā fāsidah, yatarattabu ʻalayhā aḥkām al-fāsidah min al-ʻutq bi-al-ṣifah wa-ghayrihi, lā annahā bāṭilah ḥaqīqatan lāghiyah. Qawl al-Muḥarrar 'Aqall al-amrayn min qīmatihi, aw, arsh [al-jināyah]', hādhihi al-alif fī qawlihi aw zāʼidah tughayyiru aṣl al-maʻnā [al-maʻná], wa-al-wajh ḥadhfuhā, wa-qad nabbaha ʻalayhi al-muṣannif fī 'Sharḥ al-Wajīz', wa-li-hādhā lam yastaʻmilhā al-Muḥarrar fī ghayr hādhā al-mawḍiʻ, bi-khilāf ghayrihi min al-muṣannifīn, [... ... ...]"

title: 880-03 Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / Jalāl al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī.

notes.text: Title from folio 1a.
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Muḥammad wa-ālih. Hādhā mā ishtaddat ilayhi ḥājat al-mutafahhimīn li-Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ, min sharḥ yaḥullu alfāẓah, wa-yubayyinu murādah, wa-yuḥaqqiqu masāʼilah, wa-yuḥarriru dalāʼilah, ʻalá wajh sahl lil-mubtadiʼīn, ḥasan lil-nāẓirīn, nafaʻa Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Qāla al-muṣannif, raḥimahu Allāh: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Naḥmaduka Allāhumma, ay, naṣifuka bi-jamīʻ ṣifātika, Yā Allāh ..."
Secundo folio: wājib, wa-al-thānī mandūb.
14.5 x 22 cm; written surface: 10 x 15 cm; 21 lines per page.
Binding: In dark red cover with flap; cover embossed with central medallion within a geometrical design (in 21 numbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper, the phrases of Jamʻ al-jawām in red; notes and commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
Brockelmann (S II, page 105) gives the title of the book as "al-Badr aṭ-ṭāliʻ fī ḥall Ǧ. al-ǧ. [al-Badr al-ṭāliʻ fī ḥall Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ]."
On folio 1a: "Hādhā Sharḥ Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ lil-Maḥallī, nafaʻanā Allāh bi-hi. Āmīn. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam."

Colophon: "Qāla al-muʼallif: Wa-hādhā ākhir mā ishtamala ʻalayhi al-kitāb. Wa-lillāh al-ḥamd wa-al-minnah ʻalá ikmālih. Wa-kāna al-farāgh min takmilatihi yawm al-Thulāthāʼ al-mubārak, ḥādī ʻashar Ṣafar al-khayr, min shuhūr sanat tisʻ wa-thalāthīn wa-miʼah wa-alf min al-Hijrah al-Nabawīyah, ʻalá ṣāḥibihā afḍal al-ṣalāh wa-azká al-salām, wa-dhālika ʻalá yad al-faqīr ʻAbd Allāh ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī al-Qaḥāfī al-Shāfiʻī al-Shādhilī al-Aḥmadī, fī salkh Muḥarram, ʻām 1256, sittah wa-khamsīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf min Hijrat man la-hu al-ʻizz wa-al-sharaf."

Translation of the colophon: "The author said: This is the end of what the book encompasses. Praise and grace be to God for its completion. It was completed [i.e., the copy from which the present copy was copied] on blessed Tuesday, 11 Ṣafar, 1139 [8 October, 1726] of the Hijrah of the Prophet, may the best prayer and purest peace be upon Him. [Copied] by the hand of the poor ʻAbd Allāh ʻAlī al-Shinnāwī al-Qaḥāfī al-Shāfiʻī al-Shādhilī al-Aḥmadī, at the end of Muḥarram, the year 1256 [3 April, 1840] of the Hijrah of Him to whom belongs nobleness and honor."

title: 880-02 Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ : manuscript / ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-Ikhnāʼī al-Shāfiʻī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 1b).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm, wa-bi-hi al-iʻānah. Qāla faqīr raḥmat Rabbihi ʻĪsá ibn ʻAlī al-Ikhnāʼī al-Shāfiʻī, ʻafā Allāh ʻanhu wa-li-wālidayh: al-Ḥamdu lillāh Rabb al-ʻĀlamīn, wa-al-ʻāfiyah lil-muttaqīn, wa-lā ʻudwāna illā ʻalá al-ẓālimīn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad, wa-ʻalá ālihi wa-ṣaḥābatihi ajmaʻīn. Ammā baʻd, fa-hādhā kitāb ikhtaṣartu fīhi 'Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ', muṣannaf al-Imām al-ʻAllāmah al-Subkī, wa-lam adhkur fīhi illā al-muḥtāj ilayhi, wa-sammaytuhu 'Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ'. Wa-arjū min Allāh taʻālá tawjīzahu, in ʻishtu, bi-ʻibārah wa-jīzah. Wa-bi-hi al-ʻawn wa-al-hidāyah ilá mā fīhi al-kifāyah, wa-Huwa ḥasbī wa-niʻma al-wakīl ..."
Secundo folio: ḥaythu innahu muʻarraf aw ghayruhu.
17 x 22.3 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 16 cm; 25 lines per page.
Binding: Unbound (in two unnumbered quires).
In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper, the phrases of Jamʻ al-jawām and markings in red; some notes on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Lamʻ al-lawāmiʻ fī ikhtiṣār Jamʻ al-jawāmiʻ."
On folio 1a: An endowment statement: "Awqafa lillāh taʻālá hādhā al-kitāb Aḥmad Muḥammad al-Najjārī."

Colophon: "Tamma al-kitāb al-mubārak bi-ʻawn al-Karīm al-Wahhāb. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi mā ṭalaʻa najmun wa-ghāb. Fī tārīkh shahr Jumād al-Thānī, sanat 1077. Wa-Allāh taʻālá aʻlam."

Translation of the colophon: "The blessed book is complete by the help of the Generous and Abundant Giving One. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad, his family and his companions, as long as a star rises and sets. In the Month of Jumād al-Thānī, the year 1077 [of the Hijrah = November/December, 1666]. God Most High is more knowledgeable."

title: 880-03 Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā ibn Muḥammad al-Anṣārī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 2a).
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Qāla Sayyidunā wa-Mawlānā Qāḍī al-Quḍāh, Shaykh Mashāyikh al-Islām, malik al-ʻulamāʼ al-aʻlām, farīd ʻaṣrih wa- waḥīd dahrihi, Sībawayh zamānihi, ḥujjat al-munāẓirīn wa-lisān al-mutakallimīn, Muḥyī al-Sunnah fī al-ʻālamīn, Zayn al-Millah wa-al-Dīn, Abū Yaḥyá Zakarīyā al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, taghammadahu Allāh bi-raḥmatih, wa-askanahu fasīḥ jannatih, wa-nafaʻanā wa-al-Muslimīn bi-barakatih: Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh ʻalá afḍālih, wa-al-ṣalāh wa-al-salām ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-ālih, wa-baʻd, fa-qad kuntu ikhtaṣartu 'Minhāj al-ṭālibīn' fī al-fiqh, taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām Abī Zakarīyā Yaḥyá Muḥyī al-Dīn al-Nawawī, raḥimahu Allāh, fī kitāb sammaytuhu bi-'Manhaj al-ṭullāb', wa-qad saʼalanī baʻḍ al-aʻizzah min al-fuḍalāʼ al-mutaraddidīn ilayya an ashraḥahu sharḥan yaḥullu alfāẓahu, wa-yujillu ḥuffāẓahu, wa-yubayyinu murādahu, wa-yutammimu mafādahu, fa-ajabtuhu ilá dhālik bi-ʻawn al-Qādir al-Mālik, wa-sammaytuhu bi-'Fatḥ al-Wahhāb bi-sharḥ Manhaj al-ṭullāb'. title: 880-03 Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj. Al-Juzʼ 1 : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī.

notes.text: Title from incipit (folio 3a)
Romanization supplied by cataloger.

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Yā Karīm. al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī shayyada bi-Minhāj dīnihi arkān al-sharīʻah, wa-saddada bi-aḥkāmihi furūʻ al-Ḥanīfīyah al-samḥāʼ, man ʻamala bi-hi fa-qad ittabaʻa sabīl al-muʼminīn, wa-man waqafa ʻanhu kharaja ʻan masālik al-muʻtabarīn. Aḥmaduhu, subḥānahu, ʻalá mā ʻallam, wa-ashkuruhu ʻalá mā hadá wa-qawwam, wa-ashhadu an lā ilāha illā Allāh waḥdahu lā sharīka lah, al-Malik al-Ḥaqq al-Mubīn, wa-ashhadu anna Sayyidanā Muḥammadan ʻabduhu wa-rasūluh, al-mabʻūth raḥmatan lil-ʻālamīn, wa-al-nūr al-sāʼir lil-khalāʼiq ilá Yawm al-Dīn, arsalahu ḥīna darast aʻlām al-hudá wa-ẓaharat aʻlām al-radá, wa-inṭamasa manhaj al-ḥaqq wa-ʻafā, wa-ashrafa miṣbāḥ al-ṣidq ʻalá al-inṭifā, fa-aʻlá min al-dīn maʻālimah, wa-min ḥukm al-sharʻ dalāʼilah, fa-insharaḥ bi-hi ṣudūr ahl al-īmān, wa-inzāḥat bi-hi shubuhāt ahl al-ṭughyān ..."
Secundo folio: wa-tasāmá fa-lam yasmaʻ ayna al-thurayyā.
21 x 30.5 cm; written surface: 12.5 x 22 cm; 33 lines per page.
Binding: In cardboard binding with flap; dark brown leather on spine and flap.
In fair naskh script, in black ink, on white paper; the phrases of al-Minhāj and markings in red; many commentaries on the margins; catchwords.
On folio 1a: "Hādhā al-Juzw al-awwal min 'Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj', taʼlīf al-Imām al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī, taghammadahumā Allāh bi-raḥmatih. Āmīn. Āmīn."

On folio 1a: Two ownership statements, as follows: "Mimmā sāqahu al-taqdīr li-nawbat al-ʻabd al-faqīr Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Shaṭbī al-Suyūṭī, ghafara Allāh lahum. Āmīn, wa-dhālika fī rābiʻ Shawwāl, sanat 1248, thamāniyah wa-arbaʻīn wa-miʼatayn wa-alf [24 February, 1833]."

On folio 1a: Two pieces of poetry (6 and 4 verses, respectively), by al-Shaykh Burhān al-Dīn al-Jaʻbarī (probably Burhān al-Dīn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻUmar al-Jaʻbarī, 1242 or 1243-1331 or 1332), praising the author of al-Rawḍah (Rawḍat al-ṭālibīn wa-ʻumdat al-muftīn) and al-Minhāj (Minhāj al-ṭālibīn), i.e., al-Nawawī.
On folio 1a: A quotation from "al-Muhimmāt" of al-Isnawī (ʻAbd al-Raḥīm ibn al-Ḥasan al-Isnawī, 1305-1370) on the different kinds of fatwas.
On folio 3a: "... wa-sammaytuhu 'Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj' ..."

On folio 374a: Two verses of poetry attributed to Ibn al-Humām (probably Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid, 1388-1456 or 1457), and three verses attributed to al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī (Muḥammad ibn Idrīs, 767 or 768-820), blaming their time in which the unworthy became prominent.

On the left margin of folio 374a: A statement attributed to al-Ramlī: "Yawm al-Ithnayn al-mubārak, tāsiʻ ʻashar Rajab al-fard al-aṣamm al-ḥarām, sanat khams wa-sittīn wa-tisʻimiʼah [17 Ayyār/Māyū, 1558], ʻalá yad muʼallifihi, faqīr ʻafw Rabbihi wa-asīr waṣmat dhanbihi, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Shāfiʻī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-mashāyikhihi, wa-li-muḥibbīhi, wa-li-dhurrīyatihi, wa-li-man daʻá lahum bi-al-khayr, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, wa-nafaʻa Allāh man qaraʼahu, wa-daʻā li-man kāna sababan fī dhālika bi-al-mawt ʻalá al-Islām, wa-li-sāʼir al-Muslimīn, wa-sāʼir anbiyāʼihi wa-rusulih wa-malāʼikatihi wa-akhiṣṣāʼihi, an yudīma lanā riḍāhu, wa-an yuṣliḥa minnā mā afsadnāh, wa-an yamanna ʻalaynā bi-qurbihi, wa-an yutḥfanā bi-ḥaqāʼiq ḥubbihi, wa-an lā yajʻala aʻmālanā ḥasratan ʻalaynā wa-nadāmah, wa-an yajmaʻanā maʻa sādātinā fī aʻlā farādīs al-karāmah, wa-an yuʻīnanā ʻalá itmām baqīyat sharḥ al-kitāb, kamā aʻānanā ʻalá ibtidāʼih, fa-innahu mujīb al-duʻāʼ, lā yaruddu man qaṣadah, wa-iʻtamada ʻalayh, wa-lā man ʻawwala fī jamīʻ umūrihi ʻalayh. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-ālihi wa-ṣaḥbihi wa-sallam. Wa-ḥasbunā Allāh wa-niʻma al-wakīl. Wa-lā ḥawla wa-lā qūwata illā billāh al-ʻAlī al-ʻAẓīm. Wa-aqūlu ḥarrartuhu mujtahidn, wa-laysa yakhlū min ghalaṭ [... ... ...]."
The first volume of "Nihāyat al-muḥtāj ilá sharḥ al-Minhāj" ends with "Bāb al-Iḥṣār wa-al-fawāt" (Chapter on what prohibits the completion of the stages of the pilgrimage).

Colophon: "Wa-kāna al-farāgh min kitābat hādhā al-juzw al-mubārak yawm al-Arbiʻāʼ al-mubārak, ḥādī ʻashar shahr Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, min shuhūr ʻām 0181 [1081], aḥad wa-thamānūn wa-alf, ʻalá yad kātibihi wa-mālikihi al-Sayyid Aḥmad Abū al-Faḍl al-Ḥasanī, al-Shāfiʻī al-Samhūdī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn. Āmīn. Āmīn."

Translation of the colophon: "This blessed part was completed on blessed Wednesday, 11 Rabīʻ al-Ākhir, 1081 [28 August, 1670], by its copyist and owner al-Sayyid Aḥmad Abū al-Faḍl al-Ḥasanī al-Shāfiʻī al-Samhūdī, may God forgive him, his parents and all Muslims. Amen. Amen."

Kamula bi-ḥamd Allāh wa-ʻawnihi al-juzʼ al-thānī min Ḥāshiyat al-ʻAllāmah al-Dasūqī ʻalá Sharḥ al-ʻAllāmah al-Dardīr. Fa-bi-kamālihi kamula al-niṣf minhā. Wa-yalīhi, in shāʼa Allāh taʻālá, awwal al-thālith 'Kitāb al-Buyūʻ'. Wa-al-ḥamdu lillāh awwalan wa-ākhiran, ẓāhiran wa-bāṭinan. Wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá Sayyidinā Muḥammad wa-sallam."

Praise be to God from the beginning to the end, overtly and covertly. May God pray on our Master Muḥammad and grant him peace."

Mudh jahila al-dahru qadra qīmatihā // aʻādahā ghayratan ilá al-ṣadafi."

Colophon: "Wa-wāfaqa al-farāgh min taʻlīqihi ʻalá yad aḍʻaf ʻabīd Allāh, wa-aḥwajihim, wa-afqarihim ilá raḥmatihi wa-maghfiratih, al-ʻabd al-ḍaʻīf al-naḥīf al-ḥaqīr, al-muʻtarif bi-al-taqṣīr, al-jānī, Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥasbānī, ghafara Allāh la-hu wa-li-wālidayhi, wa-li-man daʻā la-hu bi-al-maghfirah, wa-li-jamīʻ al-Muslimīn, fī ʻashīyat nahār al-Khamīs, thāmin shahr Rabīʻ al-Awwal, min shuhūr sanat arbaʻ wa-sittīn wa-thamānimiʼah, aḥsana Allāh taʻālá ʻuqbāhā fī khayr wa-ʻāfiyah, bi-mannihi wa-karamih, innahu ʻalá mā yashāʼu qadīr wa-bi-al-ijābah jadīr."

Translation of the colophon: "The copy was completed by the hand of the feeblest of God's servants, the neediest and the poorest to His mercy and forgiveness, the weak, emaciated and despised servant, who confesses his insufficiency, the sinner Muḥammad ibn Sālim al-Ḥasabānī, may God forgive him, his parents, him who invokes God for his forgiveness, and all Muslims, on the evening of Thursday, 18 Rabīʻ al-Awwal, 864 [21 January, 1460], may God Almighty ends it with well being and health, by His favor and generosity; for He is able to do whatever He wills and readily answers invocations."

Incipit: "Bismillāh al-Raḥmān al-Raḥīm. Rabbi yassir. Qāla al-Shaykh al-Imām, al-ʻālim al-ʻallāmah, al-baḥr al-fahhāmah, Jamāl al-Dīn Abū al-Faraj ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn al-Jawzī, raḥimahu Allāh taʻālá: al-Ḥamdu lillāh alladhī aḥallanā maḥallat al-fahm, wa-ḥallānā ḥilyat al-ʻilm, wa-mallkanā ʻiqāl al-ʻaql, wa-zayyananā bi-niṭāq al-nuṭq, wa-naʻūdhu bi-hi min kadar ṣafāʼ al-fikr wa-ʻakar duhn al-dhihn, wa-ṣallá Allāh ʻalá al-mabʻūth bi-jawāmiʻ al-kalim ilá aʻqal al-umam, wa-ʻalá jamīʻ atbāʻihi al-sāʼirīn fī manhaj atbāʻih, wa-sallama kathīran. Ammā baʻd, fa-inna ajall al-ashyāʼ mawhibat al-ʻaql, fa-innahu al-ālah fī taḥṣīl maʻrifat al-ālah, wa-bi-hi tuḍbaṭu al-maṣāliḥ, wa-tulḥaẓu al-ʻawāqib, wa-tudraku al-ghawāmiḍ, wa-tujmaʻu al-faḍāʼil ..."
Secundo folio: ibn Muḥammad qāl samiʻtu.

Wa-kāna al-farāgh min naskhihi nahār al-Jumʻah, ghurrat shahr Dhī al-Qaʻdah, sanat sabʻ wa-tisʻīn baʻda al-alf, ʻalá yaday al-faqīr ilá ʻafw al-Qadīr, al-mutakaddir bi-nakabāt al-zamān, al-mustafīḍ fayḍ al-Raḥmān, innahu ḥannān mannān, Qāsim ibn al-Ḥājj Dāwūd ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh, ghafara Allāh dhunūbahum wa-satara ʻuyūbahum [... ... ...] wa-ʻāmmat al-muʼminīn. The copy was concluded on Friday, the beginning of Dhī al-Qaʻdah, 1097 [of the Hijrah = 19 September, 1686], by the hand of the poor to the forgiveness of the Mighty One, who is afflicted by the calamities of time, and is seeking the copiousness of the Merciful One, the Most Compassionate and the Most Generous, Qāsim ibn al-Ḥājj Dāwūd ibn al-Ḥājj ʻAlī ibn ʻAbd Allāh, may God forgive their sins and cover their shortcomings [... ... ...] and all Muslims. O my Lord! Accept my invocation and fulfill my request. Amen. By the intercession of the Master of the Former and the Latter [Prophet Muḥammad]. And fulfill my hopes. Amen."

title: 880-02 Kashf al-lithām ʻan sharḥ Shaykh al-Islām : manuscript / Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī al-Buhūtī al-Khalwatī.
